sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
lpa1.RECID,
lpa1.CITY,
lpa1.COUNTY,
lpa1.COUNTRYREGIONID,
lpa1.LATITUDE,
lpa1.LONGITUDE,
lpa1.ZIPCODE,
lpa1.STATE,
lpa1.STREET,
lpa1.ISPRIVATE,
lpa1.MODIFIEDDATETIME,
ll1.LOCATIONID,
ll1.DESCRIPTION,
ll1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as LOGISTICSLOCATION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
tzl1.TIMEZONEKEYNAME
from
dbo.LOGISTICSPOSTALADDRESS lpa1
left join dbo.LOGISTICSLOCATION ll1 on lpa1.LOCATION = ll1.RECID
left join dbo.TIMEZONESLIST tzl1 on lpa1.TIMEZONE = tzl1.TZENUM

select 
lpa1.RECID,
lpa1.CITY,
lpa1.COUNTY,
lpa1.COUNTRYREGIONID,
lpa1.LATITUDE,
lpa1.LONGITUDE,
lpa1.ZIPCODE,
lpa1.STATE,
lpa1.STREET,
lpa1.ISPRIVATE,
lpa1.MODIFIEDDATETIME,
ll1.LOCATIONID,
ll1.DESCRIPTION,
ll1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as LOGISTICSLOCATION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
tzl1.TIMEZONEKEYNAME
from
dbo.LOGISTICSPOSTALADDRESS lpa1
left join dbo.LOGISTICSLOCATION ll1 on lpa1.LOCATION = ll1.RECID
left join dbo.TIMEZONESLIST tzl1 on lpa1.TIMEZONE = tzl1.TZENUM

@concat('select 
lpa1.recid as RECID,
lpa1.city as CITY,
lpa1.county as COUNTY,
lpa1.countryregionid as COUNTRYREGIONID,
lpa1.latitude as LATITUDE,
lpa1.longitude as LONGITUDE,
lpa1.zipcode as ZIPCODE,
lpa1.state as STATE,
lpa1.street as STREET,
lpa1.isprivate as ISPRIVATE,
lpa1.modifieddatetime as MODIFIEDDATETIME,
ll1.locationid as LOCATIONID,
ll1.description as DESCRIPTION,
ll1.modifieddatetime  as LOGISTICSLOCATION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
tzl1.timezonekeyname as TIMEZONEKEYNAME
from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','logisticspostaladdress lpa1
left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','logisticslocation ll1 on lpa1.location = ll1.recid
left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timezoneslist tzl1 on lpa1.timezone = tzl1.tzenum where lpa1.recid is not null')

SELECT ma1.RECID as RECID ,ma1.MAINACCOUNTID as MAINACCOUNTID ,ma1.NAME as NAME ,ma1.ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF as ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF ,ma1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS as LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS ,ma1.TYPE as TYPE ,ma1.POSTINGTYPE as POSTINGTYPE ,ma1.MONETARY as MONETARY ,ma1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as MODIFIEDDATETIME ,mac1.ACCOUNTCATEGORY as MAINACCOUNTCATEGORY_ACCOUNTCATEGORY ,mac1.DESCRIPTION as MAINACCOUNTCATEGORY_DESCRIPTION ,lcoa1.NAME as LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS_NAME ,lcoa1.DESCRIPTION as LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS_DESCRIPTION ,tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_DIMENSIONLEDGERACCOUNTTYPE ,tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_LEDGERPOSTINGTYPE ,ma2.LEVEL1 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL1 ,ma2.LEVEL2 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL2 ,ma2.LEVEL3 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL3 ,ma2.LEVEL4 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL4 ,ma2.LEVEL5 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL5 ,ma2.LEVEL6 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL6 ,ma1.MODIFIEDDATETIME FROM dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma1 left join dbo.MAINACCOUNTCATEGORY mac1 on 	ma1.ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF = mac1.ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF left join dbo.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS lcoa1 on 	ma1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = lcoa1.RECID left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE 			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 		where ENUMNAME = 'DimensionLedgerAccountType' 		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet1 on 	ma1.TYPE = tet1.ENUMVALUE left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE 			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 		where ENUMNAME = 'LedgerPostingType' 		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet2 on 	ma1.POSTINGTYPE = tet2.ENUMVALUE left join (select ma20.MAINACCOUNTID, ma20.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS 			, substring(ma20.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 1) as LEVEL1 			, isnull(ma20.LEVEL2_PROSPECT, ma20.LEVEL3_PROSPECT) as LEVEL2 			, isnull(ma20.LEVEL3_PROSPECT, ma20.LEVEL4_PROSPECT) as LEVEL3 			, isnull(ma20.LEVEL4_PROSPECT, ma20.LEVEL5_PROSPECT) as LEVEL4 			, isnull(ma20.LEVEL5_PROSPECT, ma20.LEVEL6_PROSPECT) as LEVEL5 			, ma20.LEVEL6_PROSPECT as LEVEL6 		from (select ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS 				, ma_master2.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL2_PROSPECT 				, ma_master3.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL3_PROSPECT 				, ma_master4.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL4_PROSPECT 				, ma_master5.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL5_PROSPECT 				, ma_master6.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL6_PROSPECT 			from dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_hier1 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master2 on 				left(ma_master2.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master2.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master2.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 2 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 2) else null end = ma_master2.MAINACCOUNTID 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master3 on 				left(ma_master3.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master3.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master3.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 3 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 3) else null end = ma_master3.MAINACCOUNTID 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master4 on 				left(ma_master4.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master4.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master4.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 4 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 4) else null end = ma_master4.MAINACCOUNTID 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master5 on 				left(ma_master5.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master5.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master5.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 5 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 5) else null end = ma_master5.MAINACCOUNTID 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master6 on 				left(ma_master6.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master6.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master6.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 6 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 6) else null end = ma_master6.MAINACCOUNTID 			where left(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' 			and ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T') ma20 		) ma2 on 	ma1.MAINACCOUNTID = ma2.MAINACCOUNTID and 	ma1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma2.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS

SELECT ma1.RECID as RECID ,ma1.MAINACCOUNTID as MAINACCOUNTID ,ma1.NAME as NAME ,ma1.ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF as ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF ,ma1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS as LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS ,ma1.TYPE as TYPE ,ma1.POSTINGTYPE as POSTINGTYPE ,ma1.MONETARY as MONETARY ,ma1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as MODIFIEDDATETIME ,mac1.ACCOUNTCATEGORY as MAINACCOUNTCATEGORY_ACCOUNTCATEGORY ,mac1.DESCRIPTION as MAINACCOUNTCATEGORY_DESCRIPTION ,lcoa1.NAME as LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS_NAME ,lcoa1.DESCRIPTION as LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS_DESCRIPTION ,tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_DIMENSIONLEDGERACCOUNTTYPE ,tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_LEDGERPOSTINGTYPE ,ma2.LEVEL1 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL1 ,ma2.LEVEL2 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL2 ,ma2.LEVEL3 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL3 ,ma2.LEVEL4 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL4 ,ma2.LEVEL5 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL5 ,ma2.LEVEL6 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL6 ,ma1.MODIFIEDDATETIME FROM dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma1 left join dbo.MAINACCOUNTCATEGORY mac1 on 	ma1.ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF = mac1.ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF left join dbo.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS lcoa1 on 	ma1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = lcoa1.RECID left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE 			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 		where ENUMNAME = 'DimensionLedgerAccountType' 		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet1 on 	ma1.TYPE = tet1.ENUMVALUE left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE 			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 		where ENUMNAME = 'LedgerPostingType' 		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet2 on 	ma1.POSTINGTYPE = tet2.ENUMVALUE left join (select ma20.MAINACCOUNTID, ma20.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS 			, substring(ma20.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 1) as LEVEL1 			, isnull(ma20.LEVEL2_PROSPECT, ma20.LEVEL3_PROSPECT) as LEVEL2 			, isnull(ma20.LEVEL3_PROSPECT, ma20.LEVEL4_PROSPECT) as LEVEL3 			, isnull(ma20.LEVEL4_PROSPECT, ma20.LEVEL5_PROSPECT) as LEVEL4 			, isnull(ma20.LEVEL5_PROSPECT, ma20.LEVEL6_PROSPECT) as LEVEL5 			, ma20.LEVEL6_PROSPECT as LEVEL6 		from (select ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS 				, ma_master2.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL2_PROSPECT 				, ma_master3.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL3_PROSPECT 				, ma_master4.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL4_PROSPECT 				, ma_master5.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL5_PROSPECT 				, ma_master6.MAINACCOUNTID as LEVEL6_PROSPECT 			from dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_hier1 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master2 on 				left(ma_master2.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master2.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master2.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 2 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 2) else null end = ma_master2.MAINACCOUNTID 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master3 on 				left(ma_master3.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master3.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master3.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 3 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 3) else null end = ma_master3.MAINACCOUNTID 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master4 on 				left(ma_master4.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master4.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master4.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 4 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 4) else null end = ma_master4.MAINACCOUNTID 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master5 on 				left(ma_master5.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master5.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master5.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 5 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 5) else null end = ma_master5.MAINACCOUNTID 			left join dbo.MAINACCOUNT ma_master6 on 				left(ma_master6.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' and 				ma_master6.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T' and 				ma_hier1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma_master6.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS and 				case when len(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID) >= 6 then substring(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1, 6) else null end = ma_master6.MAINACCOUNTID 			where left(ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID, 1) like '[0-9]' 			and ma_hier1.MAINACCOUNTID not like '%T') ma20 		) ma2 on 	ma1.MAINACCOUNTID = ma2.MAINACCOUNTID and 	ma1.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS = ma2.LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS

@concat('select
ma1.recid as RECID
,ma1.mainaccountid as MAINACCOUNTID
,ma1.name as NAME
,ma1.accountcategoryref as ACCOUNTCATEGORYREF
,ma1.ledgerchartofaccounts as LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS
,ma1.type as TYPE
,ma1.postingtype as POSTINGTYPE
,ma1.monetary as MONETARY
,ma1.modifieddatetime as MODIFIEDDATETIME
,mac1.accountcategory as MAINACCOUNTCATEGORY_ACCOUNTCATEGORY
,mac1.description as MAINACCOUNTCATEGORY_DESCRIPTION
,lcoa1.name as LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS_NAME
,lcoa1.description as LEDGERCHARTOFACCOUNTS_DESCRIPTION
,tet1.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_DIMENSIONLEDGERACCOUNTTYPE
,tet2.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_LEDGERPOSTINGTYPE
,ma2.level1 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL1
,ma2.level2 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL2
,ma2.level3 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL3
,ma2.level4 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL4
,ma2.level5 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL5
,ma2.level6 as MAINACCOUNT2_LEVEL6
,ma1.modifieddatetime as MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','mainaccount ma1
left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','mainaccountcategory mac1 on
	ma1.accountcategoryref = mac1.accountcategoryref
left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','ledgerchartofaccounts lcoa1 on
	ma1.ledgerchartofaccounts = lcoa1.recid
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = ''DimensionLedgerAccountType''
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet1 on
	ma1.type = tet1.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = ''LedgerPostingType''
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet2 on
	ma1.postingtype = tet2.enumvalue
left join (select ma20.mainaccountid, ma20.ledgerchartofaccounts
			, substring(ma20.mainaccountid, 1, 1) as level1
			, isnull(ma20.level2_prospect, ma20.level3_prospect) as level2
			, isnull(ma20.level3_prospect, ma20.level4_prospect) as level3
			, isnull(ma20.level4_prospect, ma20.level5_prospect) as level4
			, isnull(ma20.level5_prospect, ma20.level6_prospect) as level5
			, ma20.level6_prospect as level6
		from (select ma_hier1.mainaccountid, ma_hier1.ledgerchartofaccounts
				, ma_master2.mainaccountid as level2_prospect
				, ma_master3.mainaccountid as level3_prospect
				, ma_master4.mainaccountid as level4_prospect
				, ma_master5.mainaccountid as level5_prospect
				, ma_master6.mainaccountid as level6_prospect
			from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','mainaccount ma_hier1
			left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','mainaccount ma_master2 on
				left(ma_master2.mainaccountid, 1) like ''[0-9]'' and
				ma_master2.mainaccountid not like ''%T'' and
				ma_hier1.ledgerchartofaccounts = ma_master2.ledgerchartofaccounts and
				case when len(ma_hier1.mainaccountid) >= 2 then substring(ma_hier1.mainaccountid, 1, 2) else null end = ma_master2.mainaccountid
			left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','mainaccount ma_master3 on
				left(ma_master3.mainaccountid, 1) like ''[0-9]'' and
				ma_master3.mainaccountid not like ''%T'' and
				ma_hier1.ledgerchartofaccounts = ma_master3.ledgerchartofaccounts and
				case when len(ma_hier1.mainaccountid) >= 3 then substring(ma_hier1.mainaccountid, 1, 3) else null end = ma_master3.mainaccountid
			left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','mainaccount ma_master4 on
				left(ma_master4.mainaccountid, 1) like ''[0-9]'' and
				ma_master4.mainaccountid not like ''%T'' and
				ma_hier1.ledgerchartofaccounts = ma_master4.ledgerchartofaccounts and
				case when len(ma_hier1.mainaccountid) >= 4 then substring(ma_hier1.mainaccountid, 1, 4) else null end = ma_master4.mainaccountid
			left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','mainaccount ma_master5 on
				left(ma_master5.mainaccountid, 1) like ''[0-9]'' and
				ma_master5.mainaccountid not like ''%T'' and
				ma_hier1.ledgerchartofaccounts = ma_master5.ledgerchartofaccounts and
				case when len(ma_hier1.mainaccountid) >= 5 then substring(ma_hier1.mainaccountid, 1, 5) else null end = ma_master5.mainaccountid
			left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','mainaccount ma_master6 on
				left(ma_master6.mainaccountid, 1) like ''[0-9]'' and
				ma_master6.mainaccountid not like ''%T'' and
				ma_hier1.ledgerchartofaccounts = ma_master6.ledgerchartofaccounts and
				case when len(ma_hier1.mainaccountid) >= 6 then substring(ma_hier1.mainaccountid, 1, 6) else null end = ma_master6.mainaccountid
			where left(ma_hier1.mainaccountid, 1) like ''[0-9]''
			and ma_hier1.mainaccountid not like ''%T'') ma20
		) ma2 on
	ma1.mainaccountid = ma2.mainaccountid and
	ma1.ledgerchartofaccounts = ma2.ledgerchartofaccounts')

select 
    ltrim(rtrim(sl1.DATAAREAID)) as DATAAREAID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.INVENTTRANSID)) as INVENTTRANSID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.RECID)) as RECID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.CUSTACCOUNT)) as CUSTACCOUNT,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.CURRENCYCODE)) as CURRENCYCODE,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.CUSTGROUP)) as CUSTGROUP,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.DEFAULTDIMENSION)) as DEFAULTDIMENSION,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TRANSACTIONCODE)) as TRANSACTIONCODE,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.INVENTDIMID)) as INVENTDIMID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.ITEMID)) as ITEMID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.MCSALTITEMNO)) as MCSALTITEMNO,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TPX_RETURNREASONCODEID)) as TPX_RETURNREASONCODEID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS)) as DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SHIPCARRIERPOSTALADDRESS)) as SHIPCARRIERPOSTALADDRESS,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.DLVMODE)) as DLVMODE,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.DLVTERM)) as DLVTERM,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SALESCATEGORY)) as SALESCATEGORY,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.RETURNDISPOSITIONCODEID)) as RETURNDISPOSITIONCODEID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SALESGROUP)) as SALESGROUP,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SALESID)) as SALESID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SHIPCARRIERID)) as SHIPCARRIERID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TAXGROUP)) as TAXGROUP,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TAXITEMGROUP)) as TAXITEMGROUP,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.MCSATHENACATALOG)) as MCSATHENACATALOG,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SALESUNIT)) as SALESUNIT,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.CREATEDBY)) as CREATEDBY,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.LINEDISC)) as LINEDISC,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.LINEPERCENT)) as LINEPERCENT,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.RETURNSTATUS)) as RETURNSTATUS,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SALESSTATUS)) as SALESSTATUS,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SHIPCARRIERDLVTYPE)) as SHIPCARRIERDLVTYPE,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.DELIVERYTYPE)) as DELIVERYTYPE,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.COMPLETE)) as COMPLETE,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.ORDERBLOCKED)) as ORDERBLOCKED,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SCRAP)) as SCRAP,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.STOCKEDPRODUCT)) as STOCKEDPRODUCT,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.CONFIRMEDDLV)), 10) as CONFIRMEDDLV,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.RECEIPTDATECONFIRMED)), 10) as RECEIPTDATECONFIRMED,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SHIPPINGDATECONFIRMED)), 10) as SHIPPINGDATECONFIRMED,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TPX_MANUFACTUREDATE)), 10) as TPX_MANUFACTUREDATE,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TPX_RELATEDORDERDATE)), 10) as TPX_RELATEDORDERDATE,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.RECEIPTDATEREQUESTED)), 10) as RECEIPTDATEREQUESTED,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.RETURNARRIVALDATE)), 10) as RETURNARRIVALDATE,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.RETURNCLOSEDDATE)), 10) as RETURNCLOSEDDATE,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.RETURNDEADLINE)), 10) as RETURNDEADLINE,
     convert(datetime,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.CREATEDDATETIME)), 10) as CREATEDDATETIME,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SHIPPINGDATEREQUESTED)), 10) as SHIPPINGDATEREQUESTED,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.LINENUM)) as LINENUM,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TPX_PRODUCTIONTIME)) as TPX_PRODUCTIONTIME,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TPX_REGISTRYNUMBER)) as TPX_REGISTRYNUMBER,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.INVENTTRANSIDRETURN)) as INVENTTRANSIDRETURN,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.EXPECTEDRETQTY)) as EXPECTEDRETQTY,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.QTYORDERED)) as QTYORDERED,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SALESQTY)) as SALESQTY,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.SALESPRICE)) as SALESPRICE,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.PRICEUNIT)) as PRICEUNIT,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.COSTPRICE)) as COSTPRICE,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.LINEAMOUNT)) as LINEAMOUNT,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.REMAINSALESPHYSICAL)) as REMAINSALESPHYSICAL,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.REMAINSALESFINANCIAL)) as REMAINSALESFINANCIAL,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TPX_KITITEMID)) as TPX_KITITEMID,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.MCSTAGID)) as MCSTAGID,
     convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(sl1.TPXORIGRECEIPTDATECONFIRMED)), 10) as TPXORIGRECEIPTDATECONFIRMED,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.MCSALTSERIALNO)) as MCSALTSERIALNO,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.MULTILNDISC)) as MULTILNDISC,
     ltrim(rtrim(sl1.MULTILNPERCENT)) as MULTILNPERCENT,
    convert(datetime , ltrim(rtrim(sl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ltrim(rtrim(def1.BUSINESS_UNIT)) as DEFAULTDIMENSION_BUSINESS_UNIT,
    convert(datetime ,ltrim(rtrim(def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.SMMCAMPAIGNID)) as SALESTABLE_SMMCAMPAIGNID,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.COMMISSIONGROUP)) as SALESTABLE_COMMISSIONGROUP,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.INVOICEACCOUNT)) as SALESTABLE_INVOICEACCOUNT,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.MARKUPGROUP)) as SALESTABLE_MARKUPGROUP,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.PAYMMODE)) as SALESTABLE_PAYMMODE,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.PAYMENT)) as SALESTABLE_PAYMENT,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.RETURNREASONCODEID)) as SALESTABLE_RETURNREASONCODEID,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.LINEDISC)) as SALESTABLE_LINEDISC,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.SALESORIGINID)) as SALESTABLE_SALESORIGINID,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.SALESPOOLID)) as SALESTABLE_SALESPOOLID,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.PRICEGROUPID)) as SALESTABLE_PRICEGROUPID,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.INVENTSITEID)) as SALESTABLE_INVENTSITEID,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.MODIFIEDBY)) as SALESTABLE_MODIFIEDBY,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.CREATEDBY)) as SALESTABLE_CREATEDBY,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.INVENTLOCATIONID)) as SALESTABLE_INVENTLOCATIONID,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.WORKERSALESRESPONSIBLE)) as SALESTABLE_WORKERSALESRESPONSIBLE,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.WORKERSALESTAKER)) as SALESTABLE_WORKERSALESTAKER,
    convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(st1.DEADLINE)), 10) as SALESTABLE_DEADLINE,
    convert(date, ltrim(rtrim(st1.DELIVERYDATE)), 10) as SALESTABLE_DELIVERYDATE,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.DOCUMENTSTATUS)) as SALESTABLE_DOCUMENTSTATUS,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.RETURNSTATUS)) as SALESTABLE_RETURNSTATUS,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.SALESSTATUS)) as SALESTABLE_SALESSTATUS,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.SALESTYPE)) as SALESTABLE_SALESTYPE,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.ATAGENT)) as SALESTABLE_ATAGENT,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.SHIPCARRIERBLINDSHIPMENT)) as SALESTABLE_SHIPCARRIERBLINDSHIPMENT,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.SHIPCARRIEREXPEDITEDSHIPMENT)) as SALESTABLE_SHIPCARRIEREXPEDITEDSHIPMENT,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.ORDERBLOCKED)) as SALESTABLE_ORDERBLOCKED,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.MCRORDERSTOPPED)) as SALESTABLE_MCRORDERSTOPPED,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.SHIPCARRIERFUELSURCHARGE)) as SALESTABLE_SHIPCARRIERFUELSURCHARGE,
    convert(datetime,  ltrim(rtrim(st1.CREATEDDATETIME)), 10) as SALESTABLE_CREATEDDATETIME,
    convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(st1.RECEIPTDATEREQUESTED)), 10) as SALESTABLE_RECEIPTDATEREQUESTED,
    convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(st1.SHIPPINGDATEREQUESTED)), 10) as SALESTABLE_SHIPPINGDATEREQUESTED,
    convert(date, ltrim(rtrim(st1.RECEIPTDATECONFIRMED)), 10) as SALESTABLE_RECEIPTDATECONFIRMED,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.NDS_SUSALLOWCHG)) as SALESTABLE_NDS_SUSALLOWCHG,
    ltrim(rtrim(st1.SHIPCARRIERRESIDENTIAL)) as SALESTABLE_SHIPCARRIERRESIDENTIAL,
    convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(st1.TPXORIGRECEIPTDATECONFIRMED)), 10) as SALESTABLE_TPXORIGRECEIPTDATECONFIRMED,
     convert(datetime, ltrim(rtrim(st1.MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as SALESTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ltrim(rtrim(id1.CONFIGID)) as INVENTDIM1_CONFIGID,
    convert(datetime, ltrim(rtrim(id1.MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as INVENTDIM1_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ltrim(rtrim(idc1.PDMSTATUS)) as INVENTDIMCOMBINATION_PDMSTATUS,
   convert(datetime, ltrim(rtrim(idc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as INVENTDIMCOMBINATION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ltrim(rtrim(ttp1.PROMOTIONID)) as TAMTRADEPROMOTION_PROMOTIONID,
    convert(datetime, ltrim(rtrim(ttp1.MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as TAMTRADEPROMOTION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ltrim(rtrim(mslds1.DROPSHIPMENT)) as MCRSALESLINEDROPSHIPMENT_DROPSHIPMENT,
    convert(date,ltrim(rtrim(iokey1.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE)), 10) as CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS_FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE,
    ltrim(rtrim(iokey1.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY)) as CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS_FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY,
    ltrim(rtrim(iokey1.SHIPPEDQTY)) as CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS_SHIPPEDQTY,
    convert(datetime, ltrim(rtrim(iokey1.MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    convert(datetime, ltrim(rtrim(sl2.CREATEDDATETIME)), 10) as SALESLINE2_CREATEDDATETIME,
    ltrim(rtrim(sl2.INVENTDIMID)) as SALESLINE2_INVENTDIMID,
    ltrim(rtrim(sl2.SALESID)) as SALESLINE2_SALESID,
    convert(datetime, ltrim(rtrim(sl2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as SALESLINE2_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ltrim(rtrim(id2.TIMEZONE)) as INVENTDIM2_TIMEZONE,
    convert(datetime, ltrim(rtrim(id2.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as INVENTDIM2_INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    convert(datetime, ltrim(rtrim(id2.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME)), 10) as INVENTDIM2_INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ltrim(rtrim(da1.TIMEZONE)) as DATAAREA1_TIMEZONE,
    ltrim(rtrim(tzi1.TIMEBIAS)) as TIMEZONEINFO1_TIMEBIAS,
    ltrim(rtrim(da2.TIMEZONE)) as DATAAREA2_TIMEZONE,
    ltrim(rtrim(tzi2.TIMEBIAS)) as TIMEZONEINFO2_TIMEBIAS,
    ltrim(rtrim(da3.TIMEZONE)) as DATAAREA3_TIMEZONE,
    ltrim(rtrim(tzi3.TIMEBIAS)) as TIMEZONEINFO3_TIMEBIAS,
    ltrim(rtrim(mslpo1.RECID)) as MCRSALESLINEPRICEOVERRIDE1_RECID,
    ltrim(rtrim(mslpo2.REASONCODE)) as MCRSALESLINEPRICEOVERRIDE2_REASONCODE,
    ltrim(rtrim(tport1.DESCRIPTION)) as TPXPRICEOVERRIDEREASONTABLE_DESCRIPTION,
    ltrim(rtrim(tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL)) as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_DOCUMENTSTATUS,
    ltrim(rtrim(tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL)) as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_RETURNSTATUSHEADER,
    ltrim(rtrim(tet3.ENUMVALUELABEL)) as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE3_ENUMVALUELABEL_SALESSTATUSHEADER,
    ltrim(rtrim(tet4.ENUMVALUELABEL)) as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE4_ENUMVALUELABEL_RETURNSTATUSLINE,
    ltrim(rtrim(tet5.ENUMVALUELABEL)) as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE5_ENUMVALUELABEL_SALESSTATUSLINE,
    ltrim(rtrim(tet6.ENUMVALUELABEL)) as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE6_ENUMVALUELABEL_SALESTYPE,
    ltrim(rtrim(tet7.ENUMVALUELABEL)) as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE7_ENUMVALUELABEL_SHIPCARRIERDLVTYPE,
    ltrim(rtrim(tet8.ENUMVALUELABEL)) as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE8_ENUMVALUELABEL_TRADELINEDLVTYPE,
    ltrim(rtrim(rtt1.DISCOUNTORIGINTYPE)) as RETAILTRANSACTIONDISCOUNTTRANS_DISCOUNTORIGINTYPE,
    ltrim(rtrim(tet9.ENUMVALUELABEL)) as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE8_ENUMVALUELABEL_RETAILTRANSACTIONTYPE,
    null as RETAILPERIODICDISCOUNT_NAME,
    null as RETAILPERIODICDISCOUNT_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    null as RETAILTRANSACTIONTABLE_DISCAMOUNT,
    null as RETAILTRANSACTIONTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    null as RETAILDISCOUNTCODE_DISCOUNTCODE,
    null as RETAILPERIODICDISCOUNTLINE_DISCPCT,
    null as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE10_ENUMVALUELABEL_DISCOUNTORIGINTYPE,
    null as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE11_ENUMVALUELABEL_PERIODICDISCOUNTTYPE,
    ps1.name as PDMSTATUS_NAME,
	invs.PRODDATE,
    (
        SELECT
            MAX(LastUpdateDate)
        FROM
            (
                VALUES
                    (sl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
                    (
                        isnull(
                            def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
                            '1950-01-01'
                        )
                    ),
                    (isnull(st1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(id1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
					(ISNULL(invs.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(idc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(ttp1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(iokey1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(sl2.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (
                        isnull(id2.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')
                    ),
                    (
                        isnull(id2.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')
                    )
            ) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate)
    ) AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
dbo.SALESLINE sl1
left join (select distinct sl10.DEFAULTDIMENSION
				, max(
					case when da1.NAME = 'BusinessUnit' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
						else null
						end
					) over (partition by sl10.DEFAULTDIMENSION) as BUSINESS_UNIT
				, max(
					(select max(i) from (values (davsi1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dav1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (desc1.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i))
					) over (partition by sl10.DEFAULTDIMENSION) as DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from (select distinct DEFAULTDIMENSION from dbo.SALESLINE) sl10
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESETITEM davsi1 on
				sl10.DEFAULTDIMENSION = davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE dav1 on
				davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE = dav1.RECID
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da1 on
				dav1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da1.RECID
			left join (select dft1.VALUE, da2.NAME, dft1.DESCRIPTION
							, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
						from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
						left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
							dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
						left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
							dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID) desc1 on
				davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE = desc1.VALUE and
				da1.NAME = desc1.NAME
			) def1 on
	sl1.DEFAULTDIMENSION = def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION
left join dbo.SALESTABLE st1 on
	sl1.DATAAREAID = st1.DATAAREAID and
	sl1.SALESID = st1.SALESID
left join dbo.INVENTDIM id1 on
	sl1.DATAAREAID = id1.DATAAREAID and
	sl1.INVENTDIMID = id1.INVENTDIMID
LEFT JOIN dbo.INVENTSERIAL invs ON sl1.DATAAREAID = invs.DATAAREAID
	AND sl1.ITEMID = invs.ITEMID
	AND id1.INVENTSERIALID = invs.INVENTSERIALID
left join (select idc10.DATAAREAID, idc10.ITEMID, id10.CONFIGID, idc10.PDMSTATUS
			, max(id10.MODIFIEDDATETIME) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dbo.INVENTDIMCOMBINATION idc10
		left join dbo.INVENTDIM id10 on
			idc10.DATAAREAID = id10.DATAAREAID and
			idc10.INVENTDIMID = id10.INVENTDIMID
		group by idc10.DATAAREAID, idc10.ITEMID, id10.CONFIGID, idc10.PDMSTATUS) idc1 on
	sl1.DATAAREAID = idc1.DATAAREAID and
	id1.CONFIGID = idc1.CONFIGID and
	sl1.ITEMID = idc1.ITEMID
left join (select PROMOTIONDESCRIPTION
			, max(PROMOTIONID) as PROMOTIONID
			, max(MODIFIEDDATETIME) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dbo.TAMTRADEPROMOTION
		where isnull(PROMOTIONDESCRIPTION, '') != ''
		group by PROMOTIONDESCRIPTION) ttp1 on
	sl1.MCSATHENACATALOG = ttp1.PROMOTIONDESCRIPTION
left join dbo.MCRSALESLINEDROPSHIPMENT mslds1 on
	sl1.DATAAREAID = mslds1.DATAAREAID and
	sl1.RECID = mslds1.SALESLINE
left join (select distinct cpst1.DATAAREAID, cpst1.INVENTTRANSID
			, min(cpst2.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE) over (partition by cpst1.DATAAREAID, cpst1.INVENTTRANSID) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE
			, sum(case when cpst2.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE = cpst2.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE then cpst1.QTY else 0 end) over (partition by cpst1.DATAAREAID, cpst1.INVENTTRANSID) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY
			, sum(cpst1.QTY) over (partition by cpst1.DATAAREAID, cpst1.INVENTTRANSID) as SHIPPEDQTY
			, max(cpst1.MODIFIEDDATETIME) over (partition by cpst1.DATAAREAID, cpst1.INVENTTRANSID) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dbo.CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS cpst1
		left join (select cpst10.DATAAREAID, cpst10.INVENTTRANSID
					, min(it10.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE
					, max(it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE) as LARGEITEMSHIPDATE
				from dbo.CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS cpst10
				left join (select cpst20.DATAAREAID, cpst20.INVENTTRANSID
								, max(case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then scp20.SHIPDATE else null end) over (partition by cpst20.DATAAREAID, cpst20.INVENTTRANSID) as LARGEITEMSHIPDATE
								, min(case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then scp20.SHIPDATE else null end) over (partition by cpst20.DATAAREAID, cpst20.SALESID) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE
							from dbo.CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS cpst20
							left join dbo.SHIPCARRIERPACKAGE scp20 on
								cpst20.PACKINGSLIPID = scp20.PACKINGSLIPID and
								cpst20.DATAAREAID = scp20.DATAAREAID and
								cpst20.ORIGSALESID = scp20.SALESID
							left join (select it10.DATAAREAID, it10.ITEMID
										, max(case when def10.E_CATEGORY in ('10', '50', '60') then 1 else 0 end) as ISLARGEITEM
									from dbo.INVENTTABLE it10
									left join (select distinct it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION
													, max(
														case when da1.NAME = 'E_Category' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE
															else null
															end
														) over (partition by it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION) as E_CATEGORY
												from (select distinct DEFAULTDIMENSION from dbo.INVENTTABLE) it1
												left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESETITEM davsi1 on
													it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION = davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET
												left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE dav1 on
													davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE = dav1.RECID
												left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da1 on
													dav1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da1.RECID
												) def10 on
										it10.DEFAULTDIMENSION = def10.DEFAULTDIMENSION
									group by it10.DATAAREAID, it10.ITEMID) it20 on
								cpst20.DATAAREAID = it20.DATAAREAID and
								cpst20.ITEMID = it20.ITEMID
							) it10 on
					cpst10.DATAAREAID = it10.DATAAREAID and
					cpst10.INVENTTRANSID = it10.INVENTTRANSID
				where it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE != '1900-01-01'
				group by cpst10.DATAAREAID, cpst10.INVENTTRANSID) cpst2 on
			cpst1.DATAAREAID = cpst2.DATAAREAID and
			cpst1.INVENTTRANSID = cpst2.INVENTTRANSID --and
			--cpst2.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE = cpst2.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE
		) iokey1 on
	sl1.DATAAREAID = iokey1.DATAAREAID and
	sl1.INVENTTRANSID = iokey1.INVENTTRANSID
left join (select distinct DATAAREAID, INVENTTRANSID
			, max(CREATEDDATETIME) over (partition by DATAAREAID, INVENTTRANSID) as CREATEDDATETIME
			, max(INVENTDIMID) over (partition by DATAAREAID, INVENTTRANSID) as INVENTDIMID
			, max(SALESID) over (partition by DATAAREAID, INVENTTRANSID) as SALESID
			, max(MODIFIEDDATETIME) over (partition by DATAAREAID, INVENTTRANSID) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dbo.SALESLINE) sl2 on
	sl1.DATAAREAID = sl2.DATAAREAID and
	sl1.INVENTTRANSIDRETURN = sl2.INVENTTRANSID
left join (select id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID
			, max(is20.TIMEZONE) over (partition by id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID) as TIMEZONE
			, max(id20.MODIFIEDDATETIME) over (partition by id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID) as INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			, max(is20.MODIFIEDDATETIME) over (partition by id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID) as INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dbo.INVENTDIM id20
		left join dbo.INVENTSITE is20 on
			id20.DATAAREAID = is20.DATAAREAID and
			id20.INVENTSITEID = is20.SITEID) id2 on
	sl2.DATAAREAID = id2.DATAAREAID and
	sl2.INVENTDIMID = id2.INVENTDIMID
left join dbo.DATAAREA da1 on
	sl2.DATAAREAID = da1.ID
left join dbo.TIMEZONEINFO tzi1 on
	sl2.CREATEDDATETIME >= tzi1.STARTDATE and
	sl2.CREATEDDATETIME < tzi1.ENDDATE and
	isnull(id2.TIMEZONE, da1.TIMEZONE) = tzi1.TIMEZONEID
left join dbo.DATAAREA da2 on
	st1.DATAAREAID = da2.ID
left join dbo.TIMEZONEINFO tzi2 on
	st1.CREATEDDATETIME >= tzi2.STARTDATE and
	st1.CREATEDDATETIME < tzi2.ENDDATE and
	da2.TIMEZONE = tzi2.TIMEZONEID
left join (select id30.DATAAREAID, id30.INVENTDIMID, max(is30.TIMEZONE) over (partition by id30.DATAAREAID, id30.INVENTDIMID) as TIMEZONE
          from dbo.INVENTDIM id30
          left join dbo.INVENTSITE is30 on
          id30.DATAAREAID = is30.DATAAREAID and
          id30.INVENTSITEID = is30.SITEID) id3 on
    sl1.DATAAREAID = id3.DATAAREAID and
    sl1.INVENTDIMID = id3.INVENTDIMID
left join dbo.DATAAREA da3 on
	sl1.DATAAREAID = da3.ID
left join dbo.TIMEZONEINFO tzi3 on
	sl1.CREATEDDATETIME >= tzi3.STARTDATE and
	sl1.CREATEDDATETIME < tzi3.ENDDATE and
	 isnull(id3.TIMEZONE, da3.TIMEZONE) = tzi3.TIMEZONEID
left join dbo.MCRSALESLINEPRICEOVERRIDE mslpo1 on
	sl1.RECID = mslpo1.SALESLINE
left join dbo.MCRSALESLINEPRICEOVERRIDE mslpo2 on
	mslpo1.RECID = mslpo2.RECID
left join dbo.TPXPRICEOVERRIDEREASONTABLE tport1 on
	mslpo1.DATAAREAID = tport1.DATAAREAID and
	mslpo1.REASONCODE = tport1.SUBCODEID and
	mslpo1.PARTITION = tport1.PARTITION
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'DocumentStatus'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet1 on
	st1.DOCUMENTSTATUS = tet1.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'ReturnStatusHeader'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet2 on
	st1.RETURNSTATUS = tet2.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'SalesStatus'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet3 on
	st1.SALESSTATUS = tet3.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'ReturnStatusLine'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet4 on
	sl1.RETURNSTATUS = tet4.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'SalesStatus'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet5 on
	sl1.SALESSTATUS = tet5.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'SalesType'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet6 on
	st1.SALESTYPE = tet6.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'ShipCarrierDlvType'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet7 on
	sl1.SHIPCARRIERDLVTYPE = tet7.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'TradeLineDlvType'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet8 on
	sl1.DELIVERYTYPE = tet8.ENUMVALUE
left join (select rtt10.DATAAREAID, rtt10.SALESORDERID
			, max(rtdt10.DISCOUNTORIGINTYPE) as DISCOUNTORIGINTYPE
		from dbo.RETAILTRANSACTIONTABLE rtt10
		left join dbo.RETAILTRANSACTIONDISCOUNTTRANS rtdt10 on
			rtt10.DATAAREAID = rtdt10.DATAAREAID and
			rtt10.TERMINAL = rtdt10.TERMINALID and
			rtt10.STORE = rtdt10.STOREID and
			rtt10.TRANSACTIONID = rtdt10.TRANSACTIONID
		group by rtt10.DATAAREAID, rtt10.SALESORDERID) rtt1 on
	sl1.DATAAREAID = rtt1.DATAAREAID and
	sl1.SALESID = rtt1.SALESORDERID
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'RetailTransactionType'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet9 on
	rtt1.DISCOUNTORIGINTYPE = tet9.ENUMVALUE
    left join dbo.PDMSTATUS ps1 on
	idc1.PDMSTATUS = ps1.RECID
    where 
(SELECT MAX(LastUpdateDate) FROM ( VALUES
                    (sl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
    				(isnull(def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,'1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(st1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(id1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),

    (
        SELECT
            MAX(lastupdatedate)
        FROM
            (
                VALUES
                    (sl1.modifieddatetime),
                    (
                        ISNULL(
                            def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
                            '1950-01-01'
                        )
                    ),
                    (ISNULL(st1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
                    (ISNULL(id1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
					(ISNULL(invs.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
                    (ISNULL(idc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (ISNULL(ttp1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (ISNULL(iokey1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (ISNULL(sl2.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (
                        ISNULL(id2.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')
                    ),
                    (
                        ISNULL(id2.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')
                    ),
					(
                        ISNULL(rtst1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')
                    ),
					(
                        ISNULL(rtt2.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')
                    )
            ) AS updatedate(lastupdatedate)
    ) AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
FROM
dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.salesline sl1
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT sl10.defaultdimension
				, MAX(
					CASE WHEN da1.name = 'BusinessUnit' THEN davsi1.displayvalue
						ELSE NULL
						END
					) OVER (PARTITION BY sl10.defaultdimension) AS BUSINESS_UNIT
				, MAX(
					(SELECT MAX(i) FROM (VALUES (davsi1.modifieddatetime), (dav1.modifieddatetime), (da1.modifieddatetime), (desc1.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS t(i))
					) OVER (PARTITION BY sl10.defaultdimension) AS DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			FROM (SELECT DISTINCT defaultdimension FROM dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.salesline) sl10
			LEFT JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributevaluesetitem davsi1 ON
				sl10.defaultdimension = davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
			LEFT JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributevalue dav1 ON
				davsi1.dimensionattributevalue = dav1.recid
			LEFT JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da1 ON
				dav1.dimensionattribute = da1.recid
			LEFT JOIN (SELECT dft1.value, da2.name, dft1.description
							, (SELECT MAX(i) FROM (VALUES (dft1.modifieddatetime), (dadc1.modifieddatetime), (da2.modifieddatetime)) AS t(i)) AS DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
						FROM dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft1
						LEFT JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc1 ON
							dft1.financialtagcategory = dadc1.dircategory
						LEFT JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da2 ON
							dadc1.dimensionattribute = da2.recid) desc1 ON
				davsi1.displayvalue = desc1.value AND
				da1.name = desc1.name
			) def1 ON
	sl1.defaultdimension = def1.defaultdimension
LEFT JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.salestable st1 ON
	sl1.dataareaid = st1.dataareaid AND
	sl1.salesid = st1.salesid
LEFT JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventdim id1 ON
	sl1.dataareaid = id1.dataareaid AND
	sl1.inventdimid = id1.inventdimid
LEFT JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventserial invs ON sl1.dataareaid = invs.dataareaid
	AND sl1.itemid = invs.itemid
	AND id1.inventserialid = invs.inventserialid
LEFT JOIN (SELECT idp10.dataareaid, idp10.configid, idp10.itemid, idp10.productlifecyclestateid
			, MAX(GREATEST(idc10.modifieddatetime, id10.modifieddatetime, idp10.modifieddatetime)) AS MODIFIEDDATETIME
		FROM dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventdimcombination idc10
		INNER JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventdim id10 ON
			idc10.dataareaid = id10.dataareaid AND
			idc10.inventdimid = id10.inventdimid
		INNER JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventdistinctproduct idp10 ON
			id10.dataareaid = idp10.dataareaid AND
			id10.configid = idp10.configid
		GROUP BY idp10.dataareaid, idp10.configid, idp10.itemid, idp10.productlifecyclestateid) idc1 ON
	sl1.dataareaid = idc1.dataareaid AND
	id1.configid = idc1.configid AND
	sl1.itemid = idc1.itemid
LEFT JOIN (SELECT promotiondescription
			, MAX(promotionid) AS promotionid
			, MAX(modifieddatetime) AS MODIFIEDDATETIME
		FROM dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.tamtradepromotion
		WHERE ISNULL(promotiondescription, '') != ''
		GROUP BY promotiondescription) ttp1 ON
	sl1.mcsathenacatalog = ttp1.promotiondescription
LEFT JOIN dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.mcrsaleslinedropshipment mslds1 ON
	sl1.dataareaid = mslds1.dataareaid AND
	sl1.recid = mslds1.salesline
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT cpst1.dataareaid, cpst1.inventtransid
			, MIN(cpst2.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE) OVER (PARTITION BY cpst1.dataareaid, cpst1.inventtransid) AS FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE
			, SUM(CASE WHEN cpst2.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE = cpst2.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE THEN cpst1.qty ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY cpst1.dataareaid, cpst1.inventtransid) AS FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY
			, SUM(cpst1.qty) OVER (PARTITION BY cpst1.dataareaid, cpst1.inventtransid) AS SHIPPEDQTY
			, MAX(cpst1.modifieddatetime) OVER (PARTITION BY cpst1.dataareaid, cpst1.inventtransid) AS MODIFIEDDATETIME
		FROM dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.custpackingsliptrans cpst1
		LEFT JOIN (SELECT cpst10.dataareaid, cpst10.inventtransid
					, MIN(it10.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE) AS FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE
					, MAX(it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE) AS LARGEITEMSHIPDATE
				FROM dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.custpackingsliptrans cpst10
				LEFT JOIN (SELECT cpst20.dataareaid, cpst20.inventtransid
								, MAX(CASE WHEN it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 THEN scp20.deliverydate ELSE NULL END) OVER (PARTITION BY cpst20.dataareaid, cpst20.inventtransid) AS LARGEITEMSHIPDATE
								, MIN(CASE WHEN it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 THEN scp20.deliverydate ELSE NULL END) OVER (PARTITION BY cpst20.dataareaid, cpst20.salesid) AS FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE
							FROM dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.custpackingsliptrans cpst20
							LEFT JOIN (SELECT cpsj1.salesid, cpsj1.packingslipid, cpsj1.dataareaid, cpsj1.deliverydate
									from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.custpackingslipjour cpsj1
									inner join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.tmscarrierservice tcs1 on
										cpsj1.dataareaid = tcs1.dataareaid and
										cpsj1.dlvmode = tcs1.dlvmodeid) scp20 on
								cpst20.packingslipid = scp20.packingslipid and
								cpst20.dataareaid = scp20.dataareaid and
								cpst20.origsalesid = scp20.salesid
							left join (select it10.dataareaid, it10.itemid
										, max(case when def10.E_CATEGORY in ('10', '50', '60') then 1 else 0 end) as ISLARGEITEM
									from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventtable it10
									left join (select distinct it1.defaultdimension
													, max(
														case when da1.name = 'E_Category' then davsi1.displayvalue
															else null
															end
														) over (partition by it1.defaultdimension) as E_CATEGORY
												from (select distinct defaultdimension from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventtable) it1
												left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributevaluesetitem davsi1 on
													it1.defaultdimension = davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
												left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributevalue dav1 on
													davsi1.dimensionattributevalue = dav1.recid
												left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da1 on
													dav1.dimensionattribute = da1.recid
												) def10 on
										it10.defaultdimension = def10.defaultdimension
									group by it10.dataareaid, it10.itemid) it20 on
								cpst20.dataareaid = it20.dataareaid and
								cpst20.itemid = it20.itemid
							) it10 on
					cpst10.dataareaid = it10.dataareaid and
					cpst10.inventtransid = it10.inventtransid
				where it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE != '1900-01-01'
				group by cpst10.dataareaid, cpst10.inventtransid) cpst2 on
			cpst1.dataareaid = cpst2.dataareaid and
			cpst1.inventtransid = cpst2.inventtransid --and
			--cpst2.firstlargeitemshipdate = cpst2.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE
		) iokey1 on
	sl1.dataareaid = iokey1.dataareaid and
	sl1.inventtransid = iokey1.inventtransid
left join (select distinct dataareaid, inventtransid
			, max(createddatetime) over (partition by dataareaid, inventtransid) as CREATEDDATETIME
			, max(inventdimid) over (partition by dataareaid, inventtransid) as INVENTDIMID
			, max(salesid) over (partition by dataareaid, inventtransid) as SALESID
			, max(modifieddatetime) over (partition by dataareaid, inventtransid) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.salesline) sl2 on
	sl1.dataareaid = sl2.dataareaid and
	sl1.inventtransidreturn = sl2.inventtransid
left join (select id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid
			, max(is20.timezone) over (partition by id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid) as TIMEZONE
			, max(id20.modifieddatetime) over (partition by id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid) as INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			, max(is20.modifieddatetime) over (partition by id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid) as INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventdim id20
		left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventsite is20 on
			id20.dataareaid = is20.dataareaid and
			id20.inventsiteid = is20.siteid) id2 on
	sl2.dataareaid = id2.dataareaid and
	sl2.INVENTDIMID = id2.inventdimid
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dataarea da1 on
	sl2.dataareaid = da1.Id
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timezoneinfo tzi1 on
	sl2.CREATEDDATETIME >= tzi1.startdate and
	sl2.CREATEDDATETIME < tzi1.enddate and
	isnull(id2.TIMEZONE, da1.timezone) = tzi1.timezoneid
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dataarea da2 on
	st1.dataareaid = da2.Id
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timezoneinfo tzi2 on
	st1.createddatetime >= tzi2.startdate and
	st1.createddatetime < tzi2.enddate and
	da2.timezone = tzi2.timezoneid
left join (select id30.dataareaid, id30.inventdimid, max(is30.timezone) over (partition by id30.dataareaid, id30.inventdimid) as timezone
          from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventdim id30
          left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventsite is30 on
                id30.dataareaid = is30.dataareaid and
                id30.inventsiteid = is30.siteid) id3 on
    sl1.dataareaid = id3.dataareaid and
    sl1.inventdimid = id3.inventdimid
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dataarea da3 on
	sl1.dataareaid = da3.Id
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timezoneinfo tzi3 on
	sl1.createddatetime >= tzi3.startdate and
	sl1.createddatetime < tzi3.enddate and
	isnull(id3.timezone, da3.timezone) = tzi3.timezoneid
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.mcrsaleslinepriceoverride mslpo1 on
	sl1.recid = mslpo1.salesline
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.mcrsaleslinepriceoverride mslpo2 on
	mslpo1.recid = mslpo2.recid
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.tpxpriceoverridereasontable tport1 on
	mslpo1.dataareaid = tport1.dataareaid and
	mslpo1.reasoncode = tport1.subcodeid and
	mslpo1.partition = tport1.partition
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'DocumentStatus'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet1 on
	st1.documentstatus = tet1.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'ReturnStatusHeader'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet2 on
	st1.returnstatus = tet2.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'SalesStatus'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet3 on
	st1.salesstatus = tet3.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'ReturnStatusLine'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet4 on
	sl1.returnstatus = tet4.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'SalesStatus'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet5 on
	sl1.salesstatus = tet5.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'SalesType'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet6 on
	st1.salestype = tet6.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'ShipCarrierDlvType'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet7 on
	sl1.shipcarrierdlvtype = tet7.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'TradeLineDlvType'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet8 on
	sl1.deliverytype = tet8.enumvalue
left join (select rtt10.dataareaid, rtt10.salesorderid
			, max(rtdt10.discountorigintype) as DISCOUNTORIGINTYPE
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.retailtransactiontable rtt10
		left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.retailtransactiondiscounttrans rtdt10 on
			rtt10.dataareaid = rtdt10.dataareaid and
			rtt10.terminal = rtdt10.terminalid and
			rtt10.store = rtdt10.storeid and
			rtt10.transactionid = rtdt10.transactionid
		group by rtt10.dataareaid, rtt10.salesorderid) rtt1 on
	sl1.dataareaid = rtt1.dataareaid and
	sl1.salesid = rtt1.salesorderid
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'RetailTransactionType'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet9 on
	rtt1.DISCOUNTORIGINTYPE = tet9.enumvalue
left join (select dataareaid, salesorderid, transactionid, discamount, modifieddatetime
			, row_number() over (partition by dataareaid, salesorderid order by receiptid desc, transactionid desc) as ROW_NUM
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.retailtransactiontable
		where entrystatus = 2) rtt2 on
	rtt2.ROW_NUM = 1 and
	sl1.dataareaid = rtt2.dataareaid and
	sl1.salesid = rtt2.salesorderid
left join (select rtst10.dataareaid, rtst10.transactionid, rtst10.linenum, rtst10.itemid
				, row_number() over (partition by rtst10.dataareaid, rtst10.transactionid, rtst10.linenum, rtst10.itemid order by rtst10.terminalid) as ROW_NUM2
				, rtdt10.periodicdiscountofferid, rtdt10.discountorigintype
				, rpd10.periodicdiscounttype, rpd10.name, rpd10.modifieddatetime
				, rdc10.discountcode
				, rpdl10.discountpercentorvalue
			from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.retailtransactionsalestrans rtst10
			left join (select rtdt20.dataareaid, rtdt20.transactionid, rtdt20.terminalid, rtdt20.salelinenum, rtdt20.storeid, rtdt20.periodicdiscountofferid, rtdt20.discountorigintype
						from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.retailtransactiondiscounttrans as rtdt20
						inner join (select recid
										, row_number() over (partition by dataareaid, transactionid,  terminalid, salelinenum, storeid order by linenum) as ROW_NUM
									from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.retailtransactiondiscounttrans) rtdt21 on
							rtdt21.ROW_NUM = 1 and
							rtdt20.recid = rtdt21.recid) rtdt10 on
				rtst10.dataareaid = rtdt10.dataareaid and
				rtst10.transactionid = rtdt10.transactionid and
				rtst10.terminalid = rtdt10.terminalid and
				rtst10.linenum = rtdt10.salelinenum and
				rtst10.store = rtdt10.storeid
			left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.retailperiodicdiscount rpd10 on
				rtdt10.dataareaid = rpd10.dataareaid and
				rtdt10.periodicdiscountofferid = rpd10.offerid
			left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.retaildiscountcode rdc10 on
				rpd10.dataareaid = rdc10.dataareaid and
				rpd10.discountcode = rdc10.recid
			left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.retailperiodicdiscountline rpdl10 on
				rtdt10.dataareaid = rpdl10.dataareaid and
				rtdt10.periodicdiscountofferid = rpdl10.offerid and
				rtdt10.salelinenum = rpdl10.linenum
			) rtst1 on
	rtst1.ROW_NUM2 = 1 and
	sl1.dataareaid = rtst1.dataareaid and
	rtt2.transactionid = rtst1.transactionid and
	sl1.linenum = rtst1.linenum and
	sl1.itemid = rtst1.itemid
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'RetailDiscountOriginType'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet10 on
	rtst1.discountorigintype = tet10.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'RetailDiscountOfferTypeBase'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet11 on
	rtst1.periodicdiscounttype = tet11.enumvalue
where 
isnull(sl1.inventtransid , '') != ''
and isnull(sl1.dataareaid, '') != ''
and (SELECT MAX(LastUpdateDate) FROM ( VALUES
                    (sl1.modifieddatetime),
    				(isnull(def1.DEFAULTDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,'1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(st1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(id1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
					(isnull(invs.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(idc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(ttp1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(iokey1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(sl2.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(id2.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull(id2.INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
					(isnull(rtst1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
					(isnull(rtt2.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01'))) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate))
> '@{variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp')}'

select st1.DATAAREAID, st1.SALESID, st1.CUSTOMERREF, st1.PURCHORDERFORMNUM, st1.SALESTYPE, st1.RETURNITEMNUM, st1.RETURNREPLACEMENTCREATED, st1.SALESPOOLID, st1.PLANNUMBER as PLANNUMBER, st1.RETURNREPLACEMENTID, st1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, mhct1.MCRHOLDCODE, sl1.LARGEITEMORDEREDQTY as SALESLINE_LARGEITEMORDEREDQTY, sl1.TOTALLARGEITEMVOLUME as SALESLINE_TOTALLARGEITEMVOLUME, sl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as SALESLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, iokey1.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY as CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS_FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY ,iokey1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS_MODIFIEDDATETIME ,(SELECT MAX(LastUpdateDate) FROM (VALUES (st1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (isnull(sl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')), (isnull(iokey1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'))) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate)) AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME from dbo.SALESTABLE st1 left join (select DATAAREAID, INVENTREFID, MCRHOLDCODE                 , row_number() over (partition by DATAAREAID, INVENTREFID order by MCRHOLDDATETIME desc) as ROW_NUM             from dbo.MCRHOLDCODETRANS             where MCRCLEARED = 0) mhct1 on     mhct1.ROW_NUM = 1 and     st1.DATAAREAID = mhct1.DATAAREAID and     st1.SALESID = mhct1.INVENTREFID left join (select sl20.DATAAREAID, sl20.SALESID, max(sl20.MODIFIEDDATETIME) as MODIFIEDDATETIME             , sum(case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then sl20.SALESQTY else 0 end) as LARGEITEMORDEREDQTY             , sum(sl20.SALESQTY * (case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then it20.UNITVOLUME else 0 end)) as TOTALLARGEITEMVOLUME         from dbo.SALESLINE sl20         left join (select it10.DATAAREAID, it10.ITEMID, it10.UNITVOLUME                     , max(case when def10.E_CATEGORY in ('10', '50', '60') then 1 else 0 end) as ISLARGEITEM                 from dbo.INVENTTABLE it10                 left join (select distinct it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION                                 , max(                                     case when da1.NAME = 'E_Category' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE                                         else null                                         end                                     ) over (partition by it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION) as E_CATEGORY                             from (select distinct DEFAULTDIMENSION from dbo.INVENTTABLE) it1                             left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESETITEM davsi1 on                                 it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION = davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET                             left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE dav1 on                                 davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE = dav1.RECID                             left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da1 on                                 dav1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da1.RECID                             ) def10 on                     it10.DEFAULTDIMENSION = def10.DEFAULTDIMENSION                 group by it10.DATAAREAID, it10.ITEMID, it10.UNITVOLUME) it20 on             sl20.DATAAREAID = it20.DATAAREAID and             sl20.ITEMID = it20.ITEMID         group by sl20.DATAAREAID, sl20.SALESID) sl1 on     st1.DATAAREAID = sl1.DATAAREAID and     st1.SALESID = sl1.SALESID left join (select cpst1.DATAAREAID, cpst1.SALESID , max(cpst1.MODIFIEDDATETIME) as MODIFIEDDATETIME             , sum(cpst1.QTY) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY         from dbo.CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS cpst1         left join (select cpst10.DATAAREAID, cpst10.SALESID                     , min(it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE                     , max(it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE) as LARGEITEMSHIPDATE                 from dbo.CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS cpst10                 left join (select cpst20.DATAAREAID, cpst20.ORIGSALESID                                 , max(case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then scp20.SHIPDATE else '1900-01-01' end) as LARGEITEMSHIPDATE                             from dbo.CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS cpst20                             left join dbo.SHIPCARRIERPACKAGE scp20 on                                 cpst20.PACKINGSLIPID = scp20.PACKINGSLIPID and                                 cpst20.DATAAREAID = scp20.DATAAREAID and                                 cpst20.ORIGSALESID = scp20.SALESID                             left join (select it10.DATAAREAID, it10.ITEMID                                         , max(case when def10.E_CATEGORY in ('10', '50', '60') then 1 else 0 end) as ISLARGEITEM                                     from dbo.INVENTTABLE it10                                     left join (select distinct it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION                                                     , max(                                                         case when da1.NAME = 'E_Category' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE                                                             else null                                                             end                                                         ) over (partition by it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION) as E_CATEGORY                                                 from (select distinct DEFAULTDIMENSION from dbo.INVENTTABLE) it1                                                 left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESETITEM davsi1 on                                                     it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION = davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET                                                 left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE dav1 on                                                     davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE = dav1.RECID                                                 left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da1 on                                                     dav1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da1.RECID                                                 ) def10 on                                         it10.DEFAULTDIMENSION = def10.DEFAULTDIMENSION                                     group by it10.DATAAREAID, it10.ITEMID) it20 on                                 cpst20.DATAAREAID = it20.DATAAREAID and                                 cpst20.ITEMID = it20.ITEMID                             group by cpst20.DATAAREAID, cpst20.ORIGSALESID) it10 on                     cpst10.DATAAREAID = it10.DATAAREAID and                     cpst10.SALESID = it10.ORIGSALESID                 where it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE != '1900-01-01'                 group by cpst10.DATAAREAID, cpst10.SALESID) cpst2 on             cpst1.DATAAREAID = cpst2.DATAAREAID and             cpst1.SALESID = cpst2.SALESID and             cpst2.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE = cpst2.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE         group by cpst1.DATAAREAID, cpst1.SALESID) iokey1 on     st1.DATAAREAID = iokey1.DATAAREAID and     st1.SALESID = iokey1.SALESID where st1.SALESID is not null

select st1.DATAAREAID, st1.SALESID, st1.CUSTOMERREF, st1.PURCHORDERFORMNUM, st1.SALESTYPE, st1.RETURNITEMNUM, st1.RETURNREPLACEMENTCREATED, st1.SALESPOOLID, null as PLANNUMBER, ,(SELECT MAX(LastUpdateDate) FROM (VALUES (st1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (isnull(sl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')), (isnull(iokey1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'))) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate)) AS MCRHOLDDATETIME desc) as ROW_NUM             from dbo.MCRHOLDCODETRANS             where MCRCLEARED = 0) mhct1 on     mhct1.ROW_NUM = 1 and     st1.DATAAREAID = mhct1.DATAAREAID and     st1.SALESID = mhct1.INVENTREFID left join (select sl20.DATAAREAID, sl20.SALESID, max(sl20.MODIFIEDDATETIME) as MODIFIEDDATETIME             , sum(case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then sl20.SALESQTY else 0 end) as LARGEITEMORDEREDQTY             , sum(sl20.SALESQTY * (case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then it20.UNITVOLUME else 0 end)) as TOTALLARGEITEMVOLUME         from dbo.SALESLINE sl20         left join (select it10.DATAAREAID, it10.ITEMID, it10.UNITVOLUME                     , max(case when def10.E_CATEGORY in ('10', '50', '60') then 1 else 0 end) as ISLARGEITEM                 from dbo.INVENTTABLE it10                 left join (select distinct it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION                                 , max(                                     case when da1.NAME = 'E_Category' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE                                         else null                                         end                                     ) over (partition by it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION) as E_CATEGORY                             from (select distinct DEFAULTDIMENSION from dbo.INVENTTABLE) it1                             left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESETITEM davsi1 on                                 it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION = davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET                             left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE dav1 on                                 davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE = dav1.RECID                             left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da1 on                                 dav1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da1.RECID                             ) def10 on                     it10.DEFAULTDIMENSION = def10.DEFAULTDIMENSION                 group by it10.DATAAREAID, it10.ITEMID, it10.UNITVOLUME) it20 on             sl20.DATAAREAID = it20.DATAAREAID and             sl20.ITEMID = it20.ITEMID         group by sl20.DATAAREAID, sl20.SALESID) sl1 on     st1.DATAAREAID = sl1.DATAAREAID and     st1.SALESID = sl1.SALESID left join (select cpst1.DATAAREAID, cpst1.SALESID , max(cpst1.MODIFIEDDATETIME) as MODIFIEDDATETIME             , sum(cpst1.QTY) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY         from dbo.CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS cpst1         left join (select cpst10.DATAAREAID, cpst10.SALESID                     , min(it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE                     , max(it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE) as LARGEITEMSHIPDATE                 from dbo.CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS cpst10                 left join (select cpst20.DATAAREAID, cpst20.ORIGSALESID                                 , max(case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then scp20.SHIPDATE else '1900-01-01' end) as LARGEITEMSHIPDATE                             from dbo.CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS cpst20                             left join dbo.SHIPCARRIERPACKAGE scp20 on                                 cpst20.PACKINGSLIPID = scp20.PACKINGSLIPID and                                 cpst20.DATAAREAID = scp20.DATAAREAID and                                 cpst20.ORIGSALESID = scp20.SALESID                             left join (select it10.DATAAREAID, it10.ITEMID                                         , max(case when def10.E_CATEGORY in ('10', '50', '60') then 1 else 0 end) as ISLARGEITEM                                     from dbo.INVENTTABLE it10                                     left join (select distinct it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION                                                     , max(                                                         case when da1.NAME = 'E_Category' then davsi1.DISPLAYVALUE                                                             else null                                                             end                                                         ) over (partition by it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION) as E_CATEGORY                                                 from (select distinct DEFAULTDIMENSION from dbo.INVENTTABLE) it1                                                 left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESETITEM davsi1 on                                                     it1.DEFAULTDIMENSION = davsi1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET                                                 left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE                                            dav1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da1.RECID                                                 ) def10 on                                         it10.DEFAULTDIMENSION   cpst10.SALESID = it10.ORIGSALESID                 where it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE != '1900-01-01'                 group by cpst10.DATAAREAID, cpst10.SALESID) cpst2 on             cpst1.DATAAREAID = st1.DATAAREAID = iokey1.DATAAREAID and     st1.SALESID = iokey1.SALESID where st1.SALESID is not null

@concat('select
st1.dataareaid as DATAAREAID
, st1.salesid as SALESID
, st1.customerref as CUSTOMERREF
, st1.purchorderformnum as PURCHORDERFORMNUM
, st1.salestype as SALESTYPE
, st1.returnitemnum as RETURNITEMNUM
, st1.returnreplacementcreated as RETURNREPLACEMENTCREATED
, st1.salespoolid as SALESPOOLID
, st1.plannumber as PLANNUMBER
, st1.returnreplacementid as RETURNREPLACEMENTID
, st1.modifieddatetime as MODIFIEDDATETIME
, mhct1.mcrholdcode as MCRHOLDCODE
, sl1.LARGEITEMORDEREDQTY as SALESLINE_LARGEITEMORDEREDQTY
, sl1.TOTALLARGEITEMVOLUME as SALESLINE_TOTALLARGEITEMVOLUME
, sl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as SALESLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME
, iokey1.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY as CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS_FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY
,iokey1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as CUSTPACKINGSLIPTRANS_MODIFIEDDATETIME
,(select max(lastupdatedate)
from (values (st1.modifieddatetime),
(isnull(sl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, ''1950-01-01'')),
(isnull(iokey1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, ''1950-01-01''))) as updatedate(lastupdatedate)) as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','salestable st1
left join (select dataareaid, inventrefid, mcrholdcode
				, row_number() over (partition by dataareaid, inventrefid order by mcrholddatetime desc) as ROW_NUM
			from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','mcrholdcodetrans
			where mcrcleared = 0) mhct1 on
	mhct1.ROW_NUM = 1 and
	st1.dataareaid = mhct1.dataareaid and
	st1.salesid = mhct1.inventrefid
left join (select sl20.dataareaid, sl20.salesid, max(sl20.modifieddatetime) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
			, sum(case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then sl20.salesqty else 0 end) as LARGEITEMORDEREDQTY
			, sum(sl20.salesqty * (case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then it20.unitvolume else 0 end)) as TOTALLARGEITEMVOLUME
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','salesline sl20
		left join (select it10.dataareaid, it10.itemid, it10.unitvolume
					, max(case when def10.E_CATEGORY in (''10'', ''50'', ''60'') then 1 else 0 end) as ISLARGEITEM
				from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','inventtable it10
				left join (select distinct it1.defaultdimension
								, max(
									case when da1.name = ''E_category'' then davsi1.displayvalue
										else null
										end
									) over (partition by it1.defaultdimension) as E_CATEGORY
							from (select distinct defaultdimension from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','inventtable) it1
							left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','dimensionattributevaluesetitem davsi1 on
								it1.defaultdimension = davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
							left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','dimensionattributevalue dav1 on
								davsi1.dimensionattributevalue = dav1.recid
							left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','dimensionattribute da1 on
								dav1.dimensionattribute = da1.recid
							) def10 on
					it10.defaultdimension = def10.defaultdimension
				group by it10.dataareaid, it10.itemid, it10.unitvolume) it20 on
			sl20.dataareaid = it20.dataareaid and
			sl20.itemid = it20.itemid
		group by sl20.dataareaid, sl20.salesid) sl1 on
	st1.dataareaid = sl1.dataareaid and
	st1.salesid = sl1.salesid
left join (select cpst1.dataareaid, cpst1.salesid, max(cpst1.modifieddatetime) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
			, sum(cpst1.qty) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPPEDQTY
		from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','custpackingsliptrans cpst1
		left join (select cpst10.dataareaid, cpst10.salesid
					, min(it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE) as FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE
					, max(it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE) as LARGEITEMSHIPDATE
				from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','custpackingsliptrans cpst10
				left join (select cpst20.dataareaid, cpst20.origsalesid
								, max(case when it20.ISLARGEITEM = 1 then scp20.deliverydate else ''1900-01-01'' end) as LARGEITEMSHIPDATE
							from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','custpackingsliptrans cpst20
							left join (select cpsj1.salesid, cpsj1.packingslipid, cpsj1.dataareaid, cpsj1.deliverydate
									from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','custpackingslipjour cpsj1
									inner join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','tmscarrierservice tcs1 on
										cpsj1.dataareaid = tcs1.dataareaid and
										cpsj1.dlvmode = tcs1.dlvmodeid) scp20 on
								cpst20.packingslipid = scp20.packingslipid and
								cpst20.dataareaid = scp20.dataareaid and
								cpst20.origsalesid = scp20.salesid
							left join (select it10.dataareaid, it10.itemid
										, max(case when def10.E_CATEGORY in (''10'', ''50'', ''60'') then 1 else 0 end) as ISLARGEITEM
									from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','inventtable it10
									left join (select distinct it1.defaultdimension
													, max(
														case when da1.name = ''E_category'' then davsi1.displayvalue
															else null
															end
														) over (partition by it1.defaultdimension) as E_CATEGORY
												from (select distinct defaultdimension from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','inventtable) it1
												left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','dimensionattributevaluesetitem davsi1 on
													it1.defaultdimension = davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
												left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','dimensionattributevalue dav1 on
													davsi1.dimensionattributevalue = dav1.recid
												left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','dimensionattribute da1 on
													dav1.dimensionattribute = da1.recid
												) def10 on
										it10.defaultdimension = def10.defaultdimension
									group by it10.dataareaid, it10.itemid) it20 on
								cpst20.dataareaid = it20.dataareaid and
								cpst20.itemid = it20.itemid
							group by cpst20.dataareaid, cpst20.origsalesid) it10 on
					cpst10.dataareaid = it10.dataareaid and
					cpst10.salesid = it10.origsalesid
				where it10.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE != ''1900-01-01''
				group by cpst10.dataareaid, cpst10.salesid) cpst2 on
			cpst1.dataareaid = cpst2.dataareaid and
			cpst1.salesid = cpst2.salesid and
			cpst2.FIRSTLARGEITEMSHIPDATE = cpst2.LARGEITEMSHIPDATE
		group by cpst1.dataareaid, cpst1.salesid) iokey1 on
	st1.dataareaid = iokey1.dataareaid and
	st1.salesid = iokey1.salesid where st1.salesid is not null')

SELECT
ttp1.dataareaid as DATAAREAID
,ttp1.promotionid as PROMOTIONID
,ttp1.promotiondescription as PROMOTIONDESCRIPTION
,ttp1.activity as ACTIVITY
,ttp1.currency as CURRENCY
,ttp1.hcmworkerid as HCMWORKERID
,ttp1.ordersenddate as ORDERSENDDATE
,ttp1.ordersstartdate as ORDERSSTARTDATE
,ttp1.promotionstatus as PROMOTIONSTATUS
,ttp1.tpxdealtype as TPXDEALTYPE
,ttp1.unitid as UNITID
,ttp1.tpxdealid as TPXDEALID
,ttp1.mcstamdealstatus as MCSTAMDEALSTATUS
,ttp1.modifieddatetime as MODIFIEDDATETIME
,c1.txt as CURRENCY_TXT
,c1.modifieddatetime as CURRENCY_MODIFIEDDATETIME
,hw1.person as HCMWORKER_PERSON
,hw1.modifieddatetime as HCMWORKER_MODIFIEDDATETIME
,dpt1.name as DIRPARTYTABLE_NAME
,dpt1.modifieddatetime as DIRPARTYTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME
,uom1.symbol as UNITOFMEASURE_SYMBOL
,uom1.modifieddatetime as UNITOFMEASURE_MODIFIEDDATETIME
,uomt1.description as UNITOFMEASURETRANSLATION_DESCRIPTION
,uomt1.modifieddatetime as UNITOFMEASURETRANSLATION_MODIFIEDDATETIME
,tet1.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_PROMOTIONSTATUS
,tet2.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_TPXDEALTYPE
,tet3.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE3_ENUMVALUELABEL_TPXDEALTYPE
,(SELECT MAX(LastUpdateDate)
FROM ( 				VALUES
        (ttp1.modifieddatetime),
        ( isnull( c1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' )),
        ( isnull( hw1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' )),
        ( isnull( dpt1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' )),
		( isnull( uom1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' )),
        ( isnull( uomt1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' ))) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate)
) AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME 
FROM
dbo.TAMTRADEPROMOTION ttp1
left join dbo.CURRENCY c1 on
	ttp1.CURRENCY = c1.CURRENCYCODE
left join dbo.HCMWORKER hw1 on
	ttp1.HCMWORKERID = hw1.RECID
left join dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE dpt1 on
	hw1.PERSON = dpt1.RECID
left join dbo.UNITOFMEASURE uom1 on
	ttp1.UNITID = uom1.SYMBOL
left join dbo.UNITOFMEASURETRANSLATION uomt1 on
	uomt1.LANGUAGEID = 'en-us' and
	uom1.RECID = uomt1.UNITOFMEASURE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'TAMStatus'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet1 on
	ttp1.PROMOTIONSTATUS = tet1.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'TpxCmSubsidiesDiscountType'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet2 on
	ttp1.TPXDEALTYPE = tet2.ENUMVALUE
left join (select ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE
			, max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
		where ENUMNAME = 'TpxCmSubsidyHeaderDealType'
		group by ENUMNAME, ENUMVALUE) tet3 on
	ttp1.TPXDEALTYPE = tet3.ENUMVALUE

d1.dealid as DEALID

,d1.lasteditdate as LASTEDITDATE

SELECT
ttp1.dataareaid as dataareaid

,ttp1.activity as activity

,ttp1.ordersenddate as ordersenddate
,ttp1.ordersstartdate as ordersstartdate
