,ttp1.unitid as unitid
,ttp1.tpxdealid as tpxdealid
,ttp1.mcstamdealstatus as mcstamdealstatus
,ttp1.modifieddatetime as modifieddatetime
,c1.txt as currency_txt
,c1.modifieddatetime as currency_modifieddatetime
,hw1.person as hcmworker_person
,hw1.modifieddatetime as hcmworker_modifieddatetime
,dpt1.name as dirpartytable_name
,dpt1.modifieddatetime as dirpartytable_modifieddatetime
,uom1.symbol as unitofmeasure_symbol
,uom1.modifieddatetime as unitofmeasure_modifieddatetime
,uomt1.description as unitofmeasuretranslation_description
,uomt1.modifieddatetime as unitofmeasuretranslation_modifieddatetime
,tet1.enumvaluelabel as timextenderenumtable1_enumvaluelabel_promotionstatus
,tet2.enumvaluelabel as timextenderenumtable2_enumvaluelabel_tpxdealtype
,tet3.enumvaluelabel as timextenderenumtable3_enumvaluelabel_tpxdealtype
,(select max(lastupdatedate)
from ( 				values
        (ttp1.modifieddatetime),
        ( isnull( c1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' )),
        ( isnull( hw1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' )),
        ( isnull( dpt1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' )),
		( isnull( uom1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' )),
        ( isnull( uomt1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01' ))) as updatedate(lastupdatedate)
) as latest_modifieddatetime 
from
dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.tamtradepromotion ttp1
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.currency c1 on

left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.hcmworker hw1 on
	ttp1.hcmworkerid = hw1.recid
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dirpartytable dpt1 on
	hw1.person = dpt1.recid
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.unitofmeasure uom1 on
	ttp1.unitid = uom1.symbol
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.unitofmeasuretranslation uomt1 on
	uomt1.languageid = 'en-us' and
	uom1.recid = uomt1.unitofmeasure
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'tamstatus'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet1 on
	ttp1.promotionstatus = tet1.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'tpxcmsubsidiesdiscounttype'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet2 on
	ttp1.tpxdealtype = tet2.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'tpxcmsubsidyheaderdealtype'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet3 on
	ttp1.tpxdealtype = tet3.enumvalue

,tt1.taxgroup as TAXGROUP
,tt1.transdate as TRANSDATE
,tt1.inventtransid as INVENTTRANSID
,tt1.invoiceid as INVOICEID
,tt1.journalnum as JOURNALNUM
,tt1.dataareaid as DATAAREAID
,tt1.voucher as VOUCHER
,cast(cast(tt1.taxamount as numeric(38,2)) as varchar ) as TAXAMOUNT
,cast(cast(tt1.taxamountcur as numeric(38,2)) as varchar ) as TAXAMOUNTCUR
,cast(cast(tt1.taxbaseamount as numeric(38,2))as varchar ) as TAXBASEAMOUNT
,cast(cast(tt1.taxbaseamountcur as numeric(38,2))as varchar )  as TAXBASEAMOUNTCUR 
,tt1.modifieddatetime as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
FROM dbo.TAXTRANS tt1 WHERE tt1.modifieddatetime > '@{variables('v_prev_max_timestamp')}'

@Concat('SELECT
tt1.recid as RECID
,tt1.currencycode as CURRENCYCODE
,tt1.taxcode as TAXCODE
,tt1.taxgroup as TAXGROUP
,tt1.transdate as TRANSDATE
,tt1.inventtransid as INVENTTRANSID
,tt1.invoiceid as INVOICEID
,tt1.journalnum as JOURNALNUM
,tt1.dataareaid as DATAAREAID
,tt1.voucher as VOUCHER
,cast(cast(tt1.taxamount as numeric(38,2)) as varchar ) as TAXAMOUNT
,cast(cast(tt1.taxamountcur as numeric(38,2)) as varchar ) as TAXAMOUNTCUR
,cast(cast(tt1.taxbaseamount as numeric(38,2))as varchar ) as TAXBASEAMOUNT
,cast(cast(tt1.taxbaseamountcur as numeric(38,2))as varchar )  as TAXBASEAMOUNTCUR 
,tt1.modifieddatetime as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
FROM '
,pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','taxtrans tt1 WHERE tt1.modifieddatetime >  ','''',variables('v_prev_max_timestamp'),'''')

select tlrrc1.DATAAREAID ,tlrrc1.REASONCODEID ,tlrrc1.RETURNREASONCODEGROUPID ,tlrrc1.DESCRIPTION ,rrcg1.DESCRIPTION as DESCRIPTION_CODEGROUP from dbo.TPX_LINERETURNREASONCODE tlrrc1 left join dbo.RETURNREASONCODEGROUP rrcg1 on 	tlrrc1.DATAAREAID = rrcg1.DATAAREAID and 	tlrrc1.RETURNREASONCODEGROUPID = rrcg1.REASONCODEGROUPID 	where tlrrc1.RETURNREASONCODEGROUPID !=''

@concat('select tlrrc1.dataareaid as dataareaid , tlrrc1.reasoncodeid as reasoncodeid , tlrrc1.returnreasoncodegroupid as returnreasoncodegroupid , tlrrc1.description as description , rrcg1.description as description_codegroup from ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','tpx_linereturnreasoncode tlrrc1 left join ',pipeline().globalParameters.d365_dbName,'.','returnreasoncodegroup rrcg1  on        tlrrc1.dataareaid = rrcg1.dataareaid and tlrrc1.returnreasoncodegroupid = rrcg1.reasoncodegroupid where tlrrc1.returnreasoncodegroupid !=''''''''' )

select 
wll1.DATAAREAID,
wll1.LOADID,
wll1.ORDERNUM,
wll1.ITEMID,
wll1.QTY,
wll1.MODIFIEDDATETIME,
mel2.ACTUALPIECES as MCSRNAEVENTLINE_ACTUALPIECES,
mel2.UNITVOLUME as MCSRNAEVENTLINE_UNITVOLUME,
mel2.INVENTTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME as MCSRNAEVENTLINE_INVENTTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
mel2.SALESLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME as MCSRNAEVENTLINE_SALESLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
it1.UNITVOLUME as INVENTTABLE_UNITVOLUME,
it1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as INVENTTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
st1.SALESID as SALESTABLE_SALESID,
st1.CUSTACCOUNT as SALESTABLE_CUSTACCOUNT,
st1.DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS as SALESTABLE_DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS,
st1.SHIPPINGDATECONFIRMED as SALESTABLE_SHIPPINGDATECONFIRMED,
st1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as SALESTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
wlt1.EBCCARRIERID as WHSLOADTABLE_EBCCARRIERID,
wlt1.INVENTSITEID as WHSLOADTABLE_INVENTSITEID,
wlt1.EBCTRAILERID as WHSLOADTABLE_EBCTRAILERID,
wlt1.LOADSCHEDSHIPUTCDATETIME as WHSLOADTABLE_LOADSCHEDSHIPUTCDATETIME,
wlt1.LOADSTATUS as WHSLOADTABLE_LOADSTATUS,
wlt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as WHSLOADTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
mrst1.ENTITYKEY as WHSLOADTABLE_ENTITYKEY,
mrst1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as MCSROADNETSTAGINGTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
mrs1.STOPCOUNT as MCSRNAROUTESTOP_STOPCOUNT,
mrs1.MILEAGE as MCSRNAROUTESTOP_MILEAGE,
meh1.ACTUALMILES as MCSRNAEVENTHEADER_ACTUALMILES,
meh1.ACTUALSTOPCOUNT as MCSRNAEVENTHEADER_ACTUALSTOPCOUNT,
mt1.CUBICVOLUME as MCSTRAILERS_CUBICVOLUME,
tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_SALESTYPE,
tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_LOADSTATUS,
convert(varchar(max), hashbytes('SHA2_256', concat(wll1.DATAAREAID, wll1.LOADID, wll1.ORDERNUM, 
wll1.ITEMID,mel2.ACTUALPIECES,mel2.UNITVOLUME,mrs1.STOPCOUNT,mrs1.MILEAGE,meh1.ACTUALMILES,meh1.ACTUALSTOPCOUNT,mt1.CUBICVOLUME
)), 2) as WHSLOADLINE_EXT_HASH_KEY,
row_number() over (partition by wll1.LOADID, 
    wll1.ORDERNUM, 
    wll1.ITEMID,
    mel2.ACTUALPIECES,
    mel2.UNITVOLUME,
    mrs1.STOPCOUNT,
    mrs1.MILEAGE,
    meh1.ACTUALMILES,
    meh1.ACTUALSTOPCOUNT,
    mt1.CUBICVOLUME,
	convert(varchar(max), hashbytes('SHA2_256', concat(wll1.DATAAREAID, 
    wll1.LOADID, 
    wll1.ORDERNUM, 
    wll1.ITEMID,
    mel2.ACTUALPIECES,
    mel2.UNITVOLUME,
    mrs1.STOPCOUNT,
    mrs1.MILEAGE,
    meh1.ACTUALMILES,
    meh1.ACTUALSTOPCOUNT,
    mt1.CUBICVOLUME
    )), 2)
	ORDER BY
	 (SELECT MAX(LastUpdateDate)
    FROM (VALUES (wll1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (isnull(mel2.INVENTTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),(isnull(mel2.SALESLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
    (isnull(it1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),(isnull(wlt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')), (isnull(st1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
    (isnull(mrst1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'))) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate))
    DESC) as WHS_EXT_RANK,
(SELECT MAX(LastUpdateDate)
FROM (VALUES (wll1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
(isnull(mel2.INVENTTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(mel2.SALESLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(it1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(wlt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(st1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(mrst1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'))) AS UpdateDate(LastUpdateDate)) AS LAST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
(select dataareaid as DATAAREAID, loadid as LOADID, ordernum as ORDERNUM, itemid as ITEMID
		, sum(qty) as QTY
		, max(modifieddatetime) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
	from dbo.whsloadline
	group by dataareaid, loadid, ordernum, itemid) wll1
left join (select mel20.dataareaid, mel20.loadid, mel20.ordernum, mel20.itemid
				, max(case when mel20.itemid like '%MERGE%' then sl20.MCSTOTALVOLUME / isnull(sl20.SALESQTY, 1)
						else it10.UNITVOLUME
						end) as UNITVOLUME
				, sum(
					-- ACTUALQTY
					case when mel20.EVENTTYPE = 'StopDeparted' and mel20.ITEMID like '%MERGE%' then isnull(sl20.SALESQTY, 0)
						when mel20.EVENTTYPE = 'StopDeparted' then isnull(mel20.ACTUALQTY, 0)
					else 0
					end
					) as ACTUALPIECES
				, max(it10.MODIFIEDDATETIME) as INVENTTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME
				, max(sl20.MODIFIEDDATETIME) as SALESLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.mcsrnaeventline mel20
			left join (select dataareaid, itemid
						, max(unitvolume) as UNITVOLUME
						, max(modifieddatetime) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
					from dbo.inventtable
					group by dataareaid, itemid) it10 on
				mel20.dataareaid = it10.dataareaid and
				mel20.itemid = it10.itemid
			left join (select dataareaid, salesid, itemid
						, max(mcstotalvolume) as MCSTOTALVOLUME
						, max(salesqty) as SALESQTY
						, max(modifieddatetime) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
					from dbo.salesline
					group by dataareaid, salesid, itemid) sl20 on
				mel20.dataareaid = sl20.dataareaid and
				mel20.ordernum = sl20.salesid and
				mel20.itemid = sl20.itemid
			where mel20.eventtype = 'StopDeparted'
			group by mel20.dataareaid, mel20.loadid, mel20.ordernum, mel20.itemid, it10.UNITVOLUME) mel2 on
	wll1.DATAAREAID = mel2.dataareaid and
	wll1.LOADID = mel2.loadid and
	wll1.ORDERNUM = mel2.ordernum and
	wll1.ITEMID = mel2.itemid
left join (select dataareaid, itemid
			, max(unitvolume) As UNITVOLUME
			, max(modifieddatetime) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dbo.inventtable
		group by dataareaid, itemid) it1 on
	wll1.DATAAREAID = it1.dataareaid and
	wll1.ITEMID = it1.itemid
left join (select dataareaid, salesid As SALESID
			, max(salestype) as SALESTYPE
			, max(custaccount) as CUSTACCOUNT
			, max(deliverypostaladdress) as DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS
			, max(shippingdateconfirmed) as SHIPPINGDATECONFIRMED
			, max(modifieddatetime) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dbo.salestable
		group by dataareaid, salesid) st1 on
	wll1.DATAAREAID = st1.dataareaid and
	wll1.ORDERNUM = st1.SALESID
left join (select dataareaid, loadid
			, max(ebccarrierid) as EBCCARRIERID
			, max(inventsiteid) as INVENTSITEID
			, max(ebctrailerid) as EBCTRAILERID
			, max(loadschedshiputcdatetime) as LOADSCHEDSHIPUTCDATETIME
			, max(loadstatus) as LOADSTATUS
			, max(modifieddatetime) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dbo.whsloadtable
		group by dataareaid, loadid) wlt1 on
	wll1.DATAAREAID = wlt1.dataareaid and
	wll1.LOADID = wlt1.loadid
left join (select dataareaid, loadid
			, max(entitykey) as ENTITYKEY
			, max(modifieddatetime) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
		from dbo.mcsroadnetstagingtable
		group by dataareaid, loadid) mrst1 on
	wll1.DATAAREAID = mrst1.dataareaid and
	wll1.LOADID = mrst1.loadid
left join (select dataareaid, entitykey
			, sum(case when stopnumber = 0 or stoptype = 'DestinationDepotStop' then 0 else 1 end) as STOPCOUNT
			, sum(mileage) as MILEAGE
		from dbo.mcsrnaroutestop
		group by dataareaid, entitykey) mrs1 on
	mrst1.dataareaid = mrs1.dataareaid and
	mrst1.ENTITYKEY = mrs1.entitykey
left join (select dataareaid, loadid
			, sum(case when eventtype = 'RouteCompleted' and ISNUMERIC(distancemiles) = 1 then isnull(convert(decimal(38,16), nullif(rtrim(distancemiles), '')), 0.00) else 0.00 end) as ACTUALMILES
			, sum(case when eventtype = 'StopDeparted' then 1 else 0 end) as ACTUALSTOPCOUNT
		from dbo.mcsrnaeventheader
		group by dataareaid, loadid) meh1 on
	wll1.DATAAREAID = meh1.dataareaid and
	wll1.LOADID = meh1.loadid
left join (select trailerno
			, max(convert(int, isnull(nullif(rtrim(
				case when isnumeric(cubicvolume) = 0 then '0' else cubicvolume end
				), ''), 0))) as CUBICVOLUME
		from dbo.mcstrailers
		group by trailerno) mt1 on
	wlt1.EBCTRAILERID = mt1.trailerno
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'SalesType'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet1 on
	st1.SALESTYPE = tet1.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as ENUMVALUELABEL
		from dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'WHSLoadStatus'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet2 on
	wlt1.LOADSTATUS = tet2.enumvalue

Select 
wll1.dataareaid as DATAAREAID,
wll1.loadid as LOADID,
wll1.ordernum as ORDERNUM,
wll1.itemid as ITEMID,
wll1.qty as QTY,
wll1.modifieddatetime As MODIFIEDDATETIME,
mel2.actualpieces as MCSRNAEVENTLINE_ACTUALPIECES,
mel2.unitvolume as MCSRNAEVENTLINE_UNITVOLUME,
mel2.inventtable_modifieddatetime as MCSRNAEVENTLINE_INVENTTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
mel2.salesline_modifieddatetime as MCSRNAEVENTLINE_SALESLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
it1.unitvolume as INVENTTABLE_UNITVOLUME,
it1.modifieddatetime as INVENTTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
st1.salesid as SALESTABLE_SALESID,
st1.custaccount as SALESTABLE_CUSTACCOUNT,
st1.deliverypostaladdress as SALESTABLE_DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS,
st1.shippingdateconfirmed as SALESTABLE_SHIPPINGDATECONFIRMED,
st1.modifieddatetime as SALESTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
wlt1.ebccarrierid as WHSLOADTABLE_EBCCARRIERID,
wlt1.inventsiteid as WHSLOADTABLE_INVENTSITEID,
wlt1.ebctrailerid as WHSLOADTABLE_EBCTRAILERID,
wlt1.loadschedshiputcdatetime as WHSLOADTABLE_LOADSCHEDSHIPUTCDATETIME,
wlt1.loadstatus as WHSLOADTABLE_LOADSTATUS,
wlt1.modifieddatetime as WHSLOADTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
mrst1.entitykey as WHSLOADTABLE_ENTITYKEY,
mrst1.modifieddatetime as MCSROADNETSTAGINGTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
mrs1.stopcount as MCSRNAROUTESTOP_STOPCOUNT,
mrs1.mileage as MCSRNAROUTESTOP_MILEAGE,
meh1.actualmiles as MCSRNAEVENTHEADER_ACTUALMILES,
meh1.actualstopcount as MCSRNAEVENTHEADER_ACTUALSTOPCOUNT,
mt1.cubicvolume as MCSTRAILERS_CUBICVOLUME,
tet1.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_SALESTYPE,
tet2.enumvaluelabel as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_LOADSTATUS,
convert(varchar(max), hashbytes('sha2_256', concat(wll1.dataareaid, wll1.loadid, wll1.ordernum, 
wll1.itemid,mel2.actualpieces,mel2.unitvolume,mrs1.stopcount,mrs1.mileage,meh1.actualmiles,meh1.actualstopcount,mt1.cubicvolume
)), 2) as WHSLOADLINE_EXT_HASH_KEY,
row_number() over (partition by wll1.loadid, 
    wll1.ordernum, 
    wll1.itemid,
    mel2.actualpieces,
    mel2.unitvolume,
    mrs1.stopcount,
    mrs1.mileage,
    meh1.actualmiles,
    meh1.actualstopcount,
    mt1.cubicvolume,
	convert(varchar(max), hashbytes('sha2_256', concat(wll1.dataareaid, 
    wll1.loadid, 
    wll1.ordernum, 
    wll1.itemid,
    mel2.actualpieces,
    mel2.unitvolume,
    mrs1.stopcount,
    mrs1.mileage,
    meh1.actualmiles,
    meh1.actualstopcount,
    mt1.cubicvolume
    )), 2)
	order by
	 (select max(lastupdatedate)
    from (values (wll1.modifieddatetime), (isnull(mel2.inventtable_modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),(isnull(mel2.salesline_modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
    (isnull(it1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),(isnull(wlt1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')), (isnull(st1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
    (isnull(mrst1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01'))) as UPDATEDATE(lastupdatedate))
    desc) as WHS_EXT_RANK,
(select max(lastupdatedate)
from (values (wll1.modifieddatetime),
(isnull(mel2.inventtable_modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(mel2.salesline_modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(it1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(wlt1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(st1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
(isnull(mrst1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01'))) as updatedate(lastupdatedate)) as LAST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
(select dataareaid, loadid, ordernum, itemid
		, sum(qty) as qty
		, max(modifieddatetime) as modifieddatetime
	from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.whsloadline
	group by dataareaid, loadid, ordernum, itemid) wll1
left join (select mel20.dataareaid, mel20.loadid, mel20.ordernum, mel20.itemid
				, max(case when mel20.itemid like '%merge%' then sl20.mcstotalvolume / isnull(sl20.salesqty, 1)
						else it10.unitvolume
						end) as unitvolume
				, sum(
					-- actualqty
					case when mel20.eventtype = 'StopDeparted' and mel20.itemid like '%MERGE%' then isnull(sl20.salesqty, 0)
						when mel20.eventtype = 'StopDeparted' then isnull(mel20.actualqty, 0)
					else 0
					end
					) as actualpieces
				, max(it10.modifieddatetime) as inventtable_modifieddatetime
				, max(sl20.modifieddatetime) as salesline_modifieddatetime
			from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.mcsrnaeventline mel20
			left join (select dataareaid, itemid
						, max(unitvolume) as unitvolume
						, max(modifieddatetime) as modifieddatetime
					from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventtable
					group by dataareaid, itemid) it10 on
				mel20.dataareaid = it10.dataareaid and
				mel20.itemid = it10.itemid
			left join (select dataareaid, salesid, itemid
						, max(mcstotalvolume) as mcstotalvolume
						, max(salesqty) as salesqty
						, max(modifieddatetime) as modifieddatetime
					from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.salesline
					group by dataareaid, salesid, itemid) sl20 on
				mel20.dataareaid = sl20.dataareaid and
				mel20.ordernum = sl20.salesid and
				mel20.itemid = sl20.itemid
			where mel20.eventtype = 'stopdeparted'
			group by mel20.dataareaid, mel20.loadid, mel20.ordernum, mel20.itemid, it10.unitvolume) mel2 on
	wll1.dataareaid = mel2.dataareaid and
	wll1.loadid = mel2.loadid and
	wll1.ordernum = mel2.ordernum and
	wll1.itemid = mel2.itemid
left join (select dataareaid, itemid
			, max(unitvolume) as unitvolume
			, max(modifieddatetime) as modifieddatetime
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventtable
		group by dataareaid, itemid) it1 on
	wll1.dataareaid = it1.dataareaid and
	wll1.itemid = it1.itemid
left join (select dataareaid, salesid
			, max(salestype) as salestype
			, max(custaccount) as custaccount
			, max(deliverypostaladdress) as deliverypostaladdress
			, max(shippingdateconfirmed) as shippingdateconfirmed
			, max(modifieddatetime) as modifieddatetime
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.salestable
		group by dataareaid, salesid) st1 on
	wll1.dataareaid = st1.dataareaid and
	wll1.ordernum = st1.salesid
left join (select dataareaid, loadid
			, max(ebccarrierid) as ebccarrierid
			, max(inventsiteid) as inventsiteid
			, max(ebctrailerid) as ebctrailerid
			, max(loadschedshiputcdatetime) as loadschedshiputcdatetime
			, max(loadstatus) as loadstatus
			, max(modifieddatetime) as modifieddatetime
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.whsloadtable
		group by dataareaid, loadid) wlt1 on
	wll1.dataareaid = wlt1.dataareaid and
	wll1.loadid = wlt1.loadid
left join (select dataareaid, loadid
			, max(entitykey) as entitykey
			, max(modifieddatetime) as modifieddatetime
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.mcsroadnetstagingtable
		group by dataareaid, loadid) mrst1 on
	wll1.dataareaid = mrst1.dataareaid and
	wll1.loadid = mrst1.loadid
left join (select dataareaid, entitykey
			, sum(case when stopnumber = 0 or stoptype = 'destinationdepotstop' then 0 else 1 end) as stopcount
			, sum(mileage) as mileage
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.mcsrnaroutestop
		group by dataareaid, entitykey) mrs1 on
	mrst1.dataareaid = mrs1.dataareaid and
	mrst1.entitykey = mrs1.entitykey
left join (select dataareaid, loadid
			, sum(case when eventtype = 'routecompleted' and isnumeric(distancemiles) = 1 then isnull(convert(decimal(38,16), nullif(rtrim(distancemiles), '')), 0.00) else 0.00 end) as actualmiles
			, sum(case when eventtype = 'stopdeparted' then 1 else 0 end) as actualstopcount
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.mcsrnaeventheader
		group by dataareaid, loadid) meh1 on
	wll1.dataareaid = meh1.dataareaid and
	wll1.loadid = meh1.loadid
left join (select trailerno
			, max(convert(int, isnull(nullif(rtrim(
				case when isnumeric(cubicvolume) = 0 then '0' else cubicvolume end
				), ''), 0))) as cubicvolume
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.mcstrailers
		group by trailerno) mt1 on
	wlt1.ebctrailerid = mt1.trailerno
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'salestype'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet1 on
	st1.salestype = tet1.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from  dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'whsloadstatus'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet2 on
	wlt1.loadstatus = tet2.enumvalue
	where wll1.loadid is not null

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select f1.DW_Id,
	f1.CustomerSettlementKey,
	f1.LegalEntityKey,
	f1.TransactionDate,
	f1.RecordID,
	f1.LegalEntity,
	f1.CompanyCurrencySettleAmount,
	f1.TransactionCurrencySettleAmount,
	f1.IncrementalTimestamp,
	f2.transcompany,
	f2.accountnum,
	f2.transrecid,
	f1.DW_Batch,

from dbo.FACTCUSTOMERSETTLEMENTS f1 with (nolock)

		f1.RecordID = f2.RecordID
;

activities.name: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

dependsOn.activity: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

text.value:
truncate table global.FACT_CUSTOMER_SETTLEMENTS;

insert into global.FACT_CUSTOMER_SETTLEMENTS (fact_customer_settlements_key, source_name, record_id, dim_source_system_key, dim_source_system_snkey, transaction_date_dim_date_key, transaction_date_dim_date_snkey, dim_legal_entity_key, dim_legal_entity_snkey, customer_settlement_key, trans_company, account_num, trans_rec_id, transaction_date, legal_entity, company_currency_settle_amount, transaction_currency_settle_amount, hk_hash_key, hk_source_name, hk_soft_delete_flag, hk_source_created_timestamp, hk_source_last_updated_timestamp, hk_created_job_run_id, hk_last_updated_job_run_id, hk_created_timestamp, hk_last_updated_timestamp, hk_warehouse_id)
	select hash(a.source_name, '~', to_char(a.record_id))::number as FACT_CUSTOMER_SETTLEMENTS_KEY
		, a.source_name as SOURCE_NAME, a.record_id as RECORD_ID
		
		, case when a.source_name = '' then -2
			else nvl(dss1.dim_source_system_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_KEY
		, a.dim_source_system_snkey as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
		
		, nvl(dd1.dim_date_key, -1)::number as TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.transaction_date_dim_date_snkey as TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		
		, case when a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dle1.dim_legal_entity_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_KEY
		, a.dim_legal_entity_snkey as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
		, a.customer_settlement_key as CUSTOMER_SETTLEMENT_KEY
		
		, a.trans_company as TRANS_COMPANY, a.account_num as ACCOUNT_NUM, a.trans_rec_id as TRANS_REC_ID, a.transaction_date as TRANSACTION_DATE, a.legal_entity as LEGAL_ENTITY, a.company_currency_settle_amount as COMPANY_CURRENCY_SETTLE_AMOUNT, a.transaction_currency_settle_amount as TRANSACTION_CURRENCY_SETTLE_AMOUNT
		
		, hash(a.source_name, '~', to_char(a.record_id), '~', a.trans_company, '~', a.account_num, '~', to_char(a.trans_rec_id), '~', to_char(a.transaction_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', a.legal_entity, '~', to_char(a.company_currency_settle_amount), '~', to_char(a.transaction_currency_settle_amount))::number as HK_HASH_KEY
		
		, a.hk_source_name as HK_SOURCE_NAME
		, false::boolean as HK_SOFT_DELETE_FLAG
		, a.hk_source_created_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_source_last_updated_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_created_job_run_id as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID, a.hk_last_updated_job_run_id as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
		, uuid_string()::varchar as HK_WAREHOUSE_ID
	
	from (select 'AXNALA'::varchar as SOURCE_NAME
			, nvl(b.recordid, 0)::number(38, 0) as RECORD_ID
			
			, nvl(b.transcompany, '')::varchar as TRANS_COMPANY
			, nvl(b.accountnum, '')::varchar as ACCOUNT_NUM
			, nvl(b.transrecid, 0)::number(38, 0) as TRANS_REC_ID
			, case when nvl(b.transactiondate, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.transactiondate < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.transactiondate > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.transactiondate
				end::date as TRANSACTION_DATE
			, nvl(b.legalentity, '')::varchar as LEGAL_ENTITY
			, nvl(b.companycurrencysettleamount, 0)::number(38, 16) as COMPANY_CURRENCY_SETTLE_AMOUNT
			, nvl(b.transactioncurrencysettleamount, 0)::number(38, 16) as TRANSACTION_CURRENCY_SETTLE_AMOUNT
			
			, case when nvl(SOURCE_NAME, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME)
				end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(TRANSACTION_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY)
				end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
			, hash(TRANS_COMPANY, '~', ACCOUNT_NUM, '~', to_char(TRANS_REC_ID))::number(38, 0) as CUSTOMER_SETTLEMENT_KEY
	
			, nvl(b.dw_sourcecode, '')::varchar as HK_SOURCE_NAME
			, '1950-01-01 00:00:00'::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
			, nvl(b.dw_timestamp, '1950-01-01 00:00:00')::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
			, '-1'::varchar as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID
			, nvl(b.dw_batch, '-1')::varchar as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
			
		from (select hk_source_name, hk_job_run_id, hk_created_timestamp, hk_warehouse_id, dw_id, customersettlementkey, legalentitykey, transactiondate, recordid, legalentity, companycurrencysettleamount, transactioncurrencysettleamount, incrementaltimestamp, transcompany, accountnum, transrecid, dw_batch, dw_sourcecode, dw_timestamp
			from @{pipeline().globalParameters.environment}_raw.edw_dwh.FACTCUSTOMERSETTLEMENTS
			) b
			inner join (select min(date_value) as MIN_DATE_VALUE
							, max(date_value) as MAX_DATE_VALUE
						from global.DIM_DATE
						where date_value not in ('1950-01-01', '1951-12-31', '9000-01-01', '9951-12-31')) dd1 on
				1=1
		) a
	left join global.DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM dss1 on
		a.dim_source_system_snkey = dss1.dim_source_system_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd1 on
		a.transaction_date_dim_date_snkey = dd1.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY dle1 on
		a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = dle1.dim_legal_entity_snkey
;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT --TOP (100) 
		f1.DW_ID
      ,f1.DEFAULTDIMENSIONKEY
      ,f1.INVENTORYJOURNALDETAILSKEY
      ,f1.INVENTORYJOURNALKEY
      ,f1.INVENTORYKEY
      ,f1.ITEMKEY
      ,f1.LEDGERDIMENSIONKEY
      ,f1.LEGALENTITYKEY
      ,f1.RECEIVINGINVENTORYKEY
      ,f1.USERINFOKEY
      ,f1.POSTEDDATE
      ,f1.TRANSACTIONDATE
      ,f1.LEGALENTITY
      ,f1.JOURNALID
      ,f1.LINENUMBER
      ,f1.VOUCHER
      ,f1.QUANTITY
      ,f1.COUNTEDQUANTITY
      ,f1.ONHANDQUANTITY
      ,f1.COSTAMOUNT
      ,f1.COSTPRICE
      ,f1.PRICEUNIT
      ,f1.INCREMENTALTIMESTAMP
	  ,cast(case when f1.defaultdimensionkey in (-1, -2) then f2.DEFAULTDIMENSION 
		else dd1.defaultdimension end as varchar) as DEFAULTDIMENSION
	 ,f2.JOURNALNAMEID
	  ,case when f1.InventoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.INVENTDIMID 
		else di1.InventoryDimensionID end as INVENTDIMID
	  ,case when f1.ItemKey in (-1, -2) then f2.itemid 
			else dit1.itemid end as ITEMID
	  ,cast(case when f1.LedgerDimensionKey in (-1, -2) then f2.LEDGERDIMENSION 
			else dld1.LedgerDimension end as varchar) as LEDGERDIMENSION
	  ,case when f1.RECEIVINGINVENTORYKEY in (-1, -2) then f2.TOINVENTDIMID 
		else di2.InventoryDimensionID end as TOINVENTDIMID
	  ,case when f1.USERINFOKEY in (-1, -2) then f2.POSTEDUSERID  
		else dui1.USERID end as POSTEDUSERID
	  ,dijd1.JOURNALTYPE
      ,dijd1.ISINVENTORYJOURNALPOSTED
      ,dijd1.ISINVENTORYJOURNALBLOCKED
      ,dijd1.DROPSHIPMENT
      ,f1.DW_BATCH
      ,f1.DW_SOURCECODE
      ,f1.DW_TIMESTAMP
  FROM	EDW_DWH.DBO.FACTINVENTORYJOURNAL f1 with (nolock)
		LEFT JOIN EDW_HKA.DBO.FACTINVENTORYJOURNAL f2 with (nolock) ON
		f1.DW_Id = f2.DW_Id
		left join edw_hka.dbo.DIMDEFAULTDIMENSION dd1 with (nolock) on
		f1.defaultdimensionkey = dd1.defaultdimensionkey
		left join dbo.DimInventory di1 with (nolock) on
		f1.InventoryKey = di1.InventoryKey
		left join dbo.DimInventory di2 with (nolock) on
		f1.RECEIVINGINVENTORYKEY = di2.InventoryKey
		left join dbo.DIMITEM dit1 with (nolock) on
		f1.itemkey = dit1.itemkey	
		left join dbo.DIMUSERINFO dui1 with (nolock) on
		f1.UserInfoKey = dui1.UserInfoKey
		left join edw_hka.dbo.DimLedgerDimension dld1 with (nolock) on
		f1.LedgerDimensionKey = dld1.LedgerDimensionKey
		left join dbo.DimInventoryJournalDetails dijd1 with (nolock) on
		f1.InventoryJournalDetailsKey =dijd1.InventoryJournalDetailsKey;

activities.name: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

dependsOn.activity: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

text.value:
TRUNCATE TABLE GLOBAL.FACT_INVENTORY_JOURNAL;

INSERT INTO GLOBAL.FACT_INVENTORY_JOURNAL (
FACT_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_KEY,
SOURCE_NAME,
LEGAL_ENTITY,
JOURNAL_ID,
LINE_NUMBER,
DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_KEY,
DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY,
DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_KEY,
DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY,
-- DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_DETAILS_KEY,
-- DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_DETAILS_SNKEY,
DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_KEY,
DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_SNKEY,
DIM_INVENTORY_KEY,
DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY,
DIM_ITEM_KEY,
DIM_ITEM_SNKEY,
DIM_LEDGER_DIMENSION_KEY,
DIM_LEDGER_DIMENSION_SNKEY,
DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_KEY,
DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY,
DIM_RECIEVING_INVENTORY_KEY,
DIM_RECIEVING_INVENTORY_SNKEY,
DIM_USER_INFO_KEY,
DIM_USER_INFO_SNKEY,
POSTED_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
POSTED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
POSTED_DATE,
TRANSACTION_DATE,
DEFAULT_DIMENSION,
INVENTORY_JOURNAL_ID,
INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID,
ITEM_ID,
LEDGER_DIMENSION,
RECIEVING_INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID,
POSTED_USER_ID,
VOUCHER,
QUANTITY,
COUNTED_QUANTITY,
ON_HAND_QUANTITY,
COST_AMOUNT,
COST_PRICE,
PRICE_UNIT,
JOURNAL_TYPE,
IS_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_POSTED,
IS_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_BLOCKED,
DROP_SHIPMENT,
HK_HASH_KEY,
HK_SOURCE_NAME,
HK_SOFT_DELETE_FLAG,
HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID,
HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID,
HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_WAREHOUSE_ID)

SELECT hash(a.SOURCE_NAME, '~',a.LEGAL_ENTITY, '~',a.JOURNAL_ID, '~', to_char(a.LINE_NUMBER)) AS FACT_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_KEY
    ,a.SOURCE_NAME
    ,a.LEGAL_ENTITY
    ,a.JOURNAL_ID
    ,a.LINE_NUMBER
    ,case when a.source_name = '' then -2
			else nvl(dss1.dim_source_system_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_KEY
    ,a.DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY    
		, case when a.dim_default_dimension_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(ddim1.dim_default_dimension_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_KEY
    ,a.DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY 
   -- ,a.DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_DETAILS_SNKEY AS DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_DETAILS_KEY
   -- ,a.DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_DETAILS_SNKEY
          	, case when a.DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_SNKEY = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dij1.DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_KEY, -1)
			end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_KEY
,a.DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_SNKEY
    , case when a.dim_inventory_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dinv1.dim_inventory_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_KEY
    ,a.DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY 
  	, case when a.dim_item_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dit1.dim_item_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_ITEM_KEY
,a.DIM_ITEM_SNKEY
  	, case when a.DIM_LEDGER_DIMENSION_SNKEY = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dld1.DIM_LEDGER_DIMENSION_KEY, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LEDGER_DIMENSION_KEY
,a.DIM_LEDGER_DIMENSION_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dle1.dim_legal_entity_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_KEY
,a.DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
     , case when a.DIM_RECIEVING_INVENTORY_SNKEY = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dinv2.dim_inventory_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_RECIEVING_INVENTORY_KEY
,a.DIM_RECIEVING_INVENTORY_SNKEY
     , case when a.DIM_USER_INFO_SNKEY = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dui1.DIM_USER_INFO_KEY, -1)
			end::number as DIM_USER_INFO_KEY
,a.DIM_USER_INFO_SNKEY
, nvl(dd1.dim_date_key, -1)::number as POSTED_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
,a.POSTED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
, nvl(dd2.dim_date_key, -1)::number as TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
,a.TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
,a.POSTED_DATE
,a.TRANSACTION_DATE
,a.DEFAULT_DIMENSION
,a.INVENTORY_JOURNAL_ID
,a.INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID
,a.ITEM_ID
,a.LEDGER_DIMENSION
,a.RECIEVING_INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID
,a.POSTED_USER_ID
,a.VOUCHER
,a.QUANTITY
,a.COUNTED_QUANTITY
,a.ON_HAND_QUANTITY
,a.COST_AMOUNT
,a.COST_PRICE
,a.PRICE_UNIT
,a.JOURNAL_TYPE
,a.IS_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_POSTED
,a.IS_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_BLOCKED
,a.DROP_SHIPMENT
,hash(a.source_name, '~', a.legal_entity, '~', a.journal_id, '~', to_char(a.line_number), '~', to_char(a.posted_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'), '~', to_char(a.transaction_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'), '~', a.default_dimension, '~', a.INVENTORY_JOURNAL_ID, '~', a.inventory_dimension_id, '~', a.item_id, '~', a.ledger_dimension, '~', a.recieving_inventory_dimension_id, '~', a.posted_user_id, '~', a.voucher, '~', to_char(a.quantity), '~', to_char(a.counted_quantity), '~', to_char(a.on_hand_quantity), '~', to_char(a.cost_amount), '~', to_char(a.cost_price), '~', to_char(a.price_unit), '~', a.journal_type, '~', a.is_inventory_journal_posted, '~', a.is_inventory_journal_blocked, '~', a.drop_shipment) as HK_HASH_KEY
		, a.hk_source_name as HK_SOURCE_NAME
		, false::boolean as HK_SOFT_DELETE_FLAG
		, a.hk_source_created_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_source_last_updated_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_created_job_run_id as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID, a.hk_last_updated_job_run_id as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
		, uuid_string()::varchar as HK_WAREHOUSE_ID
 
FROM
(SELECT     'AXNALA'::varchar as SOURCE_NAME
            , nvl(LEGALENTITY, '') AS LEGAL_ENTITY 
            , nvl(JOURNALID,'') AS JOURNAL_ID
            , NVL(LINENUMBER,0) AS LINE_NUMBER
            , case when nvl(SOURCE_NAME, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME)
				end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DEFAULTDIMENSION, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', DEFAULTDIMENSION)
				end::number as DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY
           -- ,hash(JOURNALTYPE, '~', ISINVENTORYJOURNALPOSTED, '~', ISINVENTORYJOURNALBLOCKED, '~', DROPSHIPMENT) AS DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_DETAILS_SNKEY
            , case when nvl(LEGALENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(JOURNALNAMEID, '') = '' then -2
              else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~',LEGALENTITY, '~',JOURNALNAMEID)
                end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_SNKEY 
            ,case when nvl(LEGALENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(INVENTDIMID, '') = '' then -2
             else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGALENTITY, '~', INVENTDIMID) 
                end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY 
            ,case when nvl(LEGALENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(ITEMID, '') = '' then -2
                else hash('', '~', LEGALENTITY, '~', ITEMID)
                end::number as DIM_ITEM_SNKEY
            ,case when nvl(LEDGERDIMENSION, '') = '' then -2
                else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~',LEDGERDIMENSION)
                end::number as DIM_LEDGER_DIMENSION_SNKEY
            ,case when nvl(LEGALENTITY, '') = '' then -2
                else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGALENTITY)
                end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
            ,case when nvl(LEGALENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(TOINVENTDIMID, '') = '' then -2
                else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGALENTITY, '~',TOINVENTDIMID)
                end::number as DIM_RECIEVING_INVENTORY_SNKEY
            ,case when nvl(POSTEDUSERID, '') = '' then -2
                else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~',POSTEDUSERID)
                end::number as DIM_USER_INFO_SNKEY
            ,case when POSTEDDATE = '1950-01-01' then -2
                else hash('', '~', to_char(POSTEDDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
             end::number as POSTED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
           ,case when TRANSACTIONDATE = '1950-01-01' then -2
                else hash('', '~', to_char(TRANSACTIONDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
                end::number as TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
           ,NVL(POSTEDDATE, '1950-01-01') AS POSTED_DATE
            ,NVL(TRANSACTIONDATE, '1950-01-01') AS TRANSACTION_DATE
           , NVL(DEFAULTDIMENSION,'') AS DEFAULT_DIMENSION
        , NVL(JOURNALNAMEID,'') AS INVENTORY_JOURNAL_ID
        , NVL(INVENTDIMID,'') AS INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID
        , NVL(ITEMID,'') AS ITEM_ID
        , NVL(LEDGERDIMENSION,'') AS LEDGER_DIMENSION
        ,nvl(TOINVENTDIMID,'') AS RECIEVING_INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID
,nvl(POSTEDUSERID,'')AS POSTED_USER_ID
,nvl(VOUCHER,'') AS VOUCHER
,nvl(QUANTITY,0) AS QUANTITY
,nvl(COUNTEDQUANTITY,0) AS COUNTED_QUANTITY
,nvl(ONHANDQUANTITY,0) AS ON_HAND_QUANTITY
,nvl(COSTAMOUNT,0) AS COST_AMOUNT
,nvl(COSTPRICE,0) AS COST_PRICE
,nvl(PRICEUNIT,0) AS PRICE_UNIT
,nvl(JOURNALTYPE,'') AS JOURNAL_TYPE
,nvl(ISINVENTORYJOURNALPOSTED,'') AS IS_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_POSTED
,nvl(ISINVENTORYJOURNALBLOCKED,'') AS IS_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_BLOCKED
,nvl(DROPSHIPMENT,'') AS DROP_SHIPMENT
            , nvl(b.dw_sourcecode, '')::varchar as HK_SOURCE_NAME
			, '1950-01-01 00:00:00'::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
			, nvl(b.dw_timestamp, '1950-01-01 00:00:00')::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
			, '-1'::varchar as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID
			, nvl(b.dw_batch, '-1')::varchar as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
FROM
(SELECT
HK_SOURCE_NAME,
HK_JOB_RUN_ID,
HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_WAREHOUSE_ID,
--DW_ID,
--DEFAULTDIMENSIONKEY,
--INVENTORYJOURNALDETAILSKEY,
--INVENTORYJOURNALKEY,
--INVENTORYKEY,
--ITEMKEY,
--LEDGERDIMENSIONKEY,
--LEGALENTITYKEY,
--RECEIVINGINVENTORYKEY,
--USERINFOKEY,
POSTEDDATE,
TRANSACTIONDATE,
LEGALENTITY,
JOURNALID,
LINENUMBER,
VOUCHER,
QUANTITY,
COUNTEDQUANTITY,
ONHANDQUANTITY,
COSTAMOUNT,
COSTPRICE,
PRICEUNIT,
INCREMENTALTIMESTAMP,
DEFAULTDIMENSION,
JOURNALNAMEID,
INVENTDIMID,
ITEMID,
LEDGERDIMENSION,
TOINVENTDIMID,
POSTEDUSERID,
JOURNALTYPE,
ISINVENTORYJOURNALPOSTED,
ISINVENTORYJOURNALBLOCKED,
DROPSHIPMENT,
DW_BATCH,
DW_SOURCECODE,
DW_TIMESTAMP,
FROM @{pipeline().globalParameters.environment}_RAW.EDW_DWH.FACTINVENTORYJOURNAL) b
			inner join (select min(date_value) as MIN_DATE_VALUE
							, max(date_value) as MAX_DATE_VALUE
						from global.DIM_DATE
						where date_value not in ('1950-01-01', '1951-12-31', '9000-01-01', '9951-12-31')) dd1 on
				1=1
		) a
	left join global.DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM dss1 on
		a.dim_source_system_snkey = dss1.dim_source_system_snkey
    left join global.DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION ddim1 on
		a.dim_default_dimension_snkey = ddim1.dim_default_dimension_snkey
	left join global.DIM_INVENTORY dinv1 on
		a.dim_inventory_snkey = dinv1.dim_inventory_snkey
    left join global.DIM_INVENTORY dinv2 on
		a.DIM_RECIEVING_INVENTORY_SNKEY = dinv2.dim_inventory_snkey
	left join global.DIM_ITEM dit1 on
		a.dim_item_snkey = dit1.dim_item_snkey
    left join global.DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL dij1 on
        a.DIM_INVENTORY_JOURNAL_SNKEY = dij1.dim_inventory_journal_snkey
    left join global.dim_ledger_dimension dld1 on
        a.DIM_LEDGER_DIMENSION_SNKEY = dld1.dim_ledger_dimension_snkey
	left join global.DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY dle1 on
		a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = dle1.dim_legal_entity_snkey
    left join global.dim_user_info dui1 on
        a.dim_user_info_snkey = dui1.dim_user_info_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd1 on
		a.POSTED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY = dd1.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd2 on
		a.TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY = dd2.dim_date_snkey
;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select --top (10)
	f1.DW_Id as DW_ID,
	f1.CurrencyKey as CURRENCYKEY,
	f1.InventoryKey as INVENTORYKEY,
	f1.InventoryTransactionDetailsKey as INVENTORYTRANSACTIONDETAILSKEY,
	f1.ItemKey as ITEMKEY,
	f1.LegalEntityKey as LEGALENTITYKEY,
	f1.DateClosed as DATECLOSED,
	f1.DateExpected as DATEEXPECTED,
	f1.DateFinancial as DATEFINANCIAL,
	f1.DatePhysical as DATEPHYSICAL,
	f1.InventoryDate as INVENTORYDATE,
	f1.ShippingDateConfirmed as SHIPPINGDATECONFIRMED,
	f1.ShippingDateRequested as SHIPPINGDATEREQUESTED,
	f1.StatusDate as STATUSDATE,
	f1.RecordID as RECORDID,
	f1.InventoryTransactionID as INVENTORYTRANSACTIONID,
	f1.InvoiceID as INVOICEID,
	f1.LegalEntity as LEGALENTITY,
	f1.PackingSlipID as PACKINGSLIPID,
	f1.PickingRouteID as PICKINGROUTEID,
	f1.ReferenceID as REFERENCEID,
	f1.Voucher as VOUCHER,
	f1.VoucherPhysical as VOUCHERPHYSICAL,
	f1.Quantity as QUANTITY,
	f1.QuantitySettled as QUANTITYSETTLED,
	f1.CostAmountAdjustment as COSTAMOUNTADJUSTMENT,
	f1.CostAmountOperations as COSTAMOUNTOPERATIONS,
	f1.CostAmountPhysical as COSTAMOUNTPHYSICAL,
	f1.CostAmountPosted as COSTAMOUNTPOSTED,
	f1.CostAmountSettled as COSTAMOUNTSETTLED,
	f1.CostAmountStandard as COSTAMOUNTSTANDARD,
	f1.IncrementalTimeStamp as INCREMENTALTIMESTAMP,
	f1.InventorySiteID as INVENTORYSITEID,
	f1.InventoryWarehouseID as INVENTORYWAREHOUSEID,
	f1.DatePhysicalID as DATEPHYSICALID,
	case when f1.CurrencyKey in (-1, -2) then f2.currencycode else dcurr1.currencycode end as CURRENCYCODE,
	case when f1.InventoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.inventdimid else dinv1.inventorydimensionid end as INVENTORYDIMENSIONID,
	case when f1.ItemKey in (-1, -2) then f2.itemid else dit1.itemid end as ITEMID,
	ditd1.financialstatus as FINANCIALSTATUS,
	ditd1.referencecategory as REFERENCECATEGORY,
	ditd1.statusissue as STATUSISSUE,
	ditd1.statusreceipt as STATUSRECEIPT,
	f1.DW_Batch as DW_BATCH,
	f1.DW_SourceCode as DW_SOURCECODE,
	f1.DW_TimeStamp as DW_TIMESTAMP
from dbo.FACTINVENTORYTRANSACTIONS f1 with (nolock)
	-- changed this to an "inner join" instead of a "left join" since it will return the same number of records and hopefully it will run faster.
	inner join edw_hka.dbo.FACTINVENTORYTRANSACTIONS f2 with (nolock) on
		f1.RecordID = f2.RECID
	left join dbo.DIMCURRENCY dcurr1 with (nolock) on
		f1.currencykey = dcurr1.currencykey
	left join dbo.DIMINVENTORY dinv1 with (nolock) on
		f1.inventorykey = dinv1.inventorykey
	left join dbo.DIMITEM dit1 with (nolock) on
		f1.itemkey = dit1.itemkey
	
	left join dbo.DIMINVENTORYTRANSACTIONDETAILS ditd1 with (nolock) on
		f1.inventorytransactiondetailskey = ditd1.inventorytransactiondetailskey;

activities.name: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

dependsOn.activity: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

text.value:
truncate table global.FACT_INVENTORY_TRANSACTIONS;

insert into global.FACT_INVENTORY_TRANSACTIONS (fact_inventory_transactions_key, source_name, record_id, dim_source_system_key, dim_source_system_snkey, date_closed_dim_date_key, date_closed_dim_date_snkey, date_expected_dim_date_key, date_expected_dim_date_snkey, date_financial_dim_date_key, date_financial_dim_date_snkey, date_physical_dim_date_key, date_physical_dim_date_snkey, inventory_date_dim_date_key, inventory_date_dim_date_snkey, shipping_date_confirmed_dim_date_key, shipping_date_confirmed_dim_date_snkey, shipping_date_requested_dim_date_key, shipping_date_requested_dim_date_snkey, status_date_dim_date_key, status_date_dim_date_snkey, dim_currency_key, dim_currency_snkey, dim_inventory_key, dim_inventory_snkey, dim_item_key, dim_item_snkey, dim_legal_entity_key, dim_legal_entity_snkey, currency_code, inventory_dimension_id, item_id, financial_status, reference_category, status_issue, status_receipt, date_closed, date_expected, date_financial, date_physical, inventory_date, shipping_date_confirmed, shipping_date_requested, status_date, inventory_transaction_id, invoice_id, legal_entity, packing_slip_id, picking_route_id, reference_id, voucher, voucher_physical, quantity, quantity_settled, cost_amount_adjustment, cost_amount_operations, cost_amount_physical, cost_amount_posted, cost_amount_settled, cost_amount_standard, inventory_site_id, inventory_warehouse_id, date_physical_id, hk_hash_key, hk_source_name, hk_soft_delete_flag, hk_source_created_timestamp, hk_source_last_updated_timestamp, hk_created_job_run_id, hk_last_updated_job_run_id, hk_created_timestamp, hk_last_updated_timestamp, hk_warehouse_id)
	select hash(a.source_name, '~', to_char(a.record_id))::number as FACT_INVENTORY_TRANSACTIONS_KEY
		, a.source_name as SOURCE_NAME, a.record_id as RECORD_ID
		
		, case when a.source_name = '' then -2
			else nvl(dss1.dim_source_system_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_KEY
		, a.dim_source_system_snkey as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
		
		, nvl(dd1.dim_date_key, -1)::number as DATE_CLOSED_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.date_closed_dim_date_snkey as DATE_CLOSED_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd2.dim_date_key, -1)::number as DATE_EXPECTED_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.date_expected_dim_date_snkey as DATE_EXPECTED_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd3.dim_date_key, -1)::number as DATE_FINANCIAL_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.date_financial_dim_date_snkey as DATE_FINANCIAL_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd4.dim_date_key, -1)::number as DATE_PHYSICAL_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.date_physical_dim_date_snkey as DATE_PHYSICAL_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd5.dim_date_key, -1)::number as INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.inventory_date_dim_date_snkey as INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd6.dim_date_key, -1)::number as SHIPPING_DATE_CONFIRMED_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.shipping_date_confirmed_dim_date_snkey as SHIPPING_DATE_CONFIRMED_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd7.dim_date_key, -1)::number as SHIPPING_DATE_REQUESTED_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.shipping_date_requested_dim_date_snkey as SHIPPING_DATE_REQUESTED_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd8.dim_date_key, -1)::number as STATUS_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.status_date_dim_date_snkey as STATUS_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		
		, case when a.dim_currency_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dcurr1.dim_currency_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_CURRENCY_KEY
		, a.dim_currency_snkey as DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_inventory_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dinv1.dim_inventory_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_KEY
		, case when a.dim_inventory_snkey = -2 then -2
				else a.dim_inventory_snkey
			end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_item_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dit1.dim_item_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_ITEM_KEY
		, a.dim_item_snkey as DIM_ITEM_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dle1.dim_legal_entity_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_KEY
		, a.dim_legal_entity_snkey as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
		
		, a.currency_code as CURRENCY_CODE, a.inventory_dimension_id as INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID, a.item_id as ITEM_ID, a.financial_status as FINANCIAL_STATUS, a.reference_category as REFERENCE_CATEGORY, a.status_issue as STATUS_ISSUE, a.status_receipt as STATUS_RECEIPT, a.date_closed as DATE_CLOSED, a.date_expected as DATE_EXPECTED, a.date_financial as DATE_FINANCIAL, a.date_physical as DATE_PHYSICAL, a.inventory_date as INVENTORY_DATE, a.shipping_date_confirmed as SHIPPING_DATE_CONFIRMED, a.shipping_date_requested as SHIPPING_DATE_REQUESTED, a.status_date as STATUS_DATE, a.inventory_transaction_id as INVENTORY_TRANSACTION_ID, a.invoice_id as INVOICE_ID, a.legal_entity as LEGAL_ENTITY, a.packing_slip_id as PACKING_SLIP_ID, a.picking_route_id as PICKING_ROUTE_ID, a.reference_id as REFERENCE_ID, a.voucher as VOUCHER, a.voucher_physical as VOUCHER_PHYSICAL, a.quantity as QUANTITY, a.quantity_settled as QUANTITY_SETTLED, a.cost_amount_adjustment as COST_AMOUNT_ADJUSTMENT, a.cost_amount_operations as COST_AMOUNT_OPERATIONS, a.cost_amount_physical as COST_AMOUNT_PHYSICAL, a.cost_amount_posted as COST_AMOUNT_POSTED, a.cost_amount_settled as COST_AMOUNT_SETTLED, a.cost_amount_standard as COST_AMOUNT_STANDARD, a.inventory_site_id as INVENTORY_SITE_ID, a.inventory_warehouse_id as INVENTORY_WAREHOUSE_ID, a.date_physical_id as DATE_PHYSICAL_ID
		
		, hash(a.source_name, '~', to_char(a.record_id), '~', a.currency_code, '~', a.inventory_dimension_id, '~', a.item_id, '~', a.financial_status, '~', a.reference_category, '~', a.status_issue, '~', a.status_receipt, '~', to_char(a.date_closed, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.date_expected, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.date_financial, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.date_physical, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.inventory_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.shipping_date_confirmed, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.shipping_date_requested, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.status_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', a.inventory_transaction_id, '~', a.invoice_id, '~', a.legal_entity, '~', a.packing_slip_id, '~', a.picking_route_id, '~', a.reference_id, '~', a.voucher, '~', a.voucher_physical, '~', to_char(a.quantity), '~', to_char(a.quantity_settled), '~', to_char(a.cost_amount_adjustment), '~', to_char(a.cost_amount_operations), '~', to_char(a.cost_amount_physical), '~', to_char(a.cost_amount_posted), '~', to_char(a.cost_amount_settled), '~', to_char(a.cost_amount_standard), '~', a.inventory_site_id, '~', a.inventory_warehouse_id, '~', to_char(a.date_physical_id))::number as HK_HASH_KEY
		
		, a.hk_source_name as HK_SOURCE_NAME
		, false::boolean as HK_SOFT_DELETE_FLAG
		, a.hk_source_created_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_source_last_updated_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_created_job_run_id as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID, a.hk_last_updated_job_run_id as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
		, uuid_string()::varchar as HK_WAREHOUSE_ID
	
	from (select 'AXNALA'::varchar as SOURCE_NAME
			, nvl(b.recordid, 0)::number(38, 0) as RECORD_ID
			
			, nvl(b.currencycode, '')::varchar as CURRENCY_CODE
			, nvl(b.inventorydimensionid, '')::varchar as INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID
			, nvl(b.itemid, '')::varchar as ITEM_ID
			, nvl(b.financialstatus, '')::varchar as FINANCIAL_STATUS
			, nvl(b.referencecategory, '')::varchar as REFERENCE_CATEGORY
			, nvl(b.statusissue, '')::varchar as STATUS_ISSUE
			, nvl(b.statusreceipt, '')::varchar as STATUS_RECEIPT
			, case when nvl(b.dateclosed, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.dateclosed < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.dateclosed > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.dateclosed
				end::date as DATE_CLOSED
			, case when nvl(b.dateexpected, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.dateexpected < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.dateexpected > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.dateexpected
				end::date as DATE_EXPECTED
			, case when nvl(b.datefinancial, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.datefinancial < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.datefinancial > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.datefinancial
				end::date as DATE_FINANCIAL
			, case when nvl(b.datephysical, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.datephysical < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.datephysical > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.datephysical
				end::date as DATE_PHYSICAL
			, case when nvl(b.inventorydate, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.inventorydate < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.inventorydate > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.inventorydate
				end::date as INVENTORY_DATE
			, case when nvl(b.shippingdateconfirmed, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.shippingdateconfirmed < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.shippingdateconfirmed > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.shippingdateconfirmed
				end::date as SHIPPING_DATE_CONFIRMED
			, case when nvl(b.shippingdaterequested, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.shippingdaterequested < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.shippingdaterequested > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.shippingdaterequested
				end::date as SHIPPING_DATE_REQUESTED
			, case when nvl(b.statusdate, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.statusdate < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.statusdate > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.statusdate
				end::date as STATUS_DATE
			, nvl(b.inventorytransactionid, '')::varchar as INVENTORY_TRANSACTION_ID
			, nvl(b.invoiceid, '')::varchar as INVOICE_ID
			, nvl(b.legalentity, '')::varchar as LEGAL_ENTITY
			, nvl(b.packingslipid, '')::varchar as PACKING_SLIP_ID
			, nvl(b.pickingrouteid, '')::varchar as PICKING_ROUTE_ID
			, nvl(b.referenceid, '')::varchar as REFERENCE_ID
			, nvl(b.voucher_src, '')::varchar as VOUCHER
			, nvl(b.voucherphysical, '')::varchar as VOUCHER_PHYSICAL
			, nvl(b.quantity_src, 0)::number(28, 16) as QUANTITY
			, nvl(b.quantitysettled, 0)::number(28, 16) as QUANTITY_SETTLED
			, nvl(b.costamountadjustment, 0)::number(28, 16) as COST_AMOUNT_ADJUSTMENT
			, nvl(b.costamountoperations, 0)::number(28, 16) as COST_AMOUNT_OPERATIONS
			, nvl(b.costamountphysical, 0)::number(28, 16) as COST_AMOUNT_PHYSICAL
			, nvl(b.costamountposted, 0)::number(28, 16) as COST_AMOUNT_POSTED
			, nvl(b.costamountsettled, 0)::number(28, 16) as COST_AMOUNT_SETTLED
			, nvl(b.costamountstandard, 0)::number(28, 16) as COST_AMOUNT_STANDARD
			, nvl(b.inventorysiteid, '')::varchar as INVENTORY_SITE_ID
			, nvl(b.inventorywarehouseid, '')::varchar as INVENTORY_WAREHOUSE_ID
			, nvl(b.datephysicalid, 0)::number(38, 0) as DATE_PHYSICAL_ID
			
			, case when nvl(SOURCE_NAME, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME)
				end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DATE_CLOSED, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(DATE_CLOSED, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as DATE_CLOSED_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DATE_EXPECTED, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(DATE_EXPECTED, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as DATE_EXPECTED_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DATE_FINANCIAL, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(DATE_FINANCIAL, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as DATE_FINANCIAL_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DATE_PHYSICAL, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(DATE_PHYSICAL, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as DATE_PHYSICAL_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(INVENTORY_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(INVENTORY_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(SHIPPING_DATE_CONFIRMED, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(SHIPPING_DATE_CONFIRMED, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as SHIPPING_DATE_CONFIRMED_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(SHIPPING_DATE_REQUESTED, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(SHIPPING_DATE_REQUESTED, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as SHIPPING_DATE_REQUESTED_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(STATUS_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(STATUS_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as STATUS_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			
			, case when nvl(CURRENCY_CODE, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', CURRENCY_CODE)
				end::number as DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID)
				end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(ITEM_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash('', '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', ITEM_ID)	-- (NOTE: ITEM_KEY is unique across all source systems; therefore, this field will always be set to '')
				end::number as DIM_ITEM_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY)
				end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
			
			, nvl(b.dw_sourcecode, '')::varchar as HK_SOURCE_NAME
			, '1950-01-01 00:00:00'::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
			, nvl(b.dw_timestamp, '1950-01-01 00:00:00')::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
			, '-1'::varchar as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID
			, nvl(b.dw_batch, '-1')::varchar as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
			
		from (select hk_source_name, hk_job_run_id, hk_created_timestamp, hk_warehouse_id, dw_id, currencykey, inventorykey, inventorytransactiondetailskey, itemkey, legalentitykey, dateclosed, dateexpected, datefinancial, datephysical, inventorydate, shippingdateconfirmed, shippingdaterequested, statusdate, recordid, inventorytransactionid, invoiceid, legalentity, packingslipid, pickingrouteid, referenceid, voucher as VOUCHER_SRC, voucherphysical, quantity as QUANTITY_SRC, quantitysettled, costamountadjustment, costamountoperations, costamountphysical, costamountposted, costamountsettled, costamountstandard, incrementaltimestamp, inventorysiteid, inventorywarehouseid, datephysicalid, currencycode, inventorydimensionid, itemid, financialstatus, referencecategory, statusissue, statusreceipt, dw_batch, dw_sourcecode, dw_timestamp
			from @{pipeline().globalParameters.environment}_raw.edw_dwh.FACTINVENTORYTRANSACTIONS
			) b
			inner join (select min(date_value) as MIN_DATE_VALUE
							, max(date_value) as MAX_DATE_VALUE
						from global.DIM_DATE
						where date_value not in ('1950-01-01', '1951-12-31', '9000-01-01', '9951-12-31')) dd1 on
				1=1
		) a
	left join global.DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM dss1 on
		a.dim_source_system_snkey = dss1.dim_source_system_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd1 on
		a.date_closed_dim_date_snkey = dd1.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd2 on
		a.date_expected_dim_date_snkey = dd2.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd3 on
		a.date_financial_dim_date_snkey = dd3.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd4 on
		a.date_physical_dim_date_snkey = dd4.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd5 on
		a.inventory_date_dim_date_snkey = dd5.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd6 on
		a.shipping_date_confirmed_dim_date_snkey = dd6.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd7 on
		a.shipping_date_requested_dim_date_snkey = dd7.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd8 on
		a.status_date_dim_date_snkey = dd8.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_CURRENCY dcurr1 on
		a.dim_currency_snkey = dcurr1.dim_currency_snkey
	left join global.DIM_INVENTORY dinv1 on
		a.dim_inventory_snkey = dinv1.dim_inventory_snkey
	left join global.DIM_ITEM dit1 on
		a.dim_item_snkey = dit1.dim_item_snkey
	left join global.DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY dle1 on
		a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = dle1.dim_legal_entity_snkey
;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
 f1.DW_Id as DW_ID,
f1.CostKey as COSTKEY,
f1.CurrencyKey as CURRENCYKEY,
f1.DefaultDimensionKey as DEFAULTDIMENSIONKEY,
f1.DeliveryModeKey as DELIVERYMODEKEY,
f1.IntrastatTransactionCodeKey as INTRASTATTRANSACTIONCODEKEY,
f1.InventoryKey as INVENTORYKEY,
f1.ItemKey as ITEMKEY,
f1.LegalEntityKey as LEGALENTITYKEY,
f1.LocationKey as LOCATIONKEY,
f1.ProcurementCategoryKey as PROCUREMENTCATEGORYKEY,
f1.PurchaseOrderKey as PURCHASEORDERKEY,
f1.PurchaseOrderDetailsKey as PURCHASEORDERDETAILSKEY,
f1.ReturnReasonKey as RETURNREASONKEY,
f1.TaxItemGroupKey as TAXITEMGROUPKEY,
f1.UnitOfMeasurePurchaseKey as UNITOFMEASUREPURCHASEKEY,
f1.UnitOfMeasureInventoryKey as UNITOFMEASUREINVENTORYKEY,
f1.VendorInvoiceKey as VENDORINVOICEKEY,
f1.VendorInvoiceHistoryKey as VENDORINVOICEHISTORYKEY,
f1.VendorOrderKey as VENDORORDERKEY,
f1.VendorOrderHistoryKey as VENDORORDERHISTORYKEY,
f1.WorkerOrdererKey as WORKERORDERERKEY,
f1.WorkerRequesterKey as WORKERREQUESTERKEY,
f1.InventoryDate as INVENTORYDATE,
f1.InvoiceDate as INVOICEDATE,
f1.RecordID as RECORDID,
f1.InventoryTransactionID as INVENTORYTRANSACTIONID,
f1.LegalEntity as LEGALENTITY,
f1.PurchaseOrderID as PURCHASEORDERID,
f1.PurchaseInvoiceID as PURCHASEINVOICEID,
f1.LineNumber as LINENUMBER,
f1.PurchaseLineNumber as PURCHASELINENUMBER,
f1.QtyPurchaseUnit as QTYPURCHASEUNIT,
f1.PurchaseUnit as PURCHASEUNIT,
f1.QtyInventoryUnit as QTYINVENTORYUNIT,
f1.InventoryUnit as INVENTORYUNIT,
f1.PriceUnit as PRICEUNIT,
f1.PurchasePrice as PURCHASEPRICE,
f1.NetAmountCompanyCurrency as NETAMOUNTCOMPANYCURRENCY,
f1.NetAmountTransactionCurrency as NETAMOUNTTRANSACTIONCURRENCY,
f1.TaxAmountSettlementCurrency as TAXAMOUNTSETTLEMENTCURRENCY,
f1.StandardCost as STANDARDCOST,
f1.IncrementalTimeStamp as INCREMENTALTIMESTAMP,
case when f1.CostKey in (-1, -2) then f2.inventdimid else dc1.inventorydimensionid end as INVENTORYDIMENSIONID,
case when f1.CostKey in (-1, -2) then f2.itemid else dc1.itemid end as ITEMID,
dc1.pricetype as PRICETYPE,
dc1.activationdate as ACTIVATIONDATE,
dc1.createddatetime as CREATEDDATETIME,
case when f1.CurrencyKey in (-1, -2) then f2.currencycode else dcurr1.currencycode end as CURRENCYCODE,
cast(case when f1.defaultdimensionkey in (-1, -2) then f2.defaultdimension else dd1.defaultdimension end as varchar) as DEFAULTDIMENSION,
case when f1.deliverymodekey in (-1, -2) then f2.dlvmode else ddm1.deliverymodeid end as DELIVERYMODEID,
case when f1.intrastattransactioncodekey in (-1, -2) then f2.transactioncode else distc1.intrastattransactioncode end as INTRASTATTRANSACTIONCODE,
case when f1.LocationKey in (-1, -2) then f2.deliverypostaladdress else dl1.recordid end as RECORDIDLOCATION,
case when f1.ProcurementCategoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.procurementcategory else dspc1.recordid end as PROCUREMENTCATEGORY,
case when f1.ReturnReasonKey in (-1, -2) then f2.returnreasoncodeid else drr1.returnreasonid end as RETURNREASONID,
case when f1.TaxItemGroupKey in (-1, -2) then f2.taxitemgroup else dtig1.taxitemgroupid end as TAXITEMGROUPID,
case when f1.UnitOfMeasureInventoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.unitid else duomi1.unitofmeasurecode end as UNITOFMEASURECODEINVENTORY,
case when f1.UnitOfMeasurePurchaseKey in (-1, -2) then f2.purchunit else duomp1.unitofmeasurecode end as UNITOFMEASURECODEPURCHASE,
case when f1.VendorInvoiceHistoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.invoiceaccount else dvi1.vendoraccountid end as VENDORACCOUNTIDINVOICE,
case when f1.VendorOrderHistoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.orderaccount else dvo1.vendoraccountid end as VENDORACCOUNTIDORDER,
case when f1.WorkerOrdererKey in (-1, -2) then f2.workerpurchplacer else dwo1.recordid end as RECORDIDORDERER,
case when f1.WorkerRequesterKey in (-1, -2) then f2.requester else dwr1.recordid end as RECORDIDREQUESTER,
dpod1.assettransactiontype as ASSETTRANSACTIONTYPE,
dpod1.deliverytype as DELIVERYTYPE,
dpod1.documentstatus as DOCUMENTSTATUS,
dpod1.isstockedproduct as ISSTOCKEDPRODUCT,
dpod1.purchaselinestatus as PURCHASELINESTATUS,
dpod1.purchaseheaderstatus as PURCHASEHEADERSTATUS,
dpod1.purchasetype as PURCHASETYPE,
f1.DW_Batch as DW_BATCH,
f1.DW_SourceCode as DW_SOURCECODE,
f1.DW_TimeStamp as DW_TIMESTAMP

	from dbo.FACTPURCHASEINVOICES f1 with (nolock)
	left join edw_hka.dbo.FACTPURCHASEINVOICES f2 with (nolock) on
		f1.RecordID = f2.RECID
	left join dbo.DIMCOST dc1 with (nolock) on
		f1.costkey = dc1.costkey
	left join dbo.DIMCURRENCY dcurr1 with (nolock) on
		f1.currencykey = dcurr1.currencykey
	left join edw_hka.dbo.DIMDEFAULTDIMENSION dd1 with (nolock) on
		f1.defaultdimensionkey = dd1.defaultdimensionkey
	left join dbo.DIMDELIVERYMODE ddm1 with (nolock) on
		f1.deliverymodekey = ddm1.deliverymodekey
	left join dbo.DIMINTRASTATTRANSACTIONCODE distc1 with (nolock) on
		f1.intrastattransactioncodekey = distc1.intrastattransactioncodekey
	left join dbo.DIMLOCATION dl1 with (nolock) on
		f1.locationkey = dl1.locationkey
	left join dbo.DIMSALESPROCUREMENTCATEGORY dspc1 with (nolock) on
		f1.procurementcategorykey = dspc1.procurementcategorykey
	left join dbo.DIMRETURNREASON drr1 with (nolock) on
		f1.returnreasonkey = drr1.returnreasonkey
	left join dbo.DIMTAXITEMGROUP dtig1 with (nolock) on
		f1.taxitemgroupkey = dtig1.taxitemgroupkey
	left join dbo.DIMUNITOFMEASURE duomi1 with (nolock) on
		f1.unitofmeasureinventorykey = duomi1.unitofmeasurekey
	left join dbo.DIMUNITOFMEASURE duomp1 with (nolock) on
		f1.unitofmeasurepurchasekey = duomp1.unitofmeasurekey
	left join dbo.DIMVENDOR dvi1 with (nolock) on
		f1.vendorinvoicehistorykey = dvi1.vendorhistorykey
	left join dbo.DIMVENDOR dvo1 with (nolock) on
		f1.vendororderhistorykey = dvo1.vendorhistorykey
	left join dbo.DIMWORKER dwo1 with (nolock) on
		f1.workerordererkey = dwo1.workerkey
	left join dbo.DIMWORKER dwr1 with (nolock) on
		f1.workerrequesterkey = dwr1.workerkey
	
	left join dbo.DIMPURCHASEORDERDETAILS dpod1 with (nolock) on
		f1.purchaseorderdetailskey = dpod1.purchaseorderdetailskey
;

activities.name: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

dependsOn.activity: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

text.value:
truncate table global.FACT_PURCHASE_INVOICES;

insert into global.FACT_PURCHASE_INVOICES (fact_purchase_invoices_key, source_name, record_id, dim_source_system_key, dim_source_system_snkey, inventory_date_dim_date_key, inventory_date_dim_date_snkey, invoice_date_dim_date_key, invoice_date_dim_date_snkey, dim_cost_key, dim_cost_snkey, dim_currency_key, dim_currency_snkey, dim_default_dimension_key, dim_default_dimension_snkey, dim_delivery_mode_key, dim_delivery_mode_snkey, dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_key, dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_snkey, dim_inventory_key, dim_inventory_snkey, dim_item_key, dim_item_snkey, dim_legal_entity_key, dim_legal_entity_snkey, dim_location_key, dim_location_snkey, dim_procurement_category_key, dim_procurement_category_snkey, dim_purchase_order_key, dim_purchase_order_snkey, dim_return_reason_key, dim_return_reason_snkey, dim_tax_item_group_key, dim_tax_item_group_snkey, dim_unit_of_measure_inventory_key, dim_unit_of_measure_inventory_snkey, dim_unit_of_measure_purchase_key, dim_unit_of_measure_purchase_snkey, dim_vendor_invoice_key, dim_vendor_invoice_snkey, dim_vendor_order_key, dim_vendor_order_snkey, dim_worker_orderer_key, dim_worker_orderer_snkey, dim_worker_requester_key, dim_worker_requester_snkey, inventory_dimension_id, item_id, price_type, activation_date, created_datetime, currency_code, default_dimension, delivery_mode_id, intra_stat_transaction_code, record_id_location, procurement_category, return_reason_id, tax_item_group_id, unit_of_measure_code_inventory, unit_of_measure_code_purchase, vendor_account_id_invoice, vendor_account_id_order, record_id_orderer, record_id_requester, asset_transaction_type, delivery_type, document_status, is_stocked_product, purchase_line_status,
