text.value:
TRUNCATE TABLE global.FACT_PURCHASE_ORDERS;

INSERT INTO global.FACT_PURCHASE_ORDERS(
FACT_PURCHASE_ORDERS_KEY,
SOURCE_NAME,
LEGAL_ENTITY,
INVENT_TRANS_ID,
DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_KEY,
DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY,
ACCOUNTING_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
ACCOUNTING_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
DIM_CURRENCY_KEY,
DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY,
DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_KEY,
DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY,
DIM_DELIVERY_MODE_KEY,
DIM_DELIVERY_MODE_SNKEY,
DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE_KEY,
DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE_SNKEY,
DIM_INVENTORY_KEY,
DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY,
DIM_ITEM_KEY,
DIM_ITEM_SNKEY,
DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_KEY,
DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY,
DIM_LOCATION_KEY,
DIM_LOCATION_SNKEY,
DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_KEY,
DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_SNKEY,
DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER_KEY,
DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER_SNKEY,
DIM_RETURN_REASON_KEY,
DIM_RETURN_REASON_SNKEY,
DIM_TAX_ITEM_GROUP_KEY,
DIM_TAX_ITEM_GROUP_SNKEY,
DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_INVENTORY_KEY,
DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_INVENTORY_SNKEY,
DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_PURCHASE_KEY,
DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_PURCHASE_SNKEY,
DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_KEY,
DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_SNKEY,
DIM_VENDOR_ORDER_KEY,
DIM_VENDOR_ORDER_SNKEY,
DIM_WAREHOUSE_KEY,
DIM_WAREHOUSE_SNKEY,
DIM_WORKER_ORDERER_KEY,
DIM_WORKER_ORDERER_SNKEY,
DIM_WORKER_REQUESTER_KEY,
DIM_WORKER_REQUESTER_SNKEY,
CURRENCY_CODE,
DEFAULT_DIMENSION,
QTY_ORDERED,
ITEM_ID,
UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY,
QTY_PURCHASE_UNIT,
UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE,
PRICE_UNIT,
PURCH_PRICE,
NET_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY,
ACCOUNTING_DATE,
EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE,
INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID,
PURCHASE_HEADER_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE,
PURCHASE_HEADER_UTC_CREATED_DATE,
PURCHASE_LINE_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE,
PURCHASE_LINE_UTC_CREATED_DATE,
PURCHASE_HEADER_DELIVERY_DATE,
DELIVERY_MODE_ID,
RETURN_REASON_ID,
RECORD_ID_ORDERER,
RECORD_ID_REQUESTER,
VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE,
VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER,
WAREHOUSE_ID,
PURCHASE_HEADER_SHIP_BY_DATE,
PURCHASE_LINE_DELIVERY_DATE,
PURCHASE_LINE_SHIP_BY_DATE,
PURCHASE_ORDER_ID,
LINE_NUMBER,
QTY_INVENTORY_UNIT,
PURCHASE_UNIT,
LINE_AMOUNT,
ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE,
DELIVERY_TYPE,
DOCUMENT_STATUS,
IS_STOCKED_PRODUCT,
PURCHASE_LINE_STATUS,
PURCHASE_HEADER_STATUS,
PURCHASE_TYPE,
DROP_SHIPMENT,
RECORD_ID_LOCATION,
INVOICE_DATE,
INVENTORY_DATE,
TRANSACTION_CODE,
PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY,
TAX_ITEM_GROUP_ID,
HK_HASH_KEY,
HK_SOURCE_NAME,
HK_SOFT_DELETE_FLAG,
HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID,
HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID,
HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_WAREHOUSE_ID
)
SELECT 
hash(a.SOURCE_NAME,'~',a.LEGAL_ENTITY ,'~',a.INVENT_TRANS_ID)::number as FACT_PURCHASE_ORDERS_KEY 
,a.SOURCE_NAME
,a.LEGAL_ENTITY
,a.INVENT_TRANS_ID
,case when a.source_name = '' then -2
			else nvl(dss1.dim_source_system_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_KEY
,a.DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
, nvl(dd3.dim_date_key, -1)::number as ACCOUNTING_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
,a.ACCOUNTING_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
, nvl(dd1.dim_date_key, -1)::number as INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
, a.inventory_date_dim_date_snkey as INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
, case when a.dim_currency_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dcurr1.dim_currency_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_CURRENCY_KEY
,a.DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_default_dimension_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(ddim1.dim_default_dimension_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_KEY
,a.DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_delivery_mode_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(ddm1.dim_delivery_mode_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_DELIVERY_MODE_KEY
,a.DIM_DELIVERY_MODE_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(distc1.dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_key, -1)
		end::number as DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE_KEY
,a.DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_inventory_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dinv1.dim_inventory_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_KEY
,a.DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_item_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dit1.dim_item_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_ITEM_KEY
,a.DIM_ITEM_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dle1.dim_legal_entity_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_KEY
,a.DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_location_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dl1.dim_location_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LOCATION_KEY
,a.DIM_LOCATION_SNKEY
		, case when a.DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_SNKEY= -2 then -2
				else nvl(dspc1.DIM_SALES_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_KEY, -1)
			end::number as DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_KEY
,a.DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_purchase_order_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dpo1.dim_purchase_order_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER_KEY
,a.DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_return_reason_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(drr1.dim_return_reason_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_RETURN_REASON_KEY
,a.DIM_RETURN_REASON_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_tax_item_group_snkey = -2 then -2
	 		else nvl(dtig1.dim_tax_item_group_key, -1)
		 end::number as DIM_TAX_ITEM_GROUP_KEY
,a.DIM_TAX_ITEM_GROUP_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_unit_of_measure_inventory_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(duomi1.dim_unit_of_measure_key, -1)
		end::number as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_INVENTORY_KEY
,a.DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_INVENTORY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_unit_of_measure_purchase_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(duomp1.dim_unit_of_measure_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_PURCHASE_KEY
,a.DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_PURCHASE_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_vendor_invoice_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dvi1.dim_vendor_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_KEY
,a.DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_vendor_order_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dvo1.dim_vendor_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_VENDOR_ORDER_KEY
,a.DIM_VENDOR_ORDER_SNKEY
		, case when a.DIM_WAREHOUSE_SNKEY = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dwh1.DIM_WAREHOUSE_KEY, -1)
			end::number as DIM_WAREHOUSE_KEY
,a.DIM_WAREHOUSE_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_worker_orderer_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dwo1.dim_worker_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_WORKER_ORDERER_KEY
,a.DIM_WORKER_ORDERER_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_worker_requester_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dwr1.dim_worker_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_WORKER_REQUESTER_KEY
,a.DIM_WORKER_REQUESTER_SNKEY
,a.CURRENCY_CODE
,a.DEFAULT_DIMENSION
,a.QTY_ORDERED
,a.ITEM_ID
,a.UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY
,a.QTY_PURCHASE_UNIT
,a.UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE
,a.PRICE_UNIT
,a.PURCH_PRICE
,a.NET_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY
,a.ACCOUNTING_DATE
,a.EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE
,a.INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID
,a.PURCHASE_HEADER_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE
,a.PURCHASE_HEADER_UTC_CREATED_DATE
,a.PURCHASE_LINE_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE
,a.PURCHASE_LINE_UTC_CREATED_DATE
,a.PURCHASE_HEADER_DELIVERY_DATE
,a.DELIVERY_MODE_ID
,a.RETURN_REASON_ID
,a.RECORD_ID_ORDERER
,a.RECORD_ID_REQUESTER
,a.VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE
,a.VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER
,a.WAREHOUSE_ID
,a.PURCHASE_HEADER_SHIP_BY_DATE
,a.PURCHASE_LINE_DELIVERY_DATE
,a.PURCHASE_LINE_SHIP_BY_DATE
,a.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID
,a.LINE_NUMBER
,a.QTY_INVENTORY_UNIT
,a.PURCHASE_UNIT
,a.LINE_AMOUNT
,a.ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE
,a.DELIVERY_TYPE
,a.DOCUMENT_STATUS
,a.IS_STOCKED_PRODUCT
,a.PURCHASE_LINE_STATUS
,a.PURCHASE_HEADER_STATUS
,a.PURCHASE_TYPE
,a.DROP_SHIPMENT
,a.RECORD_ID_LOCATION
,a.INVOICE_DATE
,a.INVENTORY_DATE
,a.TRANSACTION_CODE
,a.PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY
,a.TAX_ITEM_GROUP_ID
,hash(a.source_name, '~', a.legal_entity, '~', a.invent_trans_id, '~', a.currency_code, '~', a.default_dimension, '~', to_char(a.qty_ordered), '~', a.item_id, '~', a.unit_of_measure_code_inventory, '~', to_char(a.qty_purchase_unit), '~', a.unit_of_measure_code_purchase, '~', to_char(a.price_unit), '~', to_char(a.purch_price), '~', to_char(a.net_amount_transaction_currency), '~', to_char(a.accounting_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'), '~', to_char(a.earliest_confirmed_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'), '~', a.inventory_dimension_id, '~', to_char(a.purchase_header_local_created_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.purchase_header_utc_created_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'), '~', to_char(a.purchase_line_local_created_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.purchase_line_utc_created_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'), '~', to_char(a.purchase_header_delivery_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'), '~', a.delivery_mode_id, '~', a.return_reason_id, '~', to_char(a.record_id_orderer), '~', to_char(a.record_id_requester), '~', a.vendor_account_id_invoice, '~', a.vendor_account_id_order, '~', a.warehouse_id, '~', to_char(a.purchase_header_ship_by_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'), '~', to_char(a.purchase_line_delivery_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'), '~', to_char(a.purchase_line_ship_by_date, 'yyyymmddhh24missff3'),  '~', a.purchase_order_id, '~', to_char(a.line_number), '~', to_char(a.qty_inventory_unit), '~', a.purchase_unit, '~', to_char(a.line_amount), '~', a.asset_transaction_type, '~', a.delivery_type, '~', a.document_status, '~', a.is_stocked_product, '~', a.purchase_line_status, '~', a.purchase_header_status, '~', a.purchase_type, '~', a.drop_shipment, '~', to_char(a.record_id_location), '~', to_char(a.invoice_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.inventory_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~',a.transaction_code, '~', to_char(a.procurement_category), '~',a.tax_item_group_id) AS  HK_HASH_KEY
, a.hk_source_name as HK_SOURCE_NAME
, false::boolean as HK_SOFT_DELETE_FLAG
, a.hk_source_created_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_source_last_updated_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_created_job_run_id as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID, a.hk_last_updated_job_run_id as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
, uuid_string()::varchar as HK_WAREHOUSE_ID
FROM
(SELECT     'AXNALA'::varchar as SOURCE_NAME
            , nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY,'') as LEGAL_ENTITY
            , nvl(INVENT_TRANS_ID, '') AS INVENT_TRANS_ID  
            , case when nvl(SOURCE_NAME, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME)
				end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(ACCOUNTING_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(ACCOUNTING_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as ACCOUNTING_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY               
			, case when nvl(INVENTORY_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(INVENTORY_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(INVOICE_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(INVOICE_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as INVOICE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(CURRENCY_CODE, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', CURRENCY_CODE)
				end::number as DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DEFAULT_DIMENSION, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', DEFAULT_DIMENSION)
				end::number as DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(DELIVERY_MODE_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', DELIVERY_MODE_ID)
				end::number as DIM_DELIVERY_MODE_SNKEY
         , case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY,'') = '' or nvl(TRANSACTION_CODE,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', TRANSACTION_CODE)
				end::number as DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID)
				end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(ITEM_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash('', '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', ITEM_ID)	-- (NOTE: ITEM_KEY is unique across all source systems; therefore, this field will always be set to '')
				end::number as DIM_ITEM_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY)
				end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(RECORD_ID_LOCATION, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(RECORD_ID_LOCATION))
				end::number as DIM_LOCATION_SNKEY
			, case when  nvl(PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY)) 
				end::number as DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(PURCHASE_ORDER_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', PURCHASE_ORDER_ID)
				end::number as DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(RETURN_REASON_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', RETURN_REASON_ID)
				end::number as DIM_RETURN_REASON_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY,'') = '' or nvl(TAX_ITEM_GROUP_ID,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', nvl(TAX_ITEM_GROUP_ID,''))
				end::number as DIM_TAX_ITEM_GROUP_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY)
				end::number as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_INVENTORY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE)
				end::number as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_PURCHASE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY,'') = '' or nvl(VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE)
				end::number as DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY,'') = '' or nvl(VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER)
				end::number as DIM_VENDOR_ORDER_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY,'') = '' or nvl(WAREHOUSE_ID,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', WAREHOUSE_ID)
				end::number as DIM_WAREHOUSE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(RECORD_ID_ORDERER, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(RECORD_ID_ORDERER))
				end::number as DIM_WORKER_ORDERER_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(RECORD_ID_REQUESTER, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(RECORD_ID_REQUESTER))
				end::number as DIM_WORKER_REQUESTER_SNKEY
            ,NVL(CURRENCY_CODE,'') AS CURRENCY_CODE
            ,NVL(DEFAULT_DIMENSION,'') AS DEFAULT_DIMENSION
            ,NVL(QTY_INVENTORY_UNIT, 0) AS QTY_ORDERED
            ,NVL(ITEM_ID,'') AS ITEM_ID
            ,NVL(UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY,'') AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY
            ,NVL(QTY_PURCHASE_UNIT,0) AS QTY_PURCHASE_UNIT
            ,NVL(UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE,'') AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE
            ,NVL(PRICE_UNIT,0) AS PRICE_UNIT
            ,NVL(PURCH_PRICE,0) AS PURCH_PRICE
            ,NVL(NET_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY,0) AS NET_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY
            ,case when nvl(ACCOUNTING_DATE, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
                when ACCOUNTING_DATE < MIN_DATE_VALUE then '1951-12-31'
                when ACCOUNTING_DATE > MAX_DATE_VALUE then '9951-12-31'
                else ACCOUNTING_DATE
            end::TIMESTAMP_TZ AS ACCOUNTING_DATE
            ,case when nvl(EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
                when EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE < MIN_DATE_VALUE then '1951-12-31'
                when EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE > MAX_DATE_VALUE then '9951-12-31'
                else EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE
            end::TIMESTAMP_TZ AS EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE
            ,NVL(INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID,'') AS INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID
            ,NVL( PURCHASE_HEADER_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE,'1900-01-01') AS PURCHASE_HEADER_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_HEADER_UTC_CREATED_DATE,'1900-01-01') AS PURCHASE_HEADER_UTC_CREATED_DATE
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_LINE_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE,'1900-01-01') AS PURCHASE_LINE_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_LINE_UTC_CREATED_DATE,'1900-01-01') AS PURCHASE_LINE_UTC_CREATED_DATE
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_HEADER_DELIVERY_DATE,'1900-01-01') AS PURCHASE_HEADER_DELIVERY_DATE
            ,NVL(DELIVERY_MODE_ID,'') AS DELIVERY_MODE_ID
            ,NVL(RETURN_REASON_ID,'') AS RETURN_REASON_ID
            ,NVL(RECORD_ID_ORDERER,0) AS RECORD_ID_ORDERER
            ,NVL(RECORD_ID_REQUESTER,0) AS RECORD_ID_REQUESTER
            ,NVL(VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE,'') AS VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE
            ,NVL(VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER,'') AS VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER
            ,NVL(WAREHOUSE_ID,'') AS WAREHOUSE_ID
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_HEADER_SHIP_BY_DATE,'1900-01-01') AS PURCHASE_HEADER_SHIP_BY_DATE
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_LINE_DELIVERY_DATE,'1900-01-01') AS PURCHASE_LINE_DELIVERY_DATE
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_LINE_SHIP_BY_DATE,'1900-01-01') AS PURCHASE_LINE_SHIP_BY_DATE
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_ORDER_ID,'') AS PURCHASE_ORDER_ID
            ,NVL(LINE_NUMBER,0) AS LINE_NUMBER
            ,NVL(QTY_INVENTORY_UNIT,0) AS QTY_INVENTORY_UNIT
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_UNIT,'') AS PURCHASE_UNIT
            ,NVL(NET_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY,0) AS LINE_AMOUNT
            ,NVL(ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE,'') AS ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE
            ,NVL(DELIVERY_TYPE,'') AS DELIVERY_TYPE
            ,NVL(DOCUMENT_STATUS,'') AS DOCUMENT_STATUS
            ,NVL(IS_STOCKED_PRODUCT,'') AS IS_STOCKED_PRODUCT
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_LINE_STATUS,'') AS PURCHASE_LINE_STATUS
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_HEADER_STATUS,'') AS PURCHASE_HEADER_STATUS
            ,NVL(PURCHASE_TYPE,'') AS PURCHASE_TYPE
            ,NVL(DROP_SHIPMENT,'') AS DROP_SHIPMENT
            ,NVL(RECORD_ID_LOCATION,0) AS RECORD_ID_LOCATION
            ,case when nvl(INVOICE_DATE, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
                when INVOICE_DATE < MIN_DATE_VALUE then '1951-12-31'
                when INVOICE_DATE > MAX_DATE_VALUE then '9951-12-31'
                else INVOICE_DATE
            end::DATE AS INVOICE_DATE
            ,case when nvl(INVENTORY_DATE, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
                when INVENTORY_DATE < MIN_DATE_VALUE then '1951-12-31'
                when INVENTORY_DATE > MAX_DATE_VALUE then '9951-12-31'
                else INVENTORY_DATE
            end::DATE AS INVENTORY_DATE
			, NVL(TRANSACTION_CODE,'') AS TRANSACTION_CODE
			, NVL(PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY,0) AS PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY
			, NVL(TAX_ITEM_GROUP_ID,'') AS TAX_ITEM_GROUP_ID
            , nvl(b.dw_sourcecode, '')::varchar as HK_SOURCE_NAME
			, '1950-01-01 00:00:00'::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
			, nvl(b.dw_timestamp, '1950-01-01 00:00:00')::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
			, '-1'::varchar as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID
			, nvl(b.dw_batch, '-1')::varchar as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
            FROM 
(SELECT
HK_SOURCE_NAME,
HK_JOB_RUN_ID,
HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_WAREHOUSE_ID,
ACCOUNTINGDATE AS ACCOUNTING_DATE,
EARLIESTCONFIRMEDDATE AS EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE,
PURCHASEHEADERLOCALCREATEDDATE AS PURCHASE_HEADER_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE,
PURCHASEHEADERUTCCREATEDDATE AS PURCHASE_HEADER_UTC_CREATED_DATE,
PURCHASELINELOCALCREATEDDATE AS PURCHASE_LINE_LOCAL_CREATED_DATE,
PURCHASELINEUTCCREATEDDATE AS PURCHASE_LINE_UTC_CREATED_DATE,
HEADERDELIVERYDATE AS PURCHASE_HEADER_DELIVERY_DATE,
HEADERSHIPBYDATE AS PURCHASE_HEADER_SHIP_BY_DATE,
LINEDELIVERYDATE AS PURCHASE_LINE_DELIVERY_DATE,
LINESHIPBYDATE AS PURCHASE_LINE_SHIP_BY_DATE,
LEGALENTITY AS LEGAL_ENTITY,
INVENTORYTRANSACTIONID AS INVENT_TRANS_ID,
PURCHASEORDERID AS PURCHASE_ORDER_ID,
LINENUMBER AS LINE_NUMBER,
QTYINVENTORYUNIT AS QTY_INVENTORY_UNIT,
INVENTORYUNIT,
QTYPURCHASEUNIT AS QTY_PURCHASE_UNIT,
PURCHASEUNIT AS PURCHASE_UNIT ,
PRICEUNIT AS PRICE_UNIT,
PURCHASEPRICE AS PURCH_PRICE,
NETAMOUNTTRANSACTIONCURRENCY AS NET_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY,
INCREMENTALTIMESTAMP,
DROPSHIPMENT AS DROP_SHIPMENT,
CURRENCYCODE AS CURRENCY_CODE,
DEFAULTDIMENSION AS DEFAULT_DIMENSION,
DELIVERYMODEID AS DELIVERY_MODE_ID,
INTRASTATTRANSACTIONCODE AS TRANSACTION_CODE,
INVENTORYDIMENSIONID INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID,
DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS AS RECORD_ID_LOCATION,
PROCUREMENTCATEGORY_RECORDID AS PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY,
RETURNREASONID AS RETURN_REASON_ID,
TAXITEMGROUPID AS TAX_ITEM_GROUP_ID,
INVENTORYUNITOFMEASURECODE AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY,
PURCHASEUNITOFMEASURECODE AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE,
INVOICEACCOUNT AS VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE,
ORDERACCOUNT AS VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER,
RECORD_ID_ORDERER,
RECORD_ID_REQUESTER,
ITEMID AS ITEM_ID,
INVENTDATE AS INVENTORY_DATE,
INVENTLOCATIONID AS WAREHOUSE_ID,
ASSETTRANSACTIONTYPE AS ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE,
DELIVERYTYPE AS DELIVERY_TYPE,
DOCUMENTSTATUS AS DOCUMENT_STATUS,
ISSTOCKEDPRODUCT AS IS_STOCKED_PRODUCT,
PURCHASELINESTATUS AS PURCHASE_LINE_STATUS,
PURCHASEHEADERSTATUS AS PURCHASE_HEADER_STATUS ,
PURCHASETYPE AS PURCHASE_TYPE,
INVOICEDATE AS INVOICE_DATE,
-- TRANSACTIONCODE AS TRANSACTION_CODE,
-- PROCUREMENTCATEGORY AS PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY,
-- TAXITEMGROUP AS TAX_ITEM_GROUP_ID,
DW_BATCH,
DW_SOURCECODE,
DW_TIMESTAMP
FROM @{pipeline().globalParameters.environment}_RAW.EDW_DWH.FACTPURCHASEORDERS) b
			inner join (select min(date_value) as MIN_DATE_VALUE
							, max(date_value) as MAX_DATE_VALUE
						from global.DIM_DATE
						where date_value not in ('1950-01-01', '1951-12-31', '9000-01-01', '9951-12-31')) dd1 on
				1=1
		) a
	left join global.DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM dss1 on
		a.dim_source_system_snkey = dss1.dim_source_system_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd1 on
		a.inventory_date_dim_date_snkey = dd1.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd2 on
		a.invoice_date_dim_date_snkey = dd2.dim_date_snkey
    left join global.DIM_DATE dd3 on
		a.ACCOUNTING_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY = dd3.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_CURRENCY dcurr1 on
		a.dim_currency_snkey = dcurr1.dim_currency_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION ddim1 on
		a.dim_default_dimension_snkey = ddim1.dim_default_dimension_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DELIVERY_MODE ddm1 on
		a.dim_delivery_mode_snkey = ddm1.dim_delivery_mode_snkey
	left join global.DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE distc1 on
		a.dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_snkey = distc1.dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_snkey
	left join global.DIM_INVENTORY dinv1 on
		a.dim_inventory_snkey = dinv1.dim_inventory_snkey
	left join global.DIM_ITEM dit1 on
		a.dim_item_snkey = dit1.dim_item_snkey
	left join global.DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY dle1 on
		a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = dle1.dim_legal_entity_snkey
	left join global.DIM_LOCATION dl1 on
		a.dim_location_snkey = dl1.dim_location_snkey
	left join global.DIM_SALES_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY dspc1 on
		a.dim_procurement_category_snkey = dspc1.dim_sales_procurement_category_snkey
	left join global.DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER dpo1 on
		a.dim_purchase_order_snkey = dpo1.dim_purchase_order_snkey
	left join global.DIM_RETURN_REASON drr1 on
		a.dim_return_reason_snkey = drr1.dim_return_reason_snkey
	left join global.DIM_TAX_ITEM_GROUP dtig1 on
		a.dim_tax_item_group_snkey = dtig1.dim_tax_item_group_snkey
	left join global.DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE duomi1 on
		a.dim_unit_of_measure_inventory_snkey = duomi1.dim_unit_of_measure_snkey
	left join global.DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE duomp1 on
		a.dim_unit_of_measure_purchase_snkey = duomp1.dim_unit_of_measure_snkey
	left join global.DIM_VENDOR dvi1 on
	    a.dim_vendor_invoice_snkey = dvi1.dim_vendor_snkey and
	    a.INVOICE_DATE >= dvi1.hk_effective_start_timestamp and
		a.INVOICE_DATE < dvi1.hk_effective_end_timestamp
	left join global.DIM_VENDOR dvo1 on
		a.dim_vendor_order_snkey = dvo1.dim_vendor_snkey and
		a.INVOICE_DATE >= dvo1.hk_effective_start_timestamp and
	    a.INVOICE_DATE < dvo1.hk_effective_end_timestamp
	left join global.DIM_WAREHOUSE dwh1 on
		a.DIM_WAREHOUSE_SNKEY = dwh1.DIM_WAREHOUSE_SNKEY
    left join global.DIM_WORKER dwo1 on
		a.dim_worker_orderer_snkey = dwo1.dim_worker_snkey
	left join global.DIM_WORKER dwr1 on
		a.dim_worker_requester_snkey = dwr1.dim_worker_snkey
;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select --top (10)
f1.DW_Id as DW_ID,
f1.CurrencyKey as CURRENCYKEY,
f1.DataSourceKey as DATASOURCEKEY,
f1.DefaultDimensionKey as DEFAULTDIMENSIONKEY,
f1.DeliveryModeKey as DELIVERYMODEKEY,
f1.IntrastatTransactionCodeKey as INTRASTATTRANSACTIONCODEKEY,
f1.InventoryKey as INVENTORYKEY,
f1.ItemKey as ITEMKEY,
f1.LegalEntityKey as LEGALENTITYKEY,
f1.LocationKey as LOCATIONKEY,
f1.ProcurementCategoryKey as PROCUREMENTCATEGORYKEY,
f1.PurchaseOrderKey as PURCHASEORDERKEY,
f1.PurchaseOrderDetailsKey as PURCHASEORDERDETAILSKEY,
f1.ReturnReasonKey as RETURNREASONKEY,
f1.UnitOfMeasurePurchaseKey as UNITOFMEASUREPURCHASEKEY,
f1.UnitOfMeasureInventoryKey as UNITOFMEASUREINVENTORYKEY,
f1.VendorInvoiceKey as VENDORINVOICEKEY,
f1.VendorInvoiceHistoryKey as VENDORINVOICEHISTORYKEY,
f1.VendorOrderKey as VENDORORDERKEY,
f1.VendorOrderHistoryKey as VENDORORDERHISTORYKEY,
f1.WorkerOrdererKey as WORKERORDERERKEY,
f1.WorkerRequesterKey as WORKERREQUESTERKEY,
f1.AccountingDate as ACCOUNTINGDATE,
f1.InventoryDate as INVENTORYDATE,
f1.PurchaseLineExpectedDeliveryDate as PURCHASELINEEXPECTEDDELIVERYDATE,
f1.ReceivedDate as RECEIVEDDATE,
f1.TargetDeliveryDate as TARGETDELIVERYDATE,
f1.RecordID as RECORDID,
f1.InventoryTransactionID as INVENTORYTRANSACTIONID,
f1.LegalEntity as LEGALENTITY,
f1.PurchaseOrderID as PURCHASEORDERID,
f1.PurchaseReceiptID as PURCHASERECEIPTID,
f1.LineNumber as LINENUMBER,
f1.PurchaseLineNumber as PURCHASELINENUMBER,
f1.QtyInventoryUnit as QTYINVENTORYUNIT,
f1.InventoryUnit as INVENTORYUNIT,
f1.QtyPurchaseUnit as QTYPURCHASEUNIT,
f1.PurchaseUnit as PURCHASEUNIT,
f1.NetAmountTransactionCurrency as NETAMOUNTTRANSACTIONCURRENCY,
f1.IncrementalTimeStamp as INCREMENTALTIMESTAMP,
case when f1.CurrencyKey in (-1, -2) then f2.currencycode else dcurr1.currencycode end as CURRENCYCODE,
cast(case when f1.defaultdimensionkey in (-1, -2) then f2.defaultdimension else dd1.defaultdimension end as varchar) as DEFAULTDIMENSION,
case when f1.deliverymodekey in (-1, -2) then f2.dlvmode else ddm1.deliverymodeid end as DELIVERYMODEID,
case when f1.intrastattransactioncodekey in (-1, -2) then f2.transactioncode else distc1.intrastattransactioncode end as INTRASTATTRANSACTIONCODE,
case when f1.InventoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.inventdimid else dinv1.inventorydimensionid end as INVENTORYDIMENSIONID,
case when f1.ItemKey in (-1, -2) then f2.itemid else dit1.itemid end as ITEMID,
case when f1.LocationKey in (-1, -2) then f2.deliverypostaladdress else dl1.recordid end as RECORDIDLOCATION,
case when f1.ProcurementCategoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.procurementcategory else dspc1.recordid end as PROCUREMENTCATEGORY,
case when f1.ReturnReasonKey in (-1, -2) then f2.returnreasoncodeid else drr1.returnreasonid end as RETURNREASONID,
case when f1.UnitOfMeasureInventoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.unitid else duomi1.unitofmeasurecode end as UNITOFMEASURECODEINVENTORY,
case when f1.UnitOfMeasurePurchaseKey in (-1, -2) then f2.purchunit else duomp1.unitofmeasurecode end as UNITOFMEASURECODEPURCHASE,
case when f1.VendorInvoiceHistoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.invoiceaccount else dvi1.vendoraccountid end as VENDORACCOUNTIDINVOICE,
case when f1.VendorOrderHistoryKey in (-1, -2) then f2.orderaccount else dvo1.vendoraccountid end as VENDORACCOUNTIDORDER,
case when f1.WorkerOrdererKey in (-1, -2) then f2.workerpurchplacer else dwo1.recordid end as RECORDIDORDERER,
case when f1.WorkerRequesterKey in (-1, -2) then f2.requester else dwr1.recordid end as RECORDIDREQUESTER,
dpod1.assettransactiontype as ASSETTRANSACTIONTYPE,
dpod1.deliverytype as DELIVERYTYPE,
dpod1.documentstatus as DOCUMENTSTATUS,
dpod1.isstockedproduct as ISSTOCKEDPRODUCT,
dpod1.purchaselinestatus as PURCHASELINESTATUS,
dpod1.purchaseheaderstatus as PURCHASEHEADERSTATUS,
dpod1.purchasetype as PURCHASETYPE,
f1.DW_Batch as DW_BATCH,
f1.DW_SourceCode as DW_SOURCECODE,
f1.DW_TimeStamp as DW_TIMESTAMP


	from dbo.FACTPURCHASERECEIPTS f1 with (nolock)
	left join edw_hka.dbo.FACTPURCHASERECEIPTS f2 with (nolock) on
		f1.RecordID = f2.RECID
	left join dbo.DIMCURRENCY dcurr1 with (nolock) on
		f1.currencykey = dcurr1.currencykey
	left join edw_hka.dbo.DIMDEFAULTDIMENSION dd1 with (nolock) on
		f1.defaultdimensionkey = dd1.defaultdimensionkey
	left join dbo.DIMDELIVERYMODE ddm1 with (nolock) on
		f1.deliverymodekey = ddm1.deliverymodekey
	left join dbo.DIMINTRASTATTRANSACTIONCODE distc1 with (nolock) on
		f1.intrastattransactioncodekey = distc1.intrastattransactioncodekey
	left join dbo.DIMINVENTORY dinv1 with (nolock) on
		f1.inventorykey = dinv1.inventorykey
	left join dbo.DIMITEM dit1 with (nolock) on
		f1.itemkey = dit1.itemkey
	left join dbo.DIMLOCATION dl1 with (nolock) on
		f1.locationkey = dl1.locationkey
	left join dbo.DIMSALESPROCUREMENTCATEGORY dspc1 with (nolock) on
		f1.procurementcategorykey = dspc1.procurementcategorykey
	left join dbo.DIMRETURNREASON drr1 with (nolock) on
		f1.returnreasonkey = drr1.returnreasonkey
	left join dbo.DIMUNITOFMEASURE duomi1 with (nolock) on
		f1.unitofmeasureinventorykey = duomi1.unitofmeasurekey
	left join dbo.DIMUNITOFMEASURE duomp1 with (nolock) on
		f1.unitofmeasurepurchasekey = duomp1.unitofmeasurekey
	left join dbo.DIMVENDOR dvi1 with (nolock) on
		f1.vendorinvoicehistorykey = dvi1.vendorhistorykey
	left join dbo.DIMVENDOR dvo1 with (nolock) on
		f1.vendororderhistorykey = dvo1.vendorhistorykey
	left join dbo.DIMWORKER dwo1 with (nolock) on
		f1.workerordererkey = dwo1.workerkey
	left join dbo.DIMWORKER dwr1 with (nolock) on
		f1.workerrequesterkey = dwr1.workerkey
	
	left join dbo.DIMPURCHASEORDERDETAILS dpod1 with (nolock) on
		f1.purchaseorderdetailskey = dpod1.purchaseorderdetailskey;

activities.name: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

dependsOn.activity: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

text.value:
truncate table global.FACT_PURCHASE_RECEIPTS;

insert into global.FACT_PURCHASE_RECEIPTS (fact_purchase_receipts_key, source_name, record_id, dim_source_system_key, dim_source_system_snkey, accounting_date_dim_date_key, accounting_date_dim_date_snkey, inventory_date_dim_date_key, inventory_date_dim_date_snkey, purchase_line_expected_delivery_date_dim_date_key, purchase_line_expected_delivery_date_dim_date_snkey, received_date_dim_date_key, received_date_dim_date_snkey, target_delivery_date_dim_date_key, target_delivery_date_dim_date_snkey, dim_currency_key, dim_currency_snkey, dim_default_dimension_key, dim_default_dimension_snkey, dim_delivery_mode_key, dim_delivery_mode_snkey, dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_key, dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_snkey, dim_inventory_key, dim_inventory_snkey, dim_item_key, dim_item_snkey, dim_legal_entity_key, dim_legal_entity_snkey, dim_location_key, dim_location_snkey, dim_procurement_category_key, dim_procurement_category_snkey, dim_purchase_order_key, dim_purchase_order_snkey, dim_return_reason_key, dim_return_reason_snkey, dim_unit_of_measure_inventory_key, dim_unit_of_measure_inventory_snkey, dim_unit_of_measure_purchase_key, dim_unit_of_measure_purchase_snkey, dim_vendor_invoice_key, dim_vendor_invoice_snkey, dim_vendor_order_key, dim_vendor_order_snkey, dim_worker_orderer_key, dim_worker_orderer_snkey, dim_worker_requester_key, dim_worker_requester_snkey, currency_code, default_dimension, delivery_mode_id, intra_stat_transaction_code, inventory_dimension_id, item_id, record_id_location, procurement_category, return_reason_id, unit_of_measure_code_inventory, unit_of_measure_code_purchase, vendor_account_id_invoice, vendor_account_id_order, record_id_orderer, record_id_requester, asset_transaction_type, delivery_type, document_status, is_stocked_product, purchase_line_status, purchase_header_status, purchase_type, accounting_date, inventory_date, purchase_line_expected_delivery_date, received_date, target_delivery_date, inventory_transaction_id, legal_entity, purchase_order_id, purchase_receipt_id, line_number, purchase_line_number, qty_inventory_unit, inventory_unit, qty_purchase_unit, purchase_unit, net_amount_transaction_currency, hk_hash_key, hk_source_name, hk_soft_delete_flag, hk_source_created_timestamp, hk_source_last_updated_timestamp, hk_created_job_run_id, hk_last_updated_job_run_id, hk_created_timestamp, hk_last_updated_timestamp, hk_warehouse_id)
	select hash(a.source_name, '~', to_char(a.record_id))::number as FACT_PURCHASE_RECEIPTS_KEY
		, a.source_name as SOURCE_NAME, a.record_id as RECORD_ID
		
		, case when a.source_name = '' then -2
			else nvl(dss1.dim_source_system_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_KEY
		, a.dim_source_system_snkey as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
		
		, nvl(dd1.dim_date_key, -1)::number as ACCOUNTING_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.accounting_date_dim_date_snkey as ACCOUNTING_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd2.dim_date_key, -1)::number as INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.inventory_date_dim_date_snkey as INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd3.dim_date_key, -1)::number as PURCHASE_LINE_EXPECTED_DELIVERY_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.purchase_line_expected_delivery_date_dim_date_snkey as PURCHASE_LINE_EXPECTED_DELIVERY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd4.dim_date_key, -1)::number as RECEIVED_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.received_date_dim_date_snkey as RECEIVED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		, nvl(dd5.dim_date_key, -1)::number as TARGET_DELIVERY_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
		, a.target_delivery_date_dim_date_snkey as TARGET_DELIVERY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
		
		
		/***************************************************************************************************************************************************************
		NOTE: any set of KEY/SNKEY combinations that are set to -1 are due to this FACT table being part of "wave 3" while the DIM tables are "wave 2".
			We cannot guarantee that any "wave 2" DIMs are going to be migrated at or near the same time as "wave 3" tables; therefore, these DIMs will be technical debt
			and will be fixed later.
		****************************************************************************************************************************************************************/
		, case when a.dim_currency_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dcurr1.dim_currency_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_CURRENCY_KEY
		, a.dim_currency_snkey as DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_default_dimension_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(ddim1.dim_default_dimension_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_KEY
		, a.dim_default_dimension_snkey as DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_delivery_mode_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(ddm1.dim_delivery_mode_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_DELIVERY_MODE_KEY
		, a.dim_delivery_mode_snkey as DIM_DELIVERY_MODE_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(distc1.dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE_KEY
		, a.dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_snkey as DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_inventory_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dinv1.dim_inventory_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_KEY
		, case when a.dim_inventory_snkey = -2 then -2
				else a.dim_inventory_snkey
			end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_item_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dit1.dim_item_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_ITEM_KEY
		, a.dim_item_snkey as DIM_ITEM_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dle1.dim_legal_entity_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_KEY
		, a.dim_legal_entity_snkey as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_location_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dl1.dim_location_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LOCATION_KEY
		, case when a.dim_location_snkey = -2 then -2
				else a.dim_location_snkey
			end::number as DIM_LOCATION_SNKEY
		, case when a.DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_SNKEY= -2 then -2
				else nvl(dspc1.DIM_SALES_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_KEY, -1)
			end::number as DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_KEY
		, a.dim_procurement_category_snkey as DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_purchase_order_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dpo1.dim_purchase_order_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER_KEY
		, a.dim_purchase_order_snkey as DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_return_reason_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(drr1.dim_return_reason_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_RETURN_REASON_KEY
		, a.dim_return_reason_snkey as DIM_RETURN_REASON_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_unit_of_measure_inventory_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(duomi1.dim_unit_of_measure_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_INVENTORY_KEY
		, a.dim_unit_of_measure_inventory_snkey as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_INVENTORY_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_unit_of_measure_purchase_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(duomp1.dim_unit_of_measure_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_PURCHASE_KEY
		, a.dim_unit_of_measure_purchase_snkey as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_PURCHASE_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_vendor_invoice_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dvi1.dim_vendor_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_KEY
		, a.dim_vendor_invoice_snkey as DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_vendor_order_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dvo1.dim_vendor_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_VENDOR_ORDER_KEY
		, a.dim_vendor_order_snkey as DIM_VENDOR_ORDER_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_worker_orderer_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dwo1.dim_worker_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_WORKER_ORDERER_KEY
		, a.dim_worker_orderer_snkey as DIM_WORKER_ORDERER_SNKEY
		, case when a.dim_worker_requester_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dwr1.dim_worker_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_WORKER_REQUESTER_KEY
		, a.dim_worker_requester_snkey as DIM_WORKER_REQUESTER_SNKEY
		, a.currency_code as CURRENCY_CODE, a.default_dimension as DEFAULT_DIMENSION, a.delivery_mode_id as DELIVERY_MODE_ID, a.intra_stat_transaction_code as INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE, a.inventory_dimension_id as INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID, a.item_id as ITEM_ID, a.record_id_location as RECORD_ID_LOCATION, a.procurement_category as PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY, a.return_reason_id as RETURN_REASON_ID, a.unit_of_measure_code_inventory as UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY, a.unit_of_measure_code_purchase as UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE, a.vendor_account_id_invoice as VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE, a.vendor_account_id_order as VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER, a.record_id_orderer as RECORD_ID_ORDERER, a.record_id_requester as RECORD_ID_REQUESTER, a.asset_transaction_type as ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE, a.delivery_type as DELIVERY_TYPE, a.document_status as DOCUMENT_STATUS, a.is_stocked_product as IS_STOCKED_PRODUCT, a.purchase_line_status as PURCHASE_LINE_STATUS, a.purchase_header_status as PURCHASE_HEADER_STATUS, a.purchase_type as PURCHASE_TYPE, a.accounting_date as ACCOUNTING_DATE, a.inventory_date as INVENTORY_DATE, a.purchase_line_expected_delivery_date as PURCHASE_LINE_EXPECTED_DELIVERY_DATE, a.received_date as RECEIVED_DATE, a.target_delivery_date as TARGET_DELIVERY_DATE, a.inventory_transaction_id as INVENTORY_TRANSACTION_ID, a.legal_entity as LEGAL_ENTITY, a.purchase_order_id as PURCHASE_ORDER_ID, a.purchase_receipt_id as PURCHASE_RECEIPT_ID, a.line_number as LINE_NUMBER, a.purchase_line_number as PURCHASE_LINE_NUMBER, a.qty_inventory_unit as QTY_INVENTORY_UNIT, a.inventory_unit as INVENTORY_UNIT, a.qty_purchase_unit as QTY_PURCHASE_UNIT, a.purchase_unit as PURCHASE_UNIT, a.net_amount_transaction_currency as NET_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY
		, hash(a.source_name, '~', to_char(a.record_id), '~', a.currency_code, '~', a.default_dimension, '~', a.delivery_mode_id, '~', a.intra_stat_transaction_code, '~', a.inventory_dimension_id, '~', a.item_id, '~', to_char(a.record_id_location), '~', to_char(a.procurement_category), '~', a.return_reason_id, '~', a.unit_of_measure_code_inventory, '~', a.unit_of_measure_code_purchase, '~', a.vendor_account_id_invoice, '~', a.vendor_account_id_order, '~', to_char(a.record_id_orderer), '~', to_char(a.record_id_requester), '~', a.asset_transaction_type, '~', a.delivery_type, '~', a.document_status, '~', a.is_stocked_product, '~', a.purchase_line_status, '~', a.purchase_header_status, '~', a.purchase_type, '~', to_char(a.accounting_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.inventory_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.purchase_line_expected_delivery_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.received_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.target_delivery_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', a.inventory_transaction_id, '~', a.legal_entity, '~', a.purchase_order_id, '~', a.purchase_receipt_id, '~', to_char(a.line_number), '~', to_char(a.purchase_line_number), '~', to_char(a.qty_inventory_unit), '~', a.inventory_unit, '~', to_char(a.qty_purchase_unit), '~', a.purchase_unit, '~', to_char(a.net_amount_transaction_currency))::number as HK_HASH_KEY
		, a.hk_source_name as HK_SOURCE_NAME
		, false::boolean as HK_SOFT_DELETE_FLAG
		, a.hk_source_created_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_source_last_updated_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP, a.hk_created_job_run_id as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID, a.hk_last_updated_job_run_id as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
		, uuid_string()::varchar as HK_WAREHOUSE_ID
	
	from (select 'AXNALA'::varchar as SOURCE_NAME
			, nvl(b.recordid, 0)::number(38, 0) as RECORD_ID
			
			, nvl(b.currencycode, '')::varchar as CURRENCY_CODE
			, nvl(b.defaultdimension, '')::varchar as DEFAULT_DIMENSION
			, nvl(b.deliverymodeid, '')::varchar as DELIVERY_MODE_ID
			, nvl(b.intrastattransactioncode, '')::varchar as INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE
			, nvl(b.inventorydimensionid, '')::varchar as INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID
			, nvl(b.itemid, '')::varchar as ITEM_ID
			, nvl(b.recordidlocation, 0)::number(38, 0) as RECORD_ID_LOCATION
			, nvl(b.procurementcategory, 0)::number(38, 0) as PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY
			, nvl(b.returnreasonid, '')::varchar as RETURN_REASON_ID
			, nvl(b.unitofmeasurecodeinventory, '')::varchar as UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY
			, nvl(b.unitofmeasurecodepurchase, '')::varchar as UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE
			, nvl(b.vendoraccountidinvoice, '')::varchar as VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE
			, nvl(b.vendoraccountidorder, '')::varchar as VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER
			, nvl(b.recordidorderer, 0)::number(38, 0) as RECORD_ID_ORDERER
			, nvl(b.recordidrequester, 0)::number(38, 0) as RECORD_ID_REQUESTER
			, nvl(b.assettransactiontype, '')::varchar as ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE
			, nvl(b.deliverytype, '')::varchar as DELIVERY_TYPE
			, nvl(b.documentstatus, '')::varchar as DOCUMENT_STATUS
			, nvl(b.isstockedproduct, '')::varchar as IS_STOCKED_PRODUCT
			, nvl(b.purchaselinestatus, '')::varchar as PURCHASE_LINE_STATUS
			, nvl(b.purchaseheaderstatus, '')::varchar as PURCHASE_HEADER_STATUS
			, nvl(b.purchasetype, '')::varchar as PURCHASE_TYPE
			
			, case when nvl(b.accountingdate, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.accountingdate < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.accountingdate > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.accountingdate
				end::date as ACCOUNTING_DATE
			, case when nvl(b.inventorydate, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.inventorydate < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.inventorydate > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.inventorydate
				end::date as INVENTORY_DATE
			, case when nvl(b.purchaselineexpecteddeliverydate, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.purchaselineexpecteddeliverydate < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.purchaselineexpecteddeliverydate > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.purchaselineexpecteddeliverydate
				end::date as PURCHASE_LINE_EXPECTED_DELIVERY_DATE
			, case when nvl(b.receiveddate, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.receiveddate < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.receiveddate > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.receiveddate
				end::date as RECEIVED_DATE
			, case when nvl(b.targetdeliverydate, '1900-01-01') in ('1900-01-01') then '1950-01-01'
					when b.targetdeliverydate < dd1.min_date_value then '1951-12-31'
					when b.targetdeliverydate > dd1.max_date_value then '9951-12-31'
				else b.targetdeliverydate
				end::date as TARGET_DELIVERY_DATE
			
			, nvl(b.inventorytransactionid, '')::varchar as INVENTORY_TRANSACTION_ID
			, nvl(b.legalentity, '')::varchar as LEGAL_ENTITY
			, nvl(b.purchaseorderid, '')::varchar as PURCHASE_ORDER_ID
			, nvl(b.purchasereceiptid, '')::varchar as PURCHASE_RECEIPT_ID
			, nvl(b.linenumber, 0)::number(25, 16) as LINE_NUMBER
			, nvl(b.purchaselinenumber, 0)::number(38, 0) as PURCHASE_LINE_NUMBER
			, nvl(b.qtyinventoryunit, 0)::number(28, 16) as QTY_INVENTORY_UNIT
			, nvl(b.inventoryunit, '')::varchar as INVENTORY_UNIT
			, nvl(b.qtypurchaseunit, 0)::number(28, 16) as QTY_PURCHASE_UNIT
			, nvl(b.purchaseunit, '')::varchar as PURCHASE_UNIT
			, nvl(b.netamounttransactioncurrency, 0)::number(28, 16) as NET_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY
			
			, nvl(b.dw_sourcecode, '')::varchar as HK_SOURCE_NAME
			, '1950-01-01 00:00:00'::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
			, nvl(b.dw_timestamp, '1950-01-01 00:00:00')::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
			, '-1'::varchar as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID
			, nvl(b.dw_batch, '-1')::varchar as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
			
			, case when nvl(SOURCE_NAME, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME)
				end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(ACCOUNTING_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(ACCOUNTING_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as ACCOUNTING_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(INVENTORY_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(INVENTORY_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as INVENTORY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(PURCHASE_LINE_EXPECTED_DELIVERY_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(PURCHASE_LINE_EXPECTED_DELIVERY_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as PURCHASE_LINE_EXPECTED_DELIVERY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(RECEIVED_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(RECEIVED_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as RECEIVED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(TARGET_DELIVERY_DATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(TARGET_DELIVERY_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as TARGET_DELIVERY_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(CURRENCY_CODE, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', CURRENCY_CODE)
				end::number as DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DEFAULT_DIMENSION, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', DEFAULT_DIMENSION)
				end::number as DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(DELIVERY_MODE_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', DELIVERY_MODE_ID)
				end::number as DIM_DELIVERY_MODE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY,'') = '' or nvl(INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE)
				end::number as DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID)
				end::number as DIM_INVENTORY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(ITEM_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash('', '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', ITEM_ID)	-- (NOTE: ITEM_KEY is unique across all source systems; therefore, this field will always be set to '')
				end::number as DIM_ITEM_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY)
				end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(RECORD_ID_LOCATION, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(RECORD_ID_LOCATION))
				end::number as DIM_LOCATION_SNKEY
			, case when  nvl(PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY)) 
                end::number(38, 0) as DIM_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(PURCHASE_ORDER_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', PURCHASE_ORDER_ID)
				end::number as DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY, '') = '' or nvl(RETURN_REASON_ID, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', RETURN_REASON_ID)
				end::number as DIM_RETURN_REASON_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_INVENTORY)
				end::number as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_INVENTORY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE_PURCHASE)
				end::number as DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_PURCHASE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY,'') = '' or nvl(VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_INVOICE)
				end::number as DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGAL_ENTITY,'') = '' or nvl(VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', VENDOR_ACCOUNT_ID_ORDER)
				end::number as DIM_VENDOR_ORDER_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(RECORD_ID_ORDERER, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(RECORD_ID_ORDERER))
				end::number as DIM_WORKER_ORDERER_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(RECORD_ID_REQUESTER, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(RECORD_ID_REQUESTER))
				end::number as DIM_WORKER_REQUESTER_SNKEY
			
		from (select hk_source_name, hk_job_run_id, hk_created_timestamp, hk_warehouse_id, dw_id, currencykey, datasourcekey, defaultdimensionkey, deliverymodekey, intrastattransactioncodekey, inventorykey, itemkey, legalentitykey, locationkey, procurementcategorykey, purchaseorderkey, purchaseorderdetailskey, returnreasonkey, unitofmeasurepurchasekey, unitofmeasureinventorykey, vendorinvoicekey, vendorinvoicehistorykey, vendororderkey, vendororderhistorykey, workerordererkey, workerrequesterkey, accountingdate, inventorydate, purchaselineexpecteddeliverydate, receiveddate, targetdeliverydate, recordid, inventorytransactionid, legalentity, purchaseorderid, purchasereceiptid, linenumber, purchaselinenumber, qtyinventoryunit, inventoryunit, qtypurchaseunit, purchaseunit, netamounttransactioncurrency, incrementaltimestamp, currencycode, defaultdimension, deliverymodeid, intrastattransactioncode, inventorydimensionid, itemid, recordidlocation, procurementcategory, returnreasonid, unitofmeasurecodeinventory, unitofmeasurecodepurchase, vendoraccountidinvoice, vendoraccountidorder, recordidorderer, recordidrequester, assettransactiontype, deliverytype, documentstatus, isstockedproduct, purchaselinestatus, purchaseheaderstatus, purchasetype, dw_batch, dw_sourcecode, dw_timestamp
			from @{pipeline().globalParameters.environment}_raw.edw_dwh.FACTPURCHASERECEIPTS
			) b
			inner join (select min(date_value) as MIN_DATE_VALUE
							, max(date_value) as MAX_DATE_VALUE
						from global.DIM_DATE
						where date_value not in ('1950-01-01', '1951-12-31', '9000-01-01', '9951-12-31')) dd1 on
				1=1
		) a
	left join global.DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM dss1 on
		a.dim_source_system_snkey = dss1.dim_source_system_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd1 on
		a.accounting_date_dim_date_snkey = dd1.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd2 on
		a.inventory_date_dim_date_snkey = dd2.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd3 on
		a.purchase_line_expected_delivery_date_dim_date_snkey = dd3.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd4 on
		a.received_date_dim_date_snkey = dd4.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd5 on
		a.target_delivery_date_dim_date_snkey = dd5.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_CURRENCY dcurr1 on
		a.dim_currency_snkey = dcurr1.dim_currency_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION ddim1 on
		a.dim_default_dimension_snkey = ddim1.dim_default_dimension_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DELIVERY_MODE ddm1 on
		a.dim_delivery_mode_snkey = ddm1.dim_delivery_mode_snkey
	left join global.DIM_INTRA_STAT_TRANSACTION_CODE distc1 on
		a.dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_snkey = distc1.dim_intra_stat_transaction_code_snkey
	left join global.DIM_INVENTORY dinv1 on
		a.dim_inventory_snkey = dinv1.dim_inventory_snkey
	left join global.DIM_ITEM dit1 on
		a.dim_item_snkey = dit1.dim_item_snkey
	left join global.DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY dle1 on
		a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = dle1.dim_legal_entity_snkey
	left join global.DIM_LOCATION dl1 on
		a.dim_location_snkey = dl1.dim_location_snkey
    left join global.DIM_SALES_PROCUREMENT_CATEGORY dspc1 on
		a.dim_procurement_category_snkey = dspc1.dim_sales_procurement_category_snkey
	left join global.DIM_PURCHASE_ORDER dpo1 on
		a.dim_purchase_order_snkey = dpo1.dim_purchase_order_snkey
	left join global.DIM_RETURN_REASON drr1 on
		a.dim_return_reason_snkey = drr1.dim_return_reason_snkey
	left join global.DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE duomi1 on
		a.dim_unit_of_measure_inventory_snkey = duomi1.dim_unit_of_measure_snkey
	left join global.DIM_UNIT_OF_MEASURE duomp1 on
		a.dim_unit_of_measure_purchase_snkey = duomp1.dim_unit_of_measure_snkey
	left join global.DIM_VENDOR dvi1 on
		a.dim_vendor_invoice_snkey = dvi1.dim_vendor_snkey and
		a.received_date >= dvi1.hk_effective_start_timestamp and
		a.received_date < dvi1.hk_effective_end_timestamp
	left join global.DIM_VENDOR dvo1 on
		a.dim_vendor_order_snkey = dvo1.dim_vendor_snkey and
		a.received_date >= dvo1.hk_effective_start_timestamp and
		a.received_date < dvo1.hk_effective_end_timestamp
	left join global.DIM_WORKER dwo1 on
		a.dim_worker_orderer_snkey = dwo1.dim_worker_snkey
	left join global.DIM_WORKER dwr1 on
		a.dim_worker_requester_snkey = dwr1.dim_worker_snkey
;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT --TOP (100) 
	   f1.DW_ID
      ,f1.CASHDISCOUNTKEY
      ,f1.CURRENCYKEY
      ,f1.DEFAULTDIMENSIONKEY
      ,f1.LEGALENTITYKEY
      ,f1.REMITTANCELOCATIONKEY
      ,f1.VENDORINVOICEKEY
      ,f1.VENDORINVOICEHISTORYKEY
      ,f1.VENDORPAYMENTMODEKEY
      ,f1.VENDORPAYMENTSPECIFICATIONKEY
      ,f1.VENDORTRANSACTIONDETAILSKEY
      ,f1.WORKERAPPROVERKEY
      ,f1.ALIGNEDDUEDATE
      ,f1.APPROVEDDATE
      ,f1.CLOSEDDATE
      ,f1.DOCUMENTDATE
      ,f1.DUEDATE
      ,f1.LASTSETTLEMENTDATE
      ,f1.TRANSACTIONDATE
      ,f1.RECORDID  
      ,f1.DOCUMENTNUMBER
      ,f1.INVOICEID
      ,f1.LEGALENTITY
      ,f1.LASTSETTLEMENTVOUCHER
      ,f1.VOUCHER
      ,f1.AMOUNTTRANSACTIONCURRENCY
      ,f1.AMOUNTCOMPANYCURRENCY
      ,f1.SETTLEDAMOUNTTRANSACTIONCURRENCY
      ,f1.SETTLEDAMOUNTCOMPANYCURRENCY
      ,f1.SETTLEDAMOUNTREPORTINGCURRENCY
      ,f1.INCREMENTALTIMESTAMP
      ,f1.CHECKDATE
      ,f1.PAYMENTTERMS
      ,f1.INVOICEDATE
      ,f1.DAYSOVERDUE
      ,f1.TRANSRECIDSETTLED
      ,f1.DAYSTOPAY
      ,f1.INVOICESTATUS
      ,f1.INVOICEFULLSTATUS
	  ,case when f1.VendorInvoiceKey in (-1, -2) then f2.ACCOUNTNUM else dvi1.VendorAccountID end as ACCOUNTNUM
	  ,case when f1.WORKERAPPROVERKEY in (-1, -2) then  f2.APPROVER else dwr1.recordid end as APPROVER
	  , case when f1.CASHDISCOUNTKEY in (-1, -2) then f2.CASHDISCCODE else dcd1.CashDiscountID end as CASHDISCCODE
	  ,case when f1.CurrencyKey in (-1, -2) then f2.currencycode else dcurr1.currencycode end as currencycode
	  ,cast(case when f1.defaultdimensionkey in (-1, -2) then f2.defaultdimension else dd1.defaultdimension end as varchar) as defaultdimension
	  ,f2.PAYMMODE
	  ,f2.PAYMSPEC
	  ,f2.REMITTANCELOCATION
	  ,dvtd1.TransactionType
	  ,dvtd1.IsApproved
	  ,dvtd1.IsReversal
	  ,f1.DW_BATCH
      ,f1.DW_SOURCECODE
      ,f1.DW_TIMESTAMP
  FROM EDW_DWH.DBO.FACTVENDORTRANSACTIONS f1 with (nolock)
	left join edw_hka.dbo.FACTVENDORTRANSACTIONS f2 with (nolock) on
		f1.dw_id = f2.DW_Id
	left join EDW_DWH.dbo.DimCurrency dcurr1 with (nolock) on
		f1.CurrencyKey =dcurr1.CurrencyKey
	left join EDW_DWH.dbo.DIMVENDOR dvi1 with (nolock) on
		f1.vendorinvoicekey = dvi1.vendorkey
	left join dbo.DIMWORKER dwr1 with (nolock) on
		f1.WORKERAPPROVERKEY = dwr1.workerkey
	left join dbo.DimCashDiscount dcd1 with (nolock) on
		f1.CashDiscountKey = dcd1.CashDiscountKey
    left join edw_hka.dbo.DIMDEFAULTDIMENSION dd1 with (nolock) on
		f1.defaultdimensionkey = dd1.defaultdimensionkey
	left join EDW_DWH.dbo.DimVendorTransactionDetails dvtd1 with (nolock) on
		f1.VENDORTRANSACTIONDETAILSKEY = dvtd1.VENDORTRANSACTIONDETAILSKEY

activities.name: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

dependsOn.activity: ADLS to Snowflake RAW with HK columns

text.value:
truncate table GLOBAL.FACT_VENDOR_TRANSACTIONS;

INSERT INTO GLOBAL.FACT_VENDOR_TRANSACTIONS (
FACT_VENDOR_TRANSACTIONS_KEY,
SOURCE_NAME,
RECORD_ID,
DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_KEY,
DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY,
DIM_CASH_DISCOUNT_KEY,
DIM_CASH_DISCOUNT_SNKEY,
DIM_CURRENCY_KEY,
DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY,
DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_KEY,
DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY,
DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_KEY,
DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY,
DIM_LOCATION_KEY,
DIM_LOCATION_SNKEY,
DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_KEY,
DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_SNKEY,
DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE_KEY,
DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE_SNKEY,
DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION_KEY,
DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION_SNKEY,
--DIM_VENDOR_TRANSACTION_DETAILS_KEY,
--DIM_VENDOR_TRANSACTION_DETAILS_SNKEY,
DIM_WORKER_APPROVER_KEY,
DIM_WORKER_APPROVER_SNKEY,
ALIGNED_DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
ALIGNED_DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
APPROVED_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
APPROVED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
CLOSED_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
CLOSED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
DOCUMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
DOCUMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
LAST_SETTLEMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
LAST_SETTLEMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
CHECK_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
CHECK_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
INVOICE_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY,
INVOICE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY,
ALIGNED_DUE_DATE,
APPROVED_DATE,
CLOSED_DATE,
DOCUMENT_DATE,
DUE_DATE,
LAST_SETTLEMENT_DATE,
TRANSACTION_DATE,
DOCUMENT_NUMBER,
INVOICE_ID,
LEGAL_ENTITY,
LAST_SETTLEMENT_VOUCHER,
VOUCHER,
AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY,
AMOUNT_COMPANY_CURRENCY,
SETTLED_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY,
SETTLED_AMOUNT_COMPANY_CURRENCY,
SETTLED_AMOUNT_REPORTING_CURRENCY,
ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
APPROVER,
CASH_DISCOUNT_CODE,
CURRENCY_CODE,
DEFAULT_DIMENSION,
PAYMENT_MODE,
PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION,
REMITTANCE_LOCATION,
CHECK_DATE,
PAYMENT_TERMS,
INVOICE_DATE,
DAYS_OVERDUE,
SETTLED_TRANSACTION_RECORD_ID,
DAYS_TO_PAY,
INVOICE_STATUS,
INVOICE_FULL_STATUS,
TRANSACTION_TYPE,
IS_APPROVED,
IS_REVERSAL,
HK_HASH_KEY,
HK_SOURCE_NAME,
HK_SOFT_DELETE_FLAG,
HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID,
HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID,
HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP,
HK_WAREHOUSE_ID)
SELECT hash(a.SOURCE_NAME, '~',to_char(a.RECORD_ID)) ::number as FACT_VENDOR_TRANSACTIONS_KEY
    ,a.SOURCE_NAME
    ,a.RECORD_ID
    ,a.dim_source_system_snkey as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_KEY
    ,a.DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
    ,case when a.DIM_CASH_DISCOUNT_SNKEY = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dcd1.DIM_CASH_DISCOUNT_KEY, -1)
			end::number as DIM_CASH_DISCOUNT_KEY
    ,a.DIM_CASH_DISCOUNT_SNKEY
    ,case when a.dim_currency_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dcurr1.dim_currency_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_CURRENCY_KEY
    ,a.DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY
	, case when a.dim_default_dimension_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(ddim1.dim_default_dimension_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_KEY
    ,a.DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY
    , case when a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dle1.dim_legal_entity_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_KEY
    ,a.DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
    , case when a.dim_location_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dl1.dim_location_key, -1)
			end::number as DIM_LOCATION_KEY
    ,a.DIM_LOCATION_SNKEY
    , case when a.dim_vendor_invoice_snkey = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dvi1.dim_vendor_key, -1)
	   end::number as DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_KEY
    ,a.DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_SNKEY  
    ,case when a.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE_SNKEY = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dvpm1.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE_KEY, -1)
	   end::number as DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE_KEY
    ,a.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE_SNKEY
    ,case when a.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION_SNKEY = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dvps1.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION_KEY, -1)
	   end::number as DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION_KEY
    ,a.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION_SNKEY
   -- ,a.DIM_VENDOR_TRANSACTION_DETAILS_SNKEY AS DIM_VENDOR_TRANSACTION_DETAILS_KEY --junk dim
   -- ,a.DIM_VENDOR_TRANSACTION_DETAILS_SNKEY
    , case when a.DIM_WORKER_APPROVER_SNKEY = -2 then -2
				else nvl(dwa1.DIM_WORKER_KEY, -1)
			end::number as DIM_WORKER_APPROVER_KEY
    ,a.DIM_WORKER_APPROVER_SNKEY
    ,nvl(dd1.dim_date_key, -1)::number as ALIGNED_DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
    ,a.ALIGNED_DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
    ,nvl(dd2.dim_date_key, -1)::number as APPROVED_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
    ,a.APPROVED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
    ,nvl(dd3.dim_date_key, -1)::number as CLOSED_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
    ,a.CLOSED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
    ,nvl(dd4.dim_date_key, -1)::number as DOCUMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
    ,a.DOCUMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
    ,nvl(dd5.dim_date_key, -1)::number as DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
    ,a.DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
    ,nvl(dd6.dim_date_key, -1)::number as LAST_SETTLEMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
    ,a.LAST_SETTLEMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
    ,nvl(dd7.dim_date_key, -1)::number as TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
    ,a.TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
    ,nvl(dd8.dim_date_key, -1)::number as CHECK_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
    ,a.CHECK_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
    ,nvl(dd9.dim_date_key, -1)::number as INVOICE_DATE_DIM_DATE_KEY
    ,a.INVOICE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
,a.ALIGNED_DUE_DATE
,a.APPROVED_DATE
,a.CLOSED_DATE
,a.DOCUMENT_DATE
,a.DUE_DATE
,a.LAST_SETTLEMENT_DATE
,a.TRANSACTION_DATE
,a.DOCUMENT_NUMBER
,a.INVOICE_ID
,a.LEGAL_ENTITY
,a.LAST_SETTLEMENT_VOUCHER
,a.VOUCHER
,a.AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY
,a.AMOUNT_COMPANY_CURRENCY
,a.SETTLED_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY
,a.SETTLED_AMOUNT_COMPANY_CURRENCY
,a.SETTLED_AMOUNT_REPORTING_CURRENCY
,a.ACCOUNT_NUMBER
,a.APPROVER
,a.CASH_DISCOUNT_CODE
,a.CURRENCY_CODE
,a.DEFAULT_DIMENSION
,a.PAYMENT_MODE
,a.PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION
,a.REMITTANCE_LOCATION
,a.CHECK_DATE
,a.PAYMENT_TERMS
,a.INVOICE_DATE
,a.DAYS_OVERDUE
,a.SETTLED_TRANSACTION_RECORD_ID
,a.DAYS_TO_PAY
,a.INVOICE_STATUS
,a.INVOICE_FULL_STATUS
,a.TRANSACTION_TYPE
,a.IS_APPROVED
,a.IS_REVERSAL
,hash(a.source_name, '~', to_char(a.record_id), '~',to_char(a.aligned_due_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.approved_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.closed_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.document_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.due_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.last_settlement_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.transaction_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', a.document_number, '~', a.invoice_id, '~', a.legal_entity, '~', a.last_settlement_voucher, '~', a.voucher, '~', to_char(a.amount_transaction_currency), '~', to_char(a.amount_company_currency), '~', to_char(a.settled_amount_transaction_currency), '~', to_char(a.settled_amount_company_currency), '~', to_char(a.settled_amount_reporting_currency), '~', a.account_number, '~', to_char(a.approver), '~', a.cash_discount_code, '~', a.currency_code, '~', a.default_dimension, '~', a.payment_mode, '~', a.payment_specification, '~', to_char(a.remittance_location), '~', to_char(a.check_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', a.payment_terms, '~', to_char(a.invoice_date, 'yyyymmdd'), '~', to_char(a.days_overdue), '~', to_char(a.settled_transaction_record_id), '~', to_char(a.days_to_pay), '~', a.invoice_status, '~', a.invoice_full_status, '~', a.transaction_type, '~', a.is_approved, '~', a.is_reversal) AS HK_HASH_KEY
		, a.hk_source_name as HK_SOURCE_NAME
		, false::boolean as HK_SOFT_DELETE_FLAG
		, a.hk_source_created_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP 
        , a.hk_source_last_updated_timestamp as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
        , a.hk_created_job_run_id as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID
        , a.hk_last_updated_job_run_id as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
		, current_timestamp::timestamp_tz as HK_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
		, uuid_string()::varchar as HK_WAREHOUSE_ID
FROM
( SELECT     'AXNALA'::varchar as SOURCE_NAME
            , nvl(LEGALENTITY, '') AS LEGAL_ENTITY 
            , nvl(RECORDID,0) AS RECORD_ID
            , case when nvl(SOURCE_NAME, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME)
				end::number as DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM_SNKEY
            , case when LEGAL_ENTITY = '' or nvl(CASHDISCCODE, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', CASHDISCCODE)
				end::number as DIM_CASH_DISCOUNT_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(CURRENCYCODE, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', CURRENCYCODE)
				end::number as DIM_CURRENCY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DEFAULTDIMENSION, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', DEFAULTDIMENSION)
				end::number as DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LEGALENTITY, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGALENTITY)
				end::number as DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(REMITTANCELOCATION, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(REMITTANCELOCATION))
				end::number as DIM_LOCATION_SNKEY
			, case when LEGAL_ENTITY = '' or nvl(ACCOUNTNUM,'') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', ACCOUNTNUM)
				end::number as DIM_VENDOR_INVOICE_SNKEY
            , case when LEGAL_ENTITY = '' or nvl(PAYMMODE, '') = '' then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', PAYMMODE)
				end::number as DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE_SNKEY
            , case when LEGAL_ENTITY = '' or  nvl(PAYMMODE, '') = '' OR nvl(PAYMSPEC, '') = '' then -2
			    else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', LEGAL_ENTITY, '~', PAYMMODE,'~', PAYMSPEC)
				end::number as DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION_SNKEY
           /* , case when nvl(TRANSACTIONTYPE, '') = '' OR nvl(ISAPPROVED, '') = '' OR nvl(ISREVERSAL, '') = '' then -2
			    else hash(TRANSACTIONTYPE, '~', ISAPPROVED, '~', ISREVERSAL )
			    end::number as DIM_VENDOR_TRANSACTION_DETAILS_SNKEY*/
			, case when nvl(APPROVER, 0) = 0 then -2
				else hash(SOURCE_NAME, '~', to_char(APPROVER))
				end::number as DIM_WORKER_APPROVER_SNKEY
 			, case when nvl(ALIGNEDDUEDATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(ALIGNEDDUEDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as ALIGNED_DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
 			, case when nvl(APPROVEDDATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(APPROVEDDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as APPROVED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(CLOSEDDATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(CLOSEDDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as CLOSED_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DOCUMENTDATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(DOCUMENTDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as DOCUMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(DUEDATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(DUEDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as DUE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(LASTSETTLEMENTDATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(LASTSETTLEMENTDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as LAST_SETTLEMENT_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
			, case when nvl(TRANSACTIONDATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(TRANSACTIONDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as TRANSACTION_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
            , case when nvl(CHECKDATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(CHECKDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as CHECK_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
            , case when nvl(INVOICEDATE, '1950-01-01') = '1950-01-01' then -2
				else hash('', '~', to_char(INVOICEDATE, 'yyyymmdd'))
				end::number as INVOICE_DATE_DIM_DATE_SNKEY
        	 ,  nvl(ALIGNEDDUEDATE, '1950-01-01') AS ALIGNED_DUE_DATE 	
	         ,  nvl(APPROVEDDATE, '1950-01-01')  AS APPROVED_DATE 		 
	         ,  nvl(CLOSEDDATE, '1950-01-01') AS CLOSED_DATE 				 
	         ,  nvl(DOCUMENTDATE, '1950-01-01') AS DOCUMENT_DATE  
	         ,  nvl(DUEDATE, '1950-01-01') AS DUE_DATE 				
	         ,  nvl(LASTSETTLEMENTDATE, '1950-01-01') AS LAST_SETTLEMENT_DATE 		
	         ,  nvl(TRANSACTIONDATE, '1950-01-01') AS TRANSACTION_DATE 		
	       , nvl(b.documentnumber, '')::varchar as DOCUMENT_NUMBER
           , nvl(b.INVOICEID, '')::varchar as INVOICE_ID
           , nvl(b.LASTSETTLEMENTVOUCHER, '')::varchar as LAST_SETTLEMENT_VOUCHER
           , nvl(b.VOUCHER, '')::varchar as VOUCHER
           , nvl(b.AMOUNTTRANSACTIONCURRENCY, 0)::number(25,16) as AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY
           , nvl(b.AMOUNTCOMPANYCURRENCY, 0)::number(25,16) as AMOUNT_COMPANY_CURRENCY			
           , nvl(b.SETTLEDAMOUNTTRANSACTIONCURRENCY, 0)::number(25,16) as SETTLED_AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY
           , nvl(b.SETTLEDAMOUNTCOMPANYCURRENCY, 0)::number(25,16) as SETTLED_AMOUNT_COMPANY_CURRENCY
           , nvl(b.SETTLEDAMOUNTREPORTINGCURRENCY, 0)::number(25,16) as SETTLED_AMOUNT_REPORTING_CURRENCY
           , nvl(b.ACCOUNTNUM, '')::varchar as ACCOUNT_NUMBER 
           , nvl(b.APPROVER, 0)::number as APPROVER
           , nvl(b.CASHDISCCODE, '')::varchar as CASH_DISCOUNT_CODE	
           , nvl(b.CURRENCYCODE, '')::varchar as CURRENCY_CODE				
           , nvl(b.DEFAULTDIMENSION, '')::varchar as DEFAULT_DIMENSION
           , nvl(b.PAYMMODE, '')::varchar as PAYMENT_MODE
           , nvl(b.PAYMSPEC, '')::varchar as PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION
           , nvl(b.REMITTANCELOCATION, 0)::number as REMITTANCE_LOCATION
           , nvl(b.CHECKDATE, '1950-01-01')::date as CHECK_DATE
           , nvl(b.PAYMENTTERMS, '')::varchar as PAYMENT_TERMS
           , nvl(b.INVOICEDATE, '1950-01-01')::date as INVOICE_DATE 
           , nvl(b.DAYSOVERDUE, 0)::number as DAYS_OVERDUE
           , nvl(b.TRANSRECIDSETTLED, 0)::number as SETTLED_TRANSACTION_RECORD_ID
           , nvl(b.DAYSTOPAY, 0)::number as DAYS_TO_PAY
           , nvl(b.INVOICESTATUS , '')::varchar as INVOICE_STATUS
           , nvl(b.INVOICEFULLSTATUS, '')::varchar as INVOICE_FULL_STATUS
           , nvl(b.TRANSACTIONTYPE, '')::varchar as TRANSACTION_TYPE
           , nvl(b.ISAPPROVED, '')::varchar as IS_APPROVED
           , nvl(b.ISREVERSAL, '')::varchar as IS_REVERSAL
            , nvl(b.dw_sourcecode, '')::varchar as HK_SOURCE_NAME
			, '1950-01-01 00:00:00'::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_CREATED_TIMESTAMP
			, nvl(b.dw_timestamp, '1950-01-01 00:00:00')::timestamp_tz as HK_SOURCE_LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP
			, '-1'::varchar as HK_CREATED_JOB_RUN_ID
			, nvl(b.dw_batch, '-1')::varchar as HK_LAST_UPDATED_JOB_RUN_ID
  FROM	
	(SELECT
	HK_SOURCE_NAME 			,
	HK_JOB_RUN_ID 			,
	HK_CREATED_TIMESTAMP 	,
	HK_WAREHOUSE_ID 		,
	DW_ID 					,
	ALIGNEDDUEDATE 			,
	APPROVEDDATE 			,
	CLOSEDDATE 				,
	DOCUMENTDATE 			,
	DUEDATE 				,
	LASTSETTLEMENTDATE 		,
	TRANSACTIONDATE 		,
	RECORDID 				,
	DOCUMENTNUMBER 			,
	INVOICEID 				,
	LEGALENTITY 			,
	LASTSETTLEMENTVOUCHER 	,
	VOUCHER 				,
	AMOUNTTRANSACTIONCURRENCY 	,
	AMOUNTCOMPANYCURRENCY 		,
	SETTLEDAMOUNTTRANSACTIONCURRENCY 	,
	SETTLEDAMOUNTCOMPANYCURRENCY 		,
	SETTLEDAMOUNTREPORTINGCURRENCY 		,
	INCREMENTALTIMESTAMP 				,
	CHECKDATE ,
	PAYMENTTERMS ,
	INVOICEDATE ,
	DAYSOVERDUE ,
	TRANSRECIDSETTLED ,
	DAYSTOPAY,
	INVOICESTATUS ,
	INVOICEFULLSTATUS ,
	ACCOUNTNUM ,
	APPROVER ,
	CASHDISCCODE ,
	CURRENCYCODE ,
	DEFAULTDIMENSION ,
	PAYMMODE ,
	PAYMSPEC ,
	REMITTANCELOCATION ,	
	TRANSACTIONTYPE ,
	ISAPPROVED	,
	ISREVERSAL ,
	DW_BATCH ,
	DW_SOURCECODE ,
	DW_TIMESTAMP 
	FROM @{pipeline().globalParameters.environment}_RAW.EDW_DWH.FACTVENDORTRANSACTIONS )b
    			inner join (select min(date_value) as MIN_DATE_VALUE
							, max(date_value) as MAX_DATE_VALUE
						from global.DIM_DATE
						where date_value not in ('1950-01-01', '1951-12-31', '9000-01-01', '9951-12-31')) dd1 on 1=1 ) a
	left join global.DIM_SOURCE_SYSTEM dss1 on
		a.dim_source_system_snkey = dss1.dim_source_system_snkey
    left join global.DIM_CASH_DISCOUNT dcd1 on
		a.dim_cash_discount_snkey = dcd1.dim_cash_discount_snkey
	left join global.DIM_CURRENCY dcurr1 on
		a.dim_currency_snkey = dcurr1.dim_currency_snkey    
    left join global.DIM_DEFAULT_DIMENSION ddim1 on
		a.dim_default_dimension_snkey = ddim1.dim_default_dimension_snkey
	left join global.DIM_LEGAL_ENTITY dle1 on
		a.dim_legal_entity_snkey = dle1.dim_legal_entity_snkey
	left join global.DIM_LOCATION dl1 on
		a.dim_location_snkey = dl1.dim_location_snkey
	left join global.DIM_VENDOR dvi1 on
	    a.dim_vendor_invoice_snkey = dvi1.dim_vendor_snkey and
	    a.INVOICE_DATE >= dvi1.hk_effective_start_timestamp and
		a.INVOICE_DATE < dvi1.hk_effective_end_timestamp
    left join global.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE dvpm1 on
		a.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE_SNKEY = dvpm1.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_MODE_SNKEY
    left join global.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION dvps1 on
		a.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION_SNKEY = dvps1.DIM_VENDOR_PAYMENT_SPECIFICATION_SNKEY
	left join global.DIM_WORKER dwa1 on
		a.dim_worker_approver_snkey = dwa1.dim_worker_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd1 on
		a.aligned_due_date_dim_date_snkey = dd1.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd2 on
		a.approved_date_dim_date_snkey = dd2.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd3 on
		a.closed_date_dim_date_snkey = dd3.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd4 on
		a.document_date_dim_date_snkey = dd4.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd5 on
		a.due_date_dim_date_snkey = dd5.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd6 on
		a.last_settlement_date_dim_date_snkey = dd6.dim_date_snkey
	left join global.DIM_DATE dd7 on
		a.transaction_date_dim_date_snkey = dd7.dim_date_snkey
    left join global.DIM_DATE dd8 on
		a.check_date_dim_date_snkey = dd8.dim_date_snkey
    left join global.DIM_DATE dd9 on
		a.invoice_date_dim_date_snkey = dd9.dim_date_snkey;
